secondary_tags: ['tim drake'  'jack drake'  'janet drake'  'batfamily'  'dc comics'  'dc universe'  'tim drake angst'  'batman the animated series'  'batman beyond return of the joker'  'dc animated universe'  'red robin'  'jason todd']
post_body: I think we need to pay more attention to BTAS!Tim.  Personally Batman the animated series was my first legit introduction to batman and by proxy the batfamily and Tim Drake. For me BTAS Tim will always be my version of Tim even though he was really just Jason in everything but name sort of. However I have come up with a solution since main Canon Tim is also still my favorite batfam member.  I have mashed the two together  No hear me out ya‚Äôll-  Tim is like 4 or 5 when his parents get a divorce. His dad is broke as fuck without his suger mommy and over the course of two-three years he ends up moving into Crime Alley. Meanwhile Janet Drake is still rich living the high society Gotham life. This leaves Tim in the weirdest place possible. One week he‚Äôs living up with the best of the best eating high end meals and walking around in a suit more expensive than the average persons yearly cost of living staying in an empty house cleaned top to bottom spot less. The next week he‚Äôs crawling around in a garbage bin outside looking for something half way edible wearing a dubiously thrifted shirt and ripped up pants with more patches and holes in them that Gotham has rouges sitting in a rat infested apartment with non-stop noise outside his window dirt and grime practically melted into every surface imaginable.  Neither one of his parents cares enough about him to really fight for custody or even remember to trade Tim off consistently. People barley even know there was a divorce to begin with and neither wants to draw more attention to themselves. So Tim continues living like this back and fourth until one day when he‚Äôs 10 and his mom just. Never picks him up again. Never gets seen in Gotham again. Disappears off the face of the earth. His dad tries to drop him off at the empty mansion his mom tried to pass off as a home a few times but there‚Äôs no food or water or anything and Tim can‚Äôt live like that alone at the age of 10. Like Crime Alley was any better but at least there he had his dad.  Sometimes  He dies  Robin dies  Tim‚Äôs Robin  Nothing makes a lot of sense anymore  This AU is very important to me and has in fact become my go to version of Tim when writing anything for the batfamily. There‚Äôs just so much potential

post_body: Just a concept Yandere!Dimensional traveler!Batman X Gn!reader X Platonic!Batfam also wrote a one shot about this     Synopsis: Batman becomes obsessed with a spouse and kids that he never had.     Pairing: Yandere!Dimensional traveler!Batman X Reader; Batman X Reader; Platonic Batfam X Batparent!Reader; Yandere!Batman X Platonic!Batfam; Batman X Platonic!Batfam   Tw: English is not my first language; mentions of Alfred being dead; I‚Äôm quite new on the fandom so there might be some mistakes about facts of the original comics but this is a fanfic so whatever; this piece is more focused on Bruce and the batfam while still mentioning reader; stalker and delusional Bruce.  Word count: 14k  Requested? No.  General masterlist         Yandere!Batman who is very VERY extremely lonely touch starved and grim. He‚Äôs also very unlucky apparently.     <!-- more --> He never even met Dick. Sure he heard about what happened to The Flying Graysons investigated it even but he‚Äôs only seem him on pictures videos or in passing but he wasn‚Äôt there that night he never talked to him or maybe he did while stopping him from killing Zuko either way never adopted him our boy went straight to orphanage and was adopted shortly after by a normal and loving family.     Actually this universe‚Äôs Bruce never met nor connected with ANY of his children all he had was Alfred and yet‚Ä¶ Something happened and‚Ä¶     Safe to say it‚Äôs been long never ending harsh years.     The only thing this Bruce knows is pain loneliness and misery. Don‚Äôt talk to him about Alfred. Maybe he can‚Äôt even look at pictures. When he realized he couldn‚Äôt remember his voice anymore‚Ä¶ He WON‚ÄôT watch videos or listen to audio of him. Yes Alfred being gone was one more trauma to the list of traumas he will carry on his tense and burdened shoulders for the rest of his helpless existence.     This Bruce is a loser closer to madness than any version of Bruce (aside from Batman who laughs). His Gotham is nearing it‚Äôs doom. He didn‚Äôt join the Justice League because of his level of emotional masochism pride and lack of will to get back on his feet. He is so used to suffering he thinks it‚Äôs possible to die if he doesn‚Äôt have such bitter companion. Safe to say he is depressed. And hyperfocused on saving a city he‚Äôs been working in for decades too blind by his grieving to see that he is not doing the right things. There is no social projects on Wayne Enterprises or Wayne Foundation to help people he neglected the company decades ago. He is almost becoming Michael Keaton‚Äôs Batman in The Flash.     Somehow one day he is sent to another universe. It can be through some disaster like Crisis in Infinite Earths or some villain who wanted different variants of heros to fight amongst themselves to death doesn‚Äôt really matter here what‚Äôs important is that he (after years of being a hermit on his cave) interacts with people more specifically he interacts with himself.     Or definitely a lucky version of himself. Maybe the luckiest. He is jealous.     During the whole event they interact and imagine how he felt when he found out that this other Batman has an Alfred. And he is so successful that he is a billionaire who uses his money to help Gotham get better (or as good as we know Gotham can get). Oh and he has a spouse. And children. Plural. So many he lost count. And pets. Two dogs one cat a cow (?) a turkey (a what now?) and a fREAKING DRAGON BAT (WHAT THA FUCK IS EVEN THAT????!?!?????!).      He is also more put together (looks like he showers and doesn‚Äôt skip meals). And less temperamental.     Okay‚Ä¶     Bruce is confused. When he comes back to his universe with a spark of hope in his heart he does his research. He could start actually making effort on his company and thus helping Gotham maybe even be good enough as a vigilant that he could join the Justice League and make some friends (even if the other Bruce was just as stoic he was the only one who could see on his micro expressions while talking about them how fond he was of his colleagues and how much he thrusts them even with his trust issues).      He could find those damn kids and adopt them. Find the one who somehow managed to make him open up enough for a relationship.     (He could also just work on his company philanthropism do some therapy make some new organic connections or whatever).     He is VERY disappointed to find out that some of those so called kids and are already adults have lived their whole lives without him maybe some have been arrested or even dead they have their whole lives and families that have NOTHING to do with him. Some don‚Äôt even exist (the only explanation for not a single clue in months of research). And his partner Reader is either living their own life that doesn‚Äôt allow space for him or also dead. He lost his timing. He is old and lost his timing. He is alone. He shouldn‚Äôt have hoped so much that he got blind by the improbability of the small chance. The other Batman did mention that his family started growing decades ago.      He just lost another family. This one he never got to have. He wishes he never knew about them.     He hyperfocused on them for months for nothing (hey It was hard to find info on the ones that don‚Äôt live a very civilian legal life like Cassandra or the ones that never even existed like Damian or the ones that are dead ‚Äî again maybe Cassandra or perhaps Jason. Maybe Jason joined a gang just for survival or something like that life on the streets is harsh and he is not very lucky. And I‚Äôm not even being specific on what could have happened to every single one of the batfam. Also Tim is probably a CEO right now). No connection and family will come from all of that. Especially because he is greedy starved he doesn‚Äôt want bits and pieces he wants it ALL. He wants that other Bruce‚Äôs life.     Yandere!Batman is born. He drowns and gets drunk on the pit of his own madness and he can‚Äôt get out of it. Doesn‚Äôt want to.     He could‚Ä¶ He could get rid of the people on their lives brainwash them and make them a happy family. They aren‚Äôt vigilantes they don‚Äôt have his abilities they don‚Äôt have his intellect it won‚Äôt be hard.     Of course Batman doesn‚Äôt kill but this Batman is looking for a change.     But they aren‚Äôt what lucky-billionaire-put-together Bruce had.      Don‚Äôt get me wrong. He is not just petty and jealous nor resents Bruce for his privileges and better decisions or whatever.      Okay maybe a little. Why? Just why ones life was perfect (hello? Didn‚Äôt you hear the part where he told you his own problems? Not even about the DEAD RESURRECTED CRIME LORD SON?) while the others had to draw the short stick?     But majorly he is just desperate foaming at the mouth for a happy ending and projected all of that on that poor random bat.      Now enough brooding back to solutions.     He could clone them.     Could work. Not exactly easy but he could just hack onto Luthor archives until he found how he cloned Superman and made that Superboy Superman or whatever he goes by now.      Again not the same as the original ones. The ones he craves. The ones he wants.     Alfred is screaming in his grave about how Bruce please needs to realize that no one will fill the expectations he puts on them not even the ‚Äúoriginal ones‚Äù.     Another hard but better fitted solution is to‚Ä¶ Simply‚Ä¶ Find a way to go to that other universe or one similar enough stalk and study their whole lives until he can perfectly replicate ‚Äúlucky‚Äù Bruce‚Äôs persona and just‚Ä¶ Get rid of him and take his place. Hello Alfred hello honey hello kids daddy‚Äôs home.     Looks like he finally got luck on his side maybe the sun will rise tomorrow.     Yandere!Bruce won‚Äôt just brush aside that he is rusty and definitely not a better Batman then the other one but he‚Äôs got time. He will developt patience. But can he learn enough to trick his perfect vigilant kids though? Is he seriously thinking straight? I mean the batkids are dope though. They learned from the best. As a proud (wannabe) father he knows they will be better than him one day perhaps already are.     How much of watching their lives everything that he craves can he take until he snaps? How much of watching Bruce‚Äôs interactions with them can he take? He swears he won‚Äôt take them for granted when he has them he will take care of them protect them be a family be happy.     Can he really keep his distance?     Looks like another supervillain just arrived in Gotham for the batfamily to battle against he is quite persistent though.              Like comment and reblog ü•∞

post_body: UnTamed Ch.20 -Interlude  Prev | Next   Damian Wayne x OC!Female   <!-- more --> It was as if Asta had forgotten how well Damian could read her. She stood simply unbothered as Tim talked about the gag gift he had gotten for Bruce something to make fun of his age but still thoughtful enough to be considered a gift. On the surface she appeared unbothered laughing along with Tim about the gift but Damian could see that she was anxious and saddened. He however didn‚Äôt know why.    "It is a decent Gift Tim"  ‚ÄúDecent? It‚Äôs hilarious.‚Äù Tim says as he continues to wrap the gift   ‚ÄúYour Gray Ghost memorabilia was more thoughtful."   "Jason‚Äôs Idea. I just chipped in and wrapped it."   "We‚Äôll take our leave. I‚Äôll inform the other to stay out.‚Äù  ‚ÄúDont. Dick will come running in like a sneaky kid.‚Äù Tim said‚Äú I‚Äôd rather not fend off a grown man like a toddler.‚Äù  Asta laughed at that. Despite being the oldest Dick often acted like the youngest of Bruce‚Äôs kids. As endearing as it was it was also annoying.   ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre anxious‚Äù Damian said as they stepped out of the library leaving Tim. ‚Äú Care to tell me why?‚Äù  ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry. I didn‚Äôt mean to project-‚Äù  ‚ÄúYou aren‚Äôt but I can still see it on your face body and silences.‚Äù He takes her hand in his squeezing it gently.‚Äú You‚Äôre unwell.‚Äù  ‚ÄúYou all do a lot of gifts. I swear I counted two dozen under your tree already and you plan to put more down there."   They strolled down the hall stopping in front of a bay window. "Well there are many of us and the things under the tree that aren‚Äôt just random. Some of it is things we need like new gear and weapons that we haven‚Äôt gotten for ourselves yet. Also Father likes to overcompensate for all his wrongdoings throughout the year. What is a gift if not to show how much one cares and pays attention? The perfect gift.‚Äù  Damian smiles as he remembers his father standing at the door trying to get all the packages before any of his children. And his secret trips to the stores. He‚Äôd be damn if the paparazzi spoiled his gifts.   ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt have anything under your tree‚Äù he looked at her and continued ‚Äú I‚Äôm sorry.‚Äù She pulled her hands away. ‚Äú Maybe I should go. Allow your family to have your holiday without me burdening you.‚Äù  ‚ÄúAsta‚Äù  ‚ÄúI can go to your apartment." Your apartment?  "Asta‚Äù  ‚ÄúOr one of the centers to help out. They always need extra hands.‚Äù  ‚ÄúASTA. I want you here. I want to spend Christmas with you. This will be our first Christmas together.‚Äù He takes both her hands in his. ‚ÄúPlease stay?‚Äù  ‚ÄúDAMIAN"   Suddenly her hands are gone and so is she. All that remains is a pile of clothing and the faint buzzing that fades away.   "Hey Damian‚Äù Dick says as he places a hand on his shoulder ‚Äú Where did Asta go?‚Äù  ‚ÄúWhat do you want?‚Äù  Dick put his hands up in surrender at the sound of anger in his voice.   ‚ÄúBruce wants us in the cave. Apparently someone has something played for the holidays; nothing good though.‚Äù  -  Damian was semi-paying attention but most of his thoughts were elsewhere on Asta. The debriefing was long but nonsense. More activities were happening at the docks including drug and weapons trafficking. Black Mask and Penguin were both involved but to which and to what extent was still a debate. They were all to watch the dock and the crime lords.   ‚ÄúMay I speak?‚Äù Damian spoke before anyone could leave; they all groaned but sat back down nonetheless. ‚ÄúI would like for us to tone down our celebration this year. Specifically the gift giving.‚Äù  ‚ÄúNo presents why?‚Äù Stephanie asked in dramatic shock.   ‚ÄúNo I just want it to be toned down. Decrease the amount of gifts. You can pass the off individual on a later day.‚Äù  ‚ÄúWhy?‚Äù Bruce asked confused as the others.   ‚ÄúAsta‚Äù he says softly. ‚Äú She has nothing to give-‚Äù  ‚ÄúThen take her shopping. I‚Äôm sure there is something she can get at the last minute. We don‚Äôt care.‚Äù Tim says offering a solution to the question so he can leave.  ‚Äú This is last minute. Christmas Eve is tomorrow. How did she not know?‚Äù Dick asked. The trees bright lights and Christmas carols  ‚ÄúShe doesn‚Äôt celebrate the holidays. This will be her first official Christmas.‚Äù  ‚ÄúYou‚Äôve known her how long? And this is her first official Christmas. What have you been doing?‚Äù  ‚ÄúShe doesn‚Äôt like receiving gifts when she knows she can‚Äôt give anything in return. I usually bring her a plate of food and blankets and spend the day after Christmas with her.‚Äù Well at least they solved the mystery of the day after Christmas with Damian and extra food with Alfred.   ‚ÄúI still don‚Äôt see you. Just don‚Äôt take her shopping‚Äù Tim says   ‚ÄúShe won‚Äôt take our money to buy us gifts. She won‚Äôt.‚Äù Jason Saw Tim opening his mouth again. ‚Äú She has no money no home hell the clothes currently on her back aren‚Äôt even hers. She already feels like she owes us.‚Äù  ‚ÄúShe doesn‚Äôt -‚Äù  ‚ÄúBut she does. That‚Äôs why she‚Äôs constantly helping Alfred always cleaning or tucking herself into the smallest corner or in Damian‚Äôs room when she can‚Äôt. You can take someone from nothing from the streets and expect them not to feel suspicious or like they owe you. On the streets everything is an exchange.‚Äù  Jason knows this. Jason lived this. He had been in her shoes at one point. He constantly worked and was on his best behavior just to stay in this manner fearing every action would have consequences. It wasn‚Äôt until his adoption that the fear disappeared. That he thought himself worth.   ‚ÄúI bet she saw a present or more with her name on it. The idea of presents won‚Äôt upset her but for her specifically and she had nothing to return. Yeah that would be upsetting.‚Äù It was moments like these where the family was reminded that Jason himself had spent time on their streets and that Jason himself had at one point been homeless. While Jason often took pride in being from Crime Alley he never really spoke of his time in its cold.   ‚ÄúNo gifts?‚Äù Cassandra asked   ‚ÄúTwo gifts each‚Äù was still a considerably large number‚Äú and all the gifts with Asta‚Äôs name on them should be removed. You can all exchange your other gifts at a later date.‚Äù Bruce gave the order and everyone began to move.  ‚ÄúJason‚Äù Damian called for him to stay back. The others left and Bruce stayed to work on the computer eavesdrop. ‚Äú Your gift can stay under the tree. It‚Äôs the one thing I know she‚Äôll appreciate.  -  Early Christmas morning   3 am   She was jealous you Damian could sleep so peacefully while she couldn‚Äôt even close her eyes. She lay awake listening to the silences and watching time go by. Eventually she could not take anymore so she shifted into a serpent and slipped from Damian‚Äôs hold slithering to the door and underneath. She turned human in the hall and made her way to the nearest window. Cracking it home she slipped out and took flight as a snow owl. Hoping the clouds would clear her mind.   Hours later Asta returns. Upon her return she finds the kitchen light on. Being polite she knocks on the kitchen door before opening it and sticks her head in it.   ‚Äù It‚Äôs a bit early and cold to be outside no?‚Äú Alfred asked as he looked at the clock hanging on the wall which read 6:17 am.  "I couldn‚Äôt sleep so I took a flight‚Äù Asta said as she stepped into the kitchen closing the door tightly behind her and stopping the cold from getting in. ‚ÄúWhat are you doing up so early? "   "Cooking‚Äù Alfred said as he pulled more ingredients out of the fridge.   ‚ÄúDo they have an early morning?‚Äù she stepped to the counter seeing everything splayed about.  ‚ÄúNo but it is Christmas and dinner tends to be more special during the holidays so more prep and time is needed. Plus Breakfast and Lunch in between.‚Äù Alfred explained as he checked one of the ovens that held the Ham.   ‚ÄúDo you do this all by yourself?‚Äù she asked as she found a bookmarked with dozens of recipes on the counter.   ‚ÄúJason will assist with after breakfast." Jason was the only other person Alfred trusted in the kitchen. He had no bad history of burning or breaking anything. But he also needed his rest after patrolling so he only accepted assistance after breakfast giving him time to rest.   "Can I help?‚Äù Asta asked shyly. ‚ÄúI would ‚Ä¶ I would like to help you make your family dinner.‚Äù After all they had given and done for her it was the least she could do. She could never give them gifts but the least she could make their family dinner. Gift them a warm meal just like Damian had for her every year since.   ‚ÄúOur family‚Äù she looked at him confused. ‚Äú Our family dinner." Alfred pulls out something from a drawer and hands it to her. It is a long dark blue apron dress. It is then Asta remembers that she is naked. Before she can even apologize Alfred shakes his head (Damian has already explained her displeasure with clothes. And while he understands he will not allow her to cook in the nude).  ‚Äù You can start with the chopping.‚Äú a cutting board and knife were placed on the counter.   "Thank you‚Äù it was a load of thanks but they weren‚Äôt going to unpack. He knew what she meant and what she was grateful for. He knew. He always knew.

post_body: Just a concept Yandere!Dimensional traveler!Batman X Gn!reader X Platonic!Batfam also wrote a one shot about this     Synopsis: Batman becomes obsessed with a spouse and kids that he never had.     Pairing: Yandere!Dimensional traveler!Batman X Reader; Batman X Reader; Platonic Batfam X Batparent!Reader; Yandere!Batman X Platonic!Batfam; Batman X Platonic!Batfam   Tw: English is not my first language; mentions of Alfred being dead; I‚Äôm quite new on the fandom so there might be some mistakes about facts of the original comics but this is a fanfic so whatever; this piece is more focused on Bruce and the batfam while still mentioning reader; stalker and delusional Bruce.  Word count: 14k  Requested? No.  General masterlist         Yandere!Batman who is very VERY extremely lonely touch starved and grim. He‚Äôs also very unlucky apparently.     <!-- more --> He never even met Dick. Sure he heard about what happened to The Flying Graysons investigated it even but he‚Äôs only seem him on pictures videos or in passing but he wasn‚Äôt there that night he never talked to him or maybe he did while stopping him from killing Zuko either way never adopted him our boy went straight to orphanage and was adopted shortly after by a normal and loving family.     Actually this universe‚Äôs Bruce never met nor connected with ANY of his children all he had was Alfred and yet‚Ä¶ Something happened and‚Ä¶     Safe to say it‚Äôs been long never ending harsh years.     The only thing this Bruce knows is pain loneliness and misery. Don‚Äôt talk to him about Alfred. Maybe he can‚Äôt even look at pictures. When he realized he couldn‚Äôt remember his voice anymore‚Ä¶ He WON‚ÄôT watch videos or listen to audio of him. Yes Alfred being gone was one more trauma to the list of traumas he will carry on his tense and burdened shoulders for the rest of his helpless existence.     This Bruce is a loser closer to madness than any version of Bruce (aside from Batman who laughs). His Gotham is nearing it‚Äôs doom. He didn‚Äôt join the Justice League because of his level of emotional masochism pride and lack of will to get back on his feet. He is so used to suffering he thinks it‚Äôs possible to die if he doesn‚Äôt have such bitter companion. Safe to say he is depressed. And hyperfocused on saving a city he‚Äôs been working in for decades too blind by his grieving to see that he is not doing the right things. There is no social projects on Wayne Enterprises or Wayne Foundation to help people he neglected the company decades ago. He is almost becoming Michael Keaton‚Äôs Batman in The Flash.     Somehow one day he is sent to another universe. It can be through some disaster like Crisis in Infinite Earths or some villain who wanted different variants of heros to fight amongst themselves to death doesn‚Äôt really matter here what‚Äôs important is that he (after years of being a hermit on his cave) interacts with people more specifically he interacts with himself.     Or definitely a lucky version of himself. Maybe the luckiest. He is jealous.     During the whole event they interact and imagine how he felt when he found out that this other Batman has an Alfred. And he is so successful that he is a billionaire who uses his money to help Gotham get better (or as good as we know Gotham can get). Oh and he has a spouse. And children. Plural. So many he lost count. And pets. Two dogs one cat a cow (?) a turkey (a what now?) and a fREAKING DRAGON BAT (WHAT THA FUCK IS EVEN THAT????!?!?????!).      He is also more put together (looks like he showers and doesn‚Äôt skip meals). And less temperamental.     Okay‚Ä¶     Bruce is confused. When he comes back to his universe with a spark of hope in his heart he does his research. He could start actually making effort on his company and thus helping Gotham maybe even be good enough as a vigilant that he could join the Justice League and make some friends (even if the other Bruce was just as stoic he was the only one who could see on his micro expressions while talking about them how fond he was of his colleagues and how much he thrusts them even with his trust issues).      He could find those damn kids and adopt them. Find the one who somehow managed to make him open up enough for a relationship.     (He could also just work on his company philanthropism do some therapy make some new organic connections or whatever).     He is VERY disappointed to find out that some of those so called kids and are already adults have lived their whole lives without him maybe some have been arrested or even dead they have their whole lives and families that have NOTHING to do with him. Some don‚Äôt even exist (the only explanation for not a single clue in months of research). And his partner Reader is either living their own life that doesn‚Äôt allow space for him or also dead. He lost his timing. He is old and lost his timing. He is alone. He shouldn‚Äôt have hoped so much that he got blind by the improbability of the small chance. The other Batman did mention that his family started growing decades ago.      He just lost another family. This one he never got to have. He wishes he never knew about them.     He hyperfocused on them for months for nothing (hey It was hard to find info on the ones that don‚Äôt live a very civilian legal life like Cassandra or the ones that never even existed like Damian or the ones that are dead ‚Äî again maybe Cassandra or perhaps Jason. Maybe Jason joined a gang just for survival or something like that life on the streets is harsh and he is not very lucky. And I‚Äôm not even being specific on what could have happened to every single one of the batfam. Also Tim is probably a CEO right now). No connection and family will come from all of that. Especially because he is greedy starved he doesn‚Äôt want bits and pieces he wants it ALL. He wants that other Bruce‚Äôs life.     Yandere!Batman is born. He drowns and gets drunk on the pit of his own madness and he can‚Äôt get out of it. Doesn‚Äôt want to.     He could‚Ä¶ He could get rid of the people on their lives brainwash them and make them a happy family. They aren‚Äôt vigilantes they don‚Äôt have his abilities they don‚Äôt have his intellect it won‚Äôt be hard.     Of course Batman doesn‚Äôt kill but this Batman is looking for a change.     But they aren‚Äôt what lucky-billionaire-put-together Bruce had.      Don‚Äôt get me wrong. He is not just petty and jealous nor resents Bruce for his privileges and better decisions or whatever.      Okay maybe a little. Why? Just why ones life was perfect (hello? Didn‚Äôt you hear the part where he told you his own problems? Not even about the DEAD RESURRECTED CRIME LORD SON?) while the others had to draw the short stick?     But majorly he is just desperate foaming at the mouth for a happy ending and projected all of that on that poor random bat.      Now enough brooding back to solutions.     He could clone them.     Could work. Not exactly easy but he could just hack onto Luthor archives until he found how he cloned Superman and made that Superboy Superman or whatever he goes by now.      Again not the same as the original ones. The ones he craves. The ones he wants.     Alfred is screaming in his grave about how Bruce please needs to realize that no one will fill the expectations he puts on them not even the ‚Äúoriginal ones‚Äù.     Another hard but better fitted solution is to‚Ä¶ Simply‚Ä¶ Find a way to go to that other universe or one similar enough stalk and study their whole lives until he can perfectly replicate ‚Äúlucky‚Äù Bruce‚Äôs persona and just‚Ä¶ Get rid of him and take his place. Hello Alfred hello honey hello kids daddy‚Äôs home.     Looks like he finally got luck on his side maybe the sun will rise tomorrow.     Yandere!Bruce won‚Äôt just brush aside that he is rusty and definitely not a better Batman then the other one but he‚Äôs got time. He will developt patience. But can he learn enough to trick his perfect vigilant kids though? Is he seriously thinking straight? I mean the batkids are dope though. They learned from the best. As a proud (wannabe) father he knows they will be better than him one day perhaps already are.     How much of watching their lives everything that he craves can he take until he snaps? How much of watching Bruce‚Äôs interactions with them can he take? He swears he won‚Äôt take them for granted when he has them he will take care of them protect them be a family be happy.     Can he really keep his distance?     Looks like another supervillain just arrived in Gotham for the batfamily to battle against he is quite persistent though. post_body: it‚Äôs time to talk at length about batman comics again:  the frustrating thing about the 2011 dc reboot is that it stalled a lot of character development and tim drake in particular never got back up to speed afterwards. so this is my vision for a tim series jumping off the end of red robin and ignoring the reboot:  the skill tim is pushed to develop through RR is the thousand-foot structural view of gotham and the xanatos gambit. he can‚Äôt handle things one by one (see: his catastrophic failure trying that with the general at the end of robin 93) he has to build and execute a master plan that will make dominos fall where he wants. emotionally this isn‚Äôt always great for tim because the lonely paranoiac batman deal that he has a real talent for is bad for him and he knows it. he needs other people! by RR 12 he‚Äôs hit an interesting inflection point: he wins against ra‚Äôs by pulling off a rube goldberg domino move that can only be executed through the power of friendship on the emotional end.  so if we start there and build off that: there‚Äôs something compelling about a tim series where the push-pull is between overcomplicated gambits/blunt force on the plot end and tim‚Äôs thousand-foot-view paranoia/his power of actually having friends.  there are so many conspiracies and masterminds he could wiggle his way into (the unternet the covenant of ka) and if we‚Äôre not rebooting continuity he has so many personal connections full of friction: ra‚Äôs and shiva keep trying to recruit or kill him; huntress can threaten him into getting his GED; i am the only person on earth who remembers ali ben khadir and will keep bringing him up forever; but most importantly and the real reason i made this post: i really really want a tim drake-sebastian ives-lonnie machin love triangle.  ives tim‚Äôs old high school bestie thinks tim is a complete flake and kind of cringe for dropping out of high school. lonnie/anarky tim‚Äôs former nemesis current sometimes-ally thinks tim could make something of himself if he actually listened to lonnie‚Äôs political arguments. (he‚Äôs also secretly rebuilding the unternet.) tim is trying to reconnect with his old friend while trying to assist/thwart his new frenemy. listen to me i am speaking directly in your ear. lonnie-tim-ives is the funniest option and therefore the correct option.  ALTALT

The Bat and her Cardinal (introduction) The red bat on Terry‚Äôs chest was the symbol of a legend a legacy that he wasn‚Äôt sure if he deserved. Maybe he was still that punk kid who didn‚Äôt even know if he was gonna make it through high school. Yet here he was a gargoyle on a skyscraper. Neo-Gotham was a multicolored maze from his perch. Everything had happened so fast. Somehow the metropolis below him had become his responsibility. Somehow he was here and he was Batman.  ‚ÄúWho are you?‚Äù He hadn‚Äôt heard anyone else on the rooftop until she spoke but the deep voice came from directly behind. It was sudden and curt. Part of him was terrified.  Terry whirled around. He first saw the bright yellow bat on her chest. The suit itself was almost identical to his despite the change in color although a midnight cape waved from her shoulders blotting out the bright lights of the city. He had heard of her. He wasn‚Äôt sure she was real. Granted the fact that Terry was wearing his own batsuit should have probably clued him in.  ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre the Bat‚Äù Terry said. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre real.‚Äù  ‚ÄúWho are you?‚Äù she barked. ‚ÄúHow did you get Cardinal‚Äôs suit?‚Äù  ‚ÄúWho?‚Äù  ‚ÄúWho are you?!‚Äù she snapped.  He shifted back slightly at her sharp words a knot forming in his throat.  Suddenly Mr. Wayne‚Äôs voice rang through his ears ‚ÄúTell her that Bruce Wayne gave you the suit.‚Äù  ‚ÄúWhat?‚Äù Terry whispered. ‚ÄúYou can‚Äôt be serious.‚Äù  ‚ÄúI need you to trust me McGinnis. Trust that I trust her.‚Äù  Terry cleared his throat slightly. ‚ÄúUh okay um Bruce Wayne gave the suit to me.‚Äù  ‚ÄúWhat?‚Äù The Bat looked off as though in thought. ‚ÄúBruce gave it to him.‚Äù She paused. ‚ÄúYou think I know?‚Äù Her eyes narrowed. ‚ÄúCardinal?‚Äù Her gaze snapped back to Terry trapping his eyes in hers. ‚ÄúGive back the suit and leave this alone. This is not your city or business.‚Äù She turned her back to him ready to leave.  ‚ÄúWhat about Derek Powers?‚Äù Terry asked. ‚ÄúIs he your business? Because last I checked you aren‚Äôt doing anything about him.‚Äù  ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs complicated.‚Äù  ‚ÄúHow?‚Äù  She whirled around her cape whipping in the wind her presence towering over Terry. ‚ÄúYou are a child in a broken suit that Bruce should have never let leave the cave. Go home. Live.‚Äù  She was gone before he could reply a bat in the winds of Neo-Gotham. She was gone and Terry was left alone on the quiet rooftop.  After an eternity of silence Terry finally spoke ‚ÄúMr. Wayne should I come back to the cave?‚Äù There was no response. ‚ÄúMr. Wayne?‚Äù

post_body: I‚Äôm so confused   why do people suddenly think Cass doesn‚Äôt want to be Batman? She‚Äôs been ALL IN since day one. She‚Äôs shown the most interest of any of Bruce‚Äôs kids and IS Batman in one future.   idk if they retconned that in the‚Ä¶not even reboot. Whatever we‚Äôre calling it. But her and Damian are the two that are into it and I‚Äôd argue Damian was basically groomed to want to inherit the mantle. I think left to his own devices he‚Äôd probably want something different. He seems to thrive when he can be his own person.   I know everyone including DC staff hyper focus on how Tim or Damian are mini Bruce‚Äôs and that‚Äôs not wrong but so is Cass. Just in a different way but she‚Äôs by far more married to Bruce‚Äôs ideals and morals than anyone else and she was already thinking that way before she even met the bat family. She really is his natural successor.   I know it‚Äôs not easy to see what with writers not knowing what to do with a female character that isn‚Äôt there to be sexy or manic pixie dreamgirl but I‚Äôd recommend looking at her old run. It‚Äôs got problems too but I think her character is fleshed out MUCH better. Some of it doesn‚Äôt hold up (like ‚Äúfixing‚Äù her disability etc.) but skimming for moments of characterization and back story and specifically her feelings about what Batman represents really makes it clear she‚Äôs Bruce‚Äôs successor if Batman has one.   For all we know mainline Bruce Batman might live forever *coughcough*  Edit: Sparrow brought up a great scene in the tags where Cass is professing her affinity for the Batman symbol-everything the bat represents-not Bruce or Babs specifically (they have a whole stupid conflict in the og run that I hate but the point is Cass is interested in making a positive difference not being loyal to a person).  Also she‚Äôs been a daddy‚Äôs girl since the moment they met let‚Äôs be real. Bruce is such a girl dad too.

post_body: Batman: Wayne Family Adventures chapter #119 ARG! Ok this might have spoilers so be careful if you haven‚Äôt read the chapter yet.  I won‚Äôt do these kind of post to often but when reading this chapter urgh.  Hi everyone  Sorry I am late to the game so here are my thoughts on the latest chapter. ^.^  Un-constructive thoughts:  ARRRRRGHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!! This chapter Oh My God!!!!!!!!! So much drama!!!!!! (*cries of anguish*)  I can already tell that the next few chapters are going to have my heart smashed!!!!!  First of all yay Duke is ok (he is still alive) but good grief he is hurting bad!  But I want to redirect to the main issue here: Bruce‚Ä¶. let the kids and Barbara help!!! Even if it‚Äôs recon on finding the location of Joker!!!!!  Kids! Don‚Äôt do anything crazy!!  Jason!!! Don‚Äôt do anything crazy!!!! I know you‚Äôre the loose cannon and that doesn‚Äôt follow the rules but don‚Äôt go off by yourself!!!!! Especially with Joker running around!!!!  Now more constructive thoughts:  These are idle thoughts that immediately came to mind when I read the chapter so I can be wrong and this is me trying to organize my thoughts. I can be wrong about this so please don‚Äôt take this too seriously please.  One thing that Tim brought up how the frick did Joker escape Arkham without setting off the alarms? Joker‚Äôs MO is normally a parade of chaos out the front door. He wants Bats to know he is out and chaos is raining down upon Gotham. Joker is not a quiet villain.  A few thoughts have come to mind:  Joker had a inside man letting him loose. This was a planned escape by an outside 3 party to distract Batman This may be a fake or decoy Joker. These are just a few thoughts that have come to mind I have been watching videos of Joker lately and one of the clips I‚Äôve seen that Joker has his own sidekick that is going to take the mantle of Joker (I am talking about Batman the Brave and the Bold).  We haven‚Äôt seen the design of Joker in this series so I am leaning more on 1. He had an inside man to get him out of there quietly.  This could be a henchman or he could have something on one of the doctors or guards.

I remember a year or two ago I broke down sobbing in my therapist‚Äôs office because I kept trying to explain that my parents were good people even though they failed to protect me and she just kinda looked at me and said ‚Äúwho are you trying to convince?‚Äù  Yeah I think that‚Äôs what Tim‚Äôs relationship with his parents is like. He loves them so much and on an average day it doesn‚Äôt matter to him that they weren‚Äôt great parents or weren‚Äôt what he needed. But then he catches himself trying to prove that they were good because he loves them so they must be and it‚Äôs just never going to be a convincing argument. He‚Äôs never gonna be able to prove they were good people or even just good parents because the caveat of what they did will always be there

post_body: anyway have any of us thought about bruce wayne barely 26 getting injured as batman for the first time.   his comm is shattered he‚Äôs so tired and his muscles are screaming. there‚Äôs a stab wound weeping at his side where he didn‚Äôt realize there was a weak point in his armor. he just bites back tears as he limps into an alley to catch his breath.   he‚Äôs so tired. he wants to go home. he wants Alfred. he‚Äôs in so much pain and more scared than he‚Äôs willing to admit.   because yes he is The Batman but he‚Äôs also twenty something years old and some days this job feels like a losing battle and if his parents were here they‚Äôd know what to do   but they‚Äôre not.  so he sniffles. wipes his face. stands back up.

post_body: it‚Äôs time to talk at length about batman comics again:  the frustrating thing about the 2011 dc reboot is that it stalled a lot of character development and tim drake in particular never got back up to speed afterwards. so this is my vision for a tim series jumping off the end of red robin and ignoring the reboot:  the skill tim is pushed to develop through RR is the thousand-foot structural view of gotham and the xanatos gambit. he can‚Äôt handle things one by one (see: his catastrophic failure trying that with the general at the end of robin 93) he has to build and execute a master plan that will make dominos fall where he wants. emotionally this isn‚Äôt always great for tim because the lonely paranoiac batman deal that he has a real talent for is bad for him and he knows it. he needs other people! by RR 12 he‚Äôs hit an interesting inflection point: he wins against ra‚Äôs by pulling off a rube goldberg domino move that can only be executed through the power of friendship on the emotional end.  so if we start there and build off that: there‚Äôs something compelling about a tim series where the push-pull is between overcomplicated gambits/blunt force on the plot end and tim‚Äôs thousand-foot-view paranoia/his power of actually having friends.  there are so many conspiracies and masterminds he could wiggle his way into (the unternet the covenant of ka) and if we‚Äôre not rebooting continuity he has so many personal connections full of friction: ra‚Äôs and shiva keep trying to recruit or kill him; huntress can threaten him into getting his GED; i am the only person on earth who remembers ali ben khadir and will keep bringing him up forever; but most importantly and the real reason i made this post: i really really want a tim drake-sebastian ives-lonnie machin love triangle.  ives tim‚Äôs old high school bestie thinks tim is a complete flake and kind of cringe for dropping out of high school. lonnie/anarky tim‚Äôs former nemesis current sometimes-ally thinks tim could make something of himself if he actually listened to lonnie‚Äôs political arguments. (he‚Äôs also secretly rebuilding the unternet.) tim is trying to reconnect with his old friend while trying to assist/thwart his new frenemy. listen to me i am speaking directly in your ear. lonnie-tim-ives is the funniest option and therefore the correct option.  ALTALT

The Bat and her Cardinal (introduction) The red bat on Terry‚Äôs chest was the symbol of a legend a legacy that he wasn‚Äôt sure if he deserved. Maybe he was still that punk kid who didn‚Äôt even know if he was gonna make it through high school. Yet here he was a gargoyle on a skyscraper. Neo-Gotham was a multicolored maze from his perch. Everything had happened so fast. Somehow the metropolis below him had become his responsibility. Somehow he was here and he was Batman.  ‚ÄúWho are you?‚Äù He hadn‚Äôt heard anyone else on the rooftop until she spoke but the deep voice came from directly behind. It was sudden and curt. Part of him was terrified.  Terry whirled around. He first saw the bright yellow bat on her chest. The suit itself was almost identical to his despite the change in color although a midnight cape waved from her shoulders blotting out the bright lights of the city. He had heard of her. He wasn‚Äôt sure she was real. Granted the fact that Terry was wearing his own batsuit should have probably clued him in.  ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre the Bat‚Äù Terry said. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre real.‚Äù  ‚ÄúWho are you?‚Äù she barked. ‚ÄúHow did you get Cardinal‚Äôs suit?‚Äù  ‚ÄúWho?‚Äù  ‚ÄúWho are you?!‚Äù she snapped.  He shifted back slightly at her sharp words a knot forming in his throat.  Suddenly Mr. Wayne‚Äôs voice rang through his ears ‚ÄúTell her that Bruce Wayne gave you the suit.‚Äù  ‚ÄúWhat?‚Äù Terry whispered. ‚ÄúYou can‚Äôt be serious.‚Äù  ‚ÄúI need you to trust me McGinnis. Trust that I trust her.‚Äù  Terry cleared his throat slightly. ‚ÄúUh okay um Bruce Wayne gave the suit to me.‚Äù  ‚ÄúWhat?‚Äù The Bat looked off as though in thought. ‚ÄúBruce gave it to him.‚Äù She paused. ‚ÄúYou think I know?‚Äù Her eyes narrowed. ‚ÄúCardinal?‚Äù Her gaze snapped back to Terry trapping his eyes in hers. ‚ÄúGive back the suit and leave this alone. This is not your city or business.‚Äù She turned her back to him ready to leave.  ‚ÄúWhat about Derek Powers?‚Äù Terry asked. ‚ÄúIs he your business? Because last I checked you aren‚Äôt doing anything about him.‚Äù  ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs complicated.‚Äù  ‚ÄúHow?‚Äù  She whirled around her cape whipping in the wind her presence towering over Terry. ‚ÄúYou are a child in a broken suit that Bruce should have never let leave the cave. Go home. Live.‚Äù  She was gone before he could reply a bat in the winds of Neo-Gotham. She was gone and Terry was left alone on the quiet rooftop.  After an eternity of silence Terry finally spoke ‚ÄúMr. Wayne should I come back to the cave?‚Äù There was no response. ‚ÄúMr. Wayne?‚Äù

post_body: I‚Äôm so confused   why do people suddenly think Cass doesn‚Äôt want to be Batman? She‚Äôs been ALL IN since day one. She‚Äôs shown the most interest of any of Bruce‚Äôs kids and IS Batman in one future.   idk if they retconned that in the‚Ä¶not even reboot. Whatever we‚Äôre calling it. But her and Damian are the two that are into it and I‚Äôd argue Damian was basically groomed to want to inherit the mantle. I think left to his own devices he‚Äôd probably want something different. He seems to thrive when he can be his own person.   I know everyone including DC staff hyper focus on how Tim or Damian are mini Bruce‚Äôs and that‚Äôs not wrong but so is Cass. Just in a different way but she‚Äôs by far more married to Bruce‚Äôs ideals and morals than anyone else and she was already thinking that way before she even met the bat family. She really is his natural successor.   I know it‚Äôs not easy to see what with writers not knowing what to do with a female character that isn‚Äôt there to be sexy or manic pixie dreamgirl but I‚Äôd recommend looking at her old run. It‚Äôs got problems too but I think her character is fleshed out MUCH better. Some of it doesn‚Äôt hold up (like ‚Äúfixing‚Äù her disability etc.) but skimming for moments of characterization and back story and specifically her feelings about what Batman represents really makes it clear she‚Äôs Bruce‚Äôs successor if Batman has one.   For all we know mainline Bruce Batman might live forever *coughcough*  Edit: Sparrow brought up a great scene in the tags where Cass is professing her affinity for the Batman symbol-everything the bat represents-not Bruce or Babs specifically (they have a whole stupid conflict in the og run that I hate but the point is Cass is interested in making a positive difference not being loyal to a person).  Also she‚Äôs been a daddy‚Äôs girl since the moment they met let‚Äôs be real. Bruce is such a girl dad too.

Bruh not people on twitter calling batjokes shippers disgusting freaks. Are most of them not like‚Ä¶first world gen z or what? Why do they talk like boomers in puritan culture? My old ass is so confused.   In my country we ship whatever the hell we want because they are not real. No one cares if said characters are the most horrible human being. But calling people names over their ship preference is so childish and such an unhinged behavior.   And just slightly over a decade ago people would ship the most crack ships possible across all fandoms and nobody batted an eye. Why is it so hard now? What happens to some younger people that make them so rigid and protective over something that aren‚Äôt even real?  Sometimes I feel like fandom culture has changed into a mean girl club or something. People are so mean but at the same time so‚Ä¶basic? They react way too strongly towards things they deem not within their comfort zone or preferences. It‚Äôs getting ridiculous.

secondary_tags: ['danny phantom'  'dc x dp'  'dpxdc'  'flash'  'giw'  'good!giw'  'good fenton parents'  'jazz fenton'  'valerie gray'  'dan phantom'  'danielle phantom'  'sam manson'  'justice league'  "i'm having f u n with this au now"  'they are a better team than jl and tgey take great pride in shoving the fact in their faces'  'cork writes'  'cork prompts']
post_body: DPxDC Multiverse Police (pt. 2) ‚ÄúYou said you‚Äôre going to ask questions then can we ask questions?‚Äù Superman really tries to be polite here because first he was raised by Kents and second Jazz and the whole interdimensional police thing looks non-hostile. At least now.   The redhead nods ‚ÄúSure ask away I‚Äôll answer everything I can.‚Äù Then she notices Batman reaching to touch the green shield and makes a soft warning noise ‚ÄúAh sorry please don‚Äôt touch it. I can show how it works later but it‚Äôs not meant to keep you out. It‚Äôs to keep everything else in.‚Äù  Batman reluctantly puts his head down and turns to her.   ‚ÄúElaborate.‚Äù  The sci-fi ship in the air makes a loud hissing sound like compressed air being released and the bottom part of it slides open. Jazz nods in the direction of the now open ship.   ‚ÄúYou know what they say it‚Äôs better to see it once than to hear it ten times.‚Äù  There are three humanoid figures standing in there. All of them are mostly monochrome black and white clothes starkling white hair. They look like one adult and two children but it‚Äôs one of the kids who raises his hands to his mouth and yells so loud everyone in three miles radius is able to hear him:  ‚ÄúStep away from the shield please shit‚Äôs about to get real!‚Äù   None of the heroes move but Jazz does take a few steps away. Wonder Woman after a moment of hesitation follows her example.   A mechanical voice comes from the ship itself ‚ÄúCountdown to the breach. Five‚Ä¶ Four‚Ä¶‚Äù  On ‚Äòthree‚Äô all three of the monochrome figures step out from the ship. But before any of the heroes have time to worry they all float in the air undeterred by gravity and the ship door closes behind them.   The countdown reaches 'one‚Äô. And in the next moment it looks like the hell breaks loose.   Countless giant vines shoot out from the portal up reaching for the ship. True to what the red hoverboarder said they are very much toothy every vine splitting in two and attempting to bite the ship like some twisted idea of scissors.   None of them reach it.   The oldest of three kids claps his hands and a wall of raging fire descends on the vines throwing them off. In the next moment the trio falls apart flying through the lovecraftian mess of carnivorous plants with practiced ease the younger ones using what looks like icicles and little storms.   ‚ÄúWho are they?‚Äù Batman asks Jazz following the youngest one‚Äôs - the only girl among the three - movements as she creates a strong gust of wind with a wave of her hand. None of the vines or attacks get past the shield though.   ‚ÄúMy siblings‚Äù the girl answers pointing her hand at the oldest one ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs Dan. He‚Äôs the most violent. One time he destroyed our original world but that timeline doesn‚Äôt exist anymore.‚Äù She then points to the girl ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs Dani the youngest. She rarely joins the crew lately. And she is actually a clone but at this point most of us have been cloned once or twice so it‚Äôs not a big deal anymore.‚Äù She then points her finger to the last one a boy that flies past them quicker than a lightning freezing everything he touches ‚ÄúAnd this is Danny. He is the most powerful one. Technically he could have just ended the fight with one Wail but kids like to have fun. Also they don‚Äôt get to show off their elemental powers a lot so they are mostly being dramatic for you.‚Äù  She says all this so easily just like a matter of fact and it is at this moment that the members of JL realize the sheer power of whoever these people are. When she casually told them she bested Superman it could have been written as a coincidence a joke. But this?  Dan growls as one of the vines scratches his shoulder. He bleeds green but it‚Äôs only for a second before both the wound and the suit knit themselves back together. This is not just a simple accelerated healing it almost looks like a miracle.   ‚ÄúOi brats I‚Äôm done with show off get out of the way!‚Äù He yells at the other two and Danny and Dani quickly follow the order flying closer to him and behind his back.   ‚ÄúCover your ears‚Äù Jazz tells the heroes around her and puts her helmet back on as Dan takes a deep breath and screams.   It hurts even those who follow Jazz‚Äôs advice. Batman feels like his eardrums are about to be shattered for the lack of better word. But the vines like the sonic attack even less - most of them subdue and pull back inside the portal and the rest is dissipating like they are being burned from the inside out.   And then just like it began the scream - the wail - stops. The silence feels deafening after the end of it but slowly the sounds return and the JL watches Danny flying down to the center of the portal. He puts his hands on the surface of it and for a long moment nothing happens.   And then the Pit starts closing up.   Or no it is Danny who absorbs it the green flowing up through his hands his veins that start glowing the same green. His eyes become the same toxic color with no whites and no irises just glowing green all over and his hair shimmers like stars.   A few minutes later the portal is gone like it never even existed and Danny plants his feet on the ground and stretches like one would do after a good rest.   ‚ÄúOof that was nice!‚Äù He turns to the other two who are still up in the air ‚ÄúDo you want some?‚Äù   Dan flips him off before going back to the ship but Dani floats down to him and extends her hands out.   ‚ÄúSure. I like getting it from you better than from the portal itself anyway. Gives it a sparkling taste like Sprite‚Äù she chuckles. Danny takes her hands in his and the green glow slowly makes its way through their joined palms now flowing through the girl‚Äôs body.   ‚ÄúWhat are they?‚Äù Flash whispers horrified but Jazz hears it nonetheless and turns her head to him taking her helmet off once again.   ‚ÄúThat is not a very appropriate question‚Äù she chastises and smiles at their faces ‚ÄúBut it‚Äôs okay I get it. They are ghosts. Or ectoplasmic entities or halfas or highly liminal beings. Or if you want a very simplified version they are dead kids who are enjoying their afterlife a little too much.‚Äù  ‚ÄúDead?‚Äù Batman zeros on the word snapping his eyes at the girl. She smiles and for the first time it doesn‚Äôt look human. Her teeth are too sharp her grin too wide and her eyes are suddenly not just teal but neon bright and glowing with vertical irises.   ‚ÄúMost of us are dead in one way or another. And I do not mean it in a metaphorical sense.‚Äù  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî-  What I‚Äôm thinking is they have a whole system going on. Amity Park generally resides in the Realms but from time to time they decide they want to go on a vacation as a whole town and they pop into existence on one of the Earths. They don‚Äôt really care for the universe or dimension they end up in as long as it is more or less peaceful (as in no active wars going on right where they pop up) has sunlight and nice weather.   The GIW is taking care of legal things - imagine US government reaction when a whole ass town just boom starts existing in a place where nothing existed before? So GIW does all the paperwork and discussions. Also they are doing their basic research on the dimension they end up in for science purposes.   I‚Äôm thinking Vlad is still a mayor of Amity. And sometimes when a particular dimension is rather annoying he straight up possesses the authorities because he hates official talks and couldn‚Äôt care less for morals if he tried for a week. The GIW scolds him but don‚Äôt really say no. It‚Äôs not a good solution to the problem but hey it works.  Meanwhile Fentons are doing ectoplasmic research. They scan the dimension for troubles basically looking for natural portals and ghosts causing ruckus. Jazz is almost always the one who does the talking to the heroes native to the dimension - she is the one who has the most patience and social skills. Jack is in charge of transportation and Maddie is the head of biological ecto-biological and other species research. Tucker is the tech specialist of course - he is the sole reason why Amity has wi-fi wherever they go. Val and her father are kind of protectors? Security? But for the whole town yeah. They do have GIW agents as subordinates.   Dani is not always living in Amity she travels the Realms most of the time but she joins when something interesting happens. Dan is like on an eternal probation period GIW and Fentons keep an eye on him but he is one of the heavy hitters for when shit goes down.   Danny is living his best life he is mainly the protector spirit of Amity but he also gets to protect all the dimensions from ghosts! He helps anyone and everyone - one day he is working with Val on defenses for their main ship they use to travel inside dimensions and the next day he is joining Maddie in her studies of new species found.   Oh I forgot Sam. She is probably the one responsible for the magic stuff - mostly everyone else focuses on scientific aspects but she is the one to research on occult things.      |  |

post_body: DPxDC Multiverse Police (pt. 2) ‚ÄúYou said you‚Äôre going to ask questions then can we ask questions?‚Äù Superman really tries to be polite here because first he was raised by Kents and second Jazz and the whole interdimensional police thing looks non-hostile. At least now.   The redhead nods ‚ÄúSure ask away I‚Äôll answer everything I can.‚Äù Then she notices Batman reaching to touch the green shield and makes a soft warning noise ‚ÄúAh sorry please don‚Äôt touch it. I can show how it works later but it‚Äôs not meant to keep you out. It‚Äôs to keep everything else in.‚Äù  Batman reluctantly puts his head down and turns to her.   ‚ÄúElaborate.‚Äù  The sci-fi ship in the air makes a loud hissing sound like compressed air being released and the bottom part of it slides open. Jazz nods in the direction of the now open ship.   ‚ÄúYou know what they say it‚Äôs better to see it once than to hear it ten times.‚Äù  There are three humanoid figures standing in there. All of them are mostly monochrome black and white clothes starkling white hair. They look like one adult and two children but it‚Äôs one of the kids who raises his hands to his mouth and yells so loud everyone in three miles radius is able to hear him:  ‚ÄúStep away from the shield please shit‚Äôs about to get real!‚Äù   None of the heroes move but Jazz does take a few steps away. Wonder Woman after a moment of hesitation follows her example.   A mechanical voice comes from the ship itself ‚ÄúCountdown to the breach. Five‚Ä¶ Four‚Ä¶‚Äù  On ‚Äòthree‚Äô all three of the monochrome figures step out from the ship. But before any of the heroes have time to worry they all float in the air undeterred by gravity and the ship door closes behind them.   The countdown reaches 'one‚Äô. And in the next moment it looks like the hell breaks loose.   Countless giant vines shoot out from the portal up reaching for the ship. True to what the red hoverboarder said they are very much toothy every vine splitting in two and attempting to bite the ship like some twisted idea of scissors.   None of them reach it.   The oldest of three kids claps his hands and a wall of raging fire descends on the vines throwing them off. In the next moment the trio falls apart flying through the lovecraftian mess of carnivorous plants with practiced ease the younger ones using what looks like icicles and little storms.   ‚ÄúWho are they?‚Äù Batman asks Jazz following the youngest one‚Äôs - the only girl among the three - movements as she creates a strong gust of wind with a wave of her hand. None of the vines or attacks get past the shield though.   ‚ÄúMy siblings‚Äù the girl answers pointing her hand at the oldest one ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs Dan. He‚Äôs the most violent. One time he destroyed our original world but that timeline doesn‚Äôt exist anymore.‚Äù She then points to the girl ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs Dani the youngest. She rarely joins the crew lately. And she is actually a clone but at this point most of us have been cloned once or twice so it‚Äôs not a big deal anymore.‚Äù She then points her finger to the last one a boy that flies past them quicker than a lightning freezing everything he touches ‚ÄúAnd this is Danny. He is the most powerful one. Technically he could have just ended the fight with one Wail but kids like to have fun. Also they don‚Äôt get to show off their elemental powers a lot so they are mostly being dramatic for you.‚Äù  She says all this so easily just like a matter of fact and it is at this moment that the members of JL realize the sheer power of whoever these people are. When she casually told them she bested Superman it could have been written as a coincidence a joke. But this?  Dan growls as one of the vines scratches his shoulder. He bleeds green but it‚Äôs only for a second before both the wound and the suit knit themselves back together. This is not just a simple accelerated healing it almost looks like a miracle.   ‚ÄúOi brats I‚Äôm done with show off get out of the way!‚Äù He yells at the other two and Danny and Dani quickly follow the order flying closer to him and behind his back.   ‚ÄúCover your ears‚Äù Jazz tells the heroes around her and puts her helmet back on as Dan takes a deep breath and screams.   It hurts even those who follow Jazz‚Äôs advice. Batman feels like his eardrums are about to be shattered for the lack of better word. But the vines like the sonic attack even less - most of them subdue and pull back inside the portal and the rest is dissipating like they are being burned from the inside out.   And then just like it began the scream - the wail - stops. The silence feels deafening after the end of it but slowly the sounds return and the JL watches Danny flying down to the center of the portal. He puts his hands on the surface of it and for a long moment nothing happens.   And then the Pit starts closing up.   Or no it is Danny who absorbs it the green flowing up through his hands his veins that start glowing the same green. His eyes become the same toxic color with no whites and no irises just glowing green all over and his hair shimmers like stars.   A few minutes later the portal is gone like it never even existed and Danny plants his feet on the ground and stretches like one would do after a good rest.   ‚ÄúOof that was nice!‚Äù He turns to the other two who are still up in the air ‚ÄúDo you want some?‚Äù   Dan flips him off before going back to the ship but Dani floats down to him and extends her hands out.   ‚ÄúSure. I like getting it from you better than from the portal itself anyway. Gives it a sparkling taste like Sprite‚Äù she chuckles. Danny takes her hands in his and the green glow slowly makes its way through their joined palms now flowing through the girl‚Äôs body.   ‚ÄúWhat are they?‚Äù Flash whispers horrified but Jazz hears it nonetheless and turns her head to him taking her helmet off once again.   ‚ÄúThat is not a very appropriate question‚Äù she chastises and smiles at their faces ‚ÄúBut it‚Äôs okay I get it. They are ghosts. Or ectoplasmic entities or halfas or highly liminal beings. Or if you want a very simplified version they are dead kids who are enjoying their afterlife a little too much.‚Äù  ‚ÄúDead?‚Äù Batman zeros on the word snapping his eyes at the girl. She smiles and for the first time it doesn‚Äôt look human. Her teeth are too sharp her grin too wide and her eyes are suddenly not just teal but neon bright and glowing with vertical irises.   ‚ÄúMost of us are dead in one way or another. And I do not mean it in a metaphorical sense.‚Äù  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî-  What I‚Äôm thinking is they have a whole system going on. Amity Park generally resides in the Realms but from time to time they decide they want to go on a vacation as a whole town and they pop into existence on one of the Earths. They don‚Äôt really care for the universe or dimension they end up in as long as it is more or less peaceful (as in no active wars going on right where they pop up) has sunlight and nice weather.   The GIW is taking care of legal things - imagine US government reaction when a whole ass town just boom starts existing in a place where nothing existed before? So GIW does all the paperwork and discussions. Also they are doing their basic research on the dimension they end up in for science purposes.   I‚Äôm thinking Vlad is still a mayor of Amity. And sometimes when a particular dimension is rather annoying he straight up possesses the authorities because he hates official talks and couldn‚Äôt care less for morals if he tried for a week. The GIW scolds him but don‚Äôt really say no. It‚Äôs not a good solution to the problem but hey it works.  Meanwhile Fentons are doing ectoplasmic research. They scan the dimension for troubles basically looking for natural portals and ghosts causing ruckus. Jazz is almost always the one who does the talking to the heroes native to the dimension - she is the one who has the most patience and social skills. Jack is in charge of transportation and Maddie is the head of biological ecto-biological and other species research. Tucker is the tech specialist of course - he is the sole reason why Amity has wi-fi wherever they go. Val and her father are kind of protectors? Security? But for the whole town yeah. They do have GIW agents as subordinates.   Dani is not always living in Amity she travels the Realms most of the time but she joins when something interesting happens. Dan is like on an eternal probation period GIW and Fentons keep an eye on him but he is one of the heavy hitters for when shit goes down.   Danny is living his best life he is mainly the protector spirit of Amity but he also gets to protect all the dimensions from ghosts! He helps anyone and everyone - one day he is working with Val on defenses for their main ship they use to travel inside dimensions and the next day he is joining Maddie in her studies of new species found.   Oh I forgot Sam. She is probably the one responsible for the magic stuff - mostly everyone else focuses on scientific aspects but she is the one to research on occult things.      |  |

Bruh not people on twitter calling batjokes shippers disgusting freaks. Are most of them not like‚Ä¶first world gen z or what? Why do they talk like boomers in puritan culture? My old ass is so confused.   In my country we ship whatever the hell we want because they are not real. No one cares if said characters are the most horrible human being. But calling people names over their ship preference is so childish and such an unhinged behavior.   And just slightly over a decade ago people would ship the most crack ships possible across all fandoms and nobody batted an eye. Why is it so hard now? What happens to some younger people that make them so rigid and protective over something that aren‚Äôt even real?  Sometimes I feel like fandom culture has changed into a mean girl club or something. People are so mean but at the same time so‚Ä¶basic? They react way too strongly towards things they deem not within their comfort zone or preferences. It‚Äôs getting ridiculous.

When you step out every one is in the living room watching some murder mystery movie or something like that. ‚ÄúEveryone I would like you to meet y/n L/n - Kent.‚Äù Bruce said as he patted your shoulder. ‚ÄúOk I got to go be careful n/n‚Äù Clark said as he kissed your forehead before leaving. ‚ÄúHi everyone I‚Äôm your new engineer.‚Äù You say as everyone comes to meet you expect one a black haired blue eyed teen still sat watching the tv. ‚ÄúOmg hi I‚Äôm Rachael finally more teenage girls!‚Äù You smile at the girl and everyone comes to say hi and greets you. ‚ÄúJason.‚Äù Bruce calls out ‚Äúcome and introduce yourself‚Äù. ‚ÄúNo I‚Äôm good thanks B much rather be here right now there about to enter crime alley!‚Äù Said the boy. You recognise the name Jason and his attitude towards everyone it was all familiar like you knew him from your childhood but didn‚Äôt know were. Dick when over and turned of the Tv to get Jason‚Äôs attention ‚Äúwhat the hell dickhead!?‚Äù He said standing up. ‚ÄúJason we all know you like crime alley but come meet new kid‚Äù they both walked over ‚Äúhi I‚Äôm y/n L/n - Kent nice to meet you‚Äù you said ‚ÄúJason Todd good to meet-wait L/n?‚Äù He asked you like he had remembered something. ‚ÄúUm yeah that‚Äôs me formally L/n now L/n - Kent‚Äù you said trying to explain you weren‚Äôt born a Kent. ‚ÄúNo you‚Äôre what‚Ä¶Jen? That‚Äôs your nickname right? Jen?‚Äù He asked ‚Äúyes it is- holy shit jay!?‚Äù You responded as he pulled you into a hug ‚ÄúI never thought I‚Äôd see you again!‚Äù Jason said still hugging you ‚Äúum what is going on?‚Äù Asked gar ‚Äúyeah not trying to reck the mood but do you know echother?‚Äù Kory asked ‚Äúum yeah we dated in crime alley‚Ä¶ speaking of which‚Äù you said pushing Jason off you. ‚ÄúWhere the hell did you go? You just left me i when to bye us some sandwiches and when I get back you we‚Äôre gone!‚Äù You said still holding his shoulder‚Äôs ‚ÄúI know I know Ieft you and I‚Äôm so sorry but um can we talk about this somewhere that isn‚Äôt in font of my dad?‚Äù He said with that stupid voice he used when you argued back a crime alley.  When everyone was getting ready for bed later you Hurd somebody knock on your door you opened it to see Jason ‚Äúhay babe can we talk?‚Äù You pulled him in pining him against the wall. ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt you ‚Äòbabe‚Äô me you left that is by far the opposite of being a good boyfriend!‚Äùyou said you were about to carry on yelling at Jason but just as you opened your mouth he kissed you and you couldn‚Äôt help but kiss him back because in all truth no matter how angry you were at him you couldn‚Äôt help but miss how he kissed you how he used to play with your hair after you had nightmares or when he would play a old music tape on his VHS player that you when both dance and sing along to you had missed everything about him and in all honesty so did he.

post_body: DPxDC Multiverse Police (pt. 2) ‚ÄúYou said you‚Äôre going to ask questions then can we ask questions?‚Äù Superman really tries to be polite here because first he was raised by Kents and second Jazz and the whole interdimensional police thing looks non-hostile. At least now.   The redhead nods ‚ÄúSure ask away I‚Äôll answer everything I can.‚Äù Then she notices Batman reaching to touch the green shield and makes a soft warning noise ‚ÄúAh sorry please don‚Äôt touch it. I can show how it works later but it‚Äôs not meant to keep you out. It‚Äôs to keep everything else in.‚Äù  Batman reluctantly puts his head down and turns to her.   ‚ÄúElaborate.‚Äù  The sci-fi ship in the air makes a loud hissing sound like compressed air being released and the bottom part of it slides open. Jazz nods in the direction of the now open ship.   ‚ÄúYou know what they say it‚Äôs better to see it once than to hear it ten times.‚Äù  There are three humanoid figures standing in there. All of them are mostly monochrome black and white clothes starkling white hair. They look like one adult and two children but it‚Äôs one of the kids who raises his hands to his mouth and yells so loud everyone in three miles radius is able to hear him:  ‚ÄúStep away from the shield please shit‚Äôs about to get real!‚Äù   None of the heroes move but Jazz does take a few steps away. Wonder Woman after a moment of hesitation follows her example.   A mechanical voice comes from the ship itself ‚ÄúCountdown to the breach. Five‚Ä¶ Four‚Ä¶‚Äù  On ‚Äòthree‚Äô all three of the monochrome figures step out from the ship. But before any of the heroes have time to worry they all float in the air undeterred by gravity and the ship door closes behind them.   The countdown reaches 'one‚Äô. And in the next moment it looks like the hell breaks loose.   Countless giant vines shoot out from the portal up reaching for the ship. True to what the red hoverboarder said they are very much toothy every vine splitting in two and attempting to bite the ship like some twisted idea of scissors.   None of them reach it.   The oldest of three kids claps his hands and a wall of raging fire descends on the vines throwing them off. In the next moment the trio falls apart flying through the lovecraftian mess of carnivorous plants with practiced ease the younger ones using what looks like icicles and little storms.   ‚ÄúWho are they?‚Äù Batman asks Jazz following the youngest one‚Äôs - the only girl among the three - movements as she creates a strong gust of wind with a wave of her hand. None of the vines or attacks get past the shield though.   ‚ÄúMy siblings‚Äù the girl answers pointing her hand at the oldest one ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs Dan. He‚Äôs the most violent. One time he destroyed our original world but that timeline doesn‚Äôt exist anymore.‚Äù She then points to the girl ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs Dani the youngest. She rarely joins the crew lately. And she is actually a clone but at this point most of us have been cloned once or twice so it‚Äôs not a big deal anymore.‚Äù She then points her finger to the last one a boy that flies past them quicker than a lightning freezing everything he touches ‚ÄúAnd this is Danny. He is the most powerful one. Technically he could have just ended the fight with one Wail but kids like to have fun. Also they don‚Äôt get to show off their elemental powers a lot so they are mostly being dramatic for you.‚Äù  She says all this so easily just like a matter of fact and it is at this moment that the members of JL realize the sheer power of whoever these people are. When she casually told them she bested Superman it could have been written as a coincidence a joke. But this?  Dan growls as one of the vines scratches his shoulder. He bleeds green but it‚Äôs only for a second before both the wound and the suit knit themselves back together. This is not just a simple accelerated healing it almost looks like a miracle.   ‚ÄúOi brats I‚Äôm done with show off get out of the way!‚Äù He yells at the other two and Danny and Dani quickly follow the order flying closer to him and behind his back.   ‚ÄúCover your ears‚Äù Jazz tells the heroes around her and puts her helmet back on as Dan takes a deep breath and screams.   It hurts even those who follow Jazz‚Äôs advice. Batman feels like his eardrums are about to be shattered for the lack of better word. But the vines like the sonic attack even less - most of them subdue and pull back inside the portal and the rest is dissipating like they are being burned from the inside out.   And then just like it began the scream - the wail - stops. The silence feels deafening after the end of it but slowly the sounds return and the JL watches Danny flying down to the center of the portal. He puts his hands on the surface of it and for a long moment nothing happens.   And then the Pit starts closing up.   Or no it is Danny who absorbs it the green flowing up through his hands his veins that start glowing the same green. His eyes become the same toxic color with no whites and no irises just glowing green all over and his hair shimmers like stars.   A few minutes later the portal is gone like it never even existed and Danny plants his feet on the ground and stretches like one would do after a good rest.   ‚ÄúOof that was nice!‚Äù He turns to the other two who are still up in the air ‚ÄúDo you want some?‚Äù   Dan flips him off before going back to the ship but Dani floats down to him and extends her hands out.   ‚ÄúSure. I like getting it from you better than from the portal itself anyway. Gives it a sparkling taste like Sprite‚Äù she chuckles. Danny takes her hands in his and the green glow slowly makes its way through their joined palms now flowing through the girl‚Äôs body.   ‚ÄúWhat are they?‚Äù Flash whispers horrified but Jazz hears it nonetheless and turns her head to him taking her helmet off once again.   ‚ÄúThat is not a very appropriate question‚Äù she chastises and smiles at their faces ‚ÄúBut it‚Äôs okay I get it. They are ghosts. Or ectoplasmic entities or halfas or highly liminal beings. Or if you want a very simplified version they are dead kids who are enjoying their afterlife a little too much.‚Äù  ‚ÄúDead?‚Äù Batman zeros on the word snapping his eyes at the girl. She smiles and for the first time it doesn‚Äôt look human. Her teeth are too sharp her grin too wide and her eyes are suddenly not just teal but neon bright and glowing with vertical irises.   ‚ÄúMost of us are dead in one way or another. And I do not mean it in a metaphorical sense.‚Äù  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî-  What I‚Äôm thinking is they have a whole system going on. Amity Park generally resides in the Realms but from time to time they decide they want to go on a vacation as a whole town and they pop into existence on one of the Earths. They don‚Äôt really care for the universe or dimension they end up in as long as it is more or less peaceful (as in no active wars going on right where they pop up) has sunlight and nice weather.   The GIW is taking care of legal things - imagine US government reaction when a whole ass town just boom starts existing in a place where nothing existed before? So GIW does all the paperwork and discussions. Also they are doing their basic research on the dimension they end up in for science purposes.   I‚Äôm thinking Vlad is still a mayor of Amity. And sometimes when a particular dimension is rather annoying he straight up possesses the authorities because he hates official talks and couldn‚Äôt care less for morals if he tried for a week. The GIW scolds him but don‚Äôt really say no. It‚Äôs not a good solution to the problem but hey it works.  Meanwhile Fentons are doing ectoplasmic research. They scan the dimension for troubles basically looking for natural portals and ghosts causing ruckus. Jazz is almost always the one who does the talking to the heroes native to the dimension - she is the one who has the most patience and social skills. Jack is in charge of transportation and Maddie is the head of biological ecto-biological and other species research. Tucker is the tech specialist of course - he is the sole reason why Amity has wi-fi wherever they go. Val and her father are kind of protectors? Security? But for the whole town yeah. They do have GIW agents as subordinates.   Dani is not always living in Amity she travels the Realms most of the time but she joins when something interesting happens. Dan is like on an eternal probation period GIW and Fentons keep an eye on him but he is one of the heavy hitters for when shit goes down.   Danny is living his best life he is mainly the protector spirit of Amity but he also gets to protect all the dimensions from ghosts! He helps anyone and everyone - one day he is working with Val on defenses for their main ship they use to travel inside dimensions and the next day he is joining Maddie in her studies of new species found.   Oh I forgot Sam. She is probably the one responsible for the magic stuff - mostly everyone else focuses on scientific aspects but she is the one to research on occult things.      |  |
