Bruh not people on twitter calling batjokes shippers disgusting freaks. Are most of them not like‚Ä¶first world gen z or what? Why do they talk like boomers in puritan culture? My old ass is so confused.   In my country we ship whatever the hell we want because they are not real. No one cares if said characters are the most horrible human being. But calling people names over their ship preference is so childish and such an unhinged behavior.   And just slightly over a decade ago people would ship the most crack ships possible across all fandoms and nobody batted an eye. Why is it so hard now? What happens to some younger people that make them so rigid and protective over something that aren‚Äôt even real?  Sometimes I feel like fandom culture has changed into a mean girl club or something. People are so mean but at the same time so‚Ä¶basic? They react way too strongly towards things they deem not within their comfort zone or preferences. It‚Äôs getting ridiculous.

post_body: DPxDC Good!GIW Thoughts After I wrote the Multiverse Police prompt I‚Äôve gotten a few replies and reblogs saying they‚Äôve never seen good!GIW before and I realized wow me neither!   The GIW are always the bad guys and well yeah they fit the criteria for being the shadow branch of the government to commit atrocities. But there‚Äôs potential in good GIW.   Imagine it.   Imagine Amity Park being off-limits not because GIW wants to keep it contained but because they treat it like a resort or a national park. People are not allowed to freely come there only because GIW wants JL out of it since the heroes are going to treat the whole thing as a threat. But there‚Äôs an infinite amount of knowledge there! A portal to the new world! New culture! Things you could never learn before!   Imagine Amity being under government‚Äôs protection. Imagine Jazz attending a university with her full tuition paid by the GIW since she is well a liminal a minority and she is getting a degree that will help her establish connections between them and Infinite Realms.   Imagine GIW funding Fentons‚Äô research not in order to eradicate ghosts but to have a safe way to talk to them while not getting caught up in a fight with an impossibly strong being.   Imagine GIW being hella annoying to Danny because they just won‚Äôt stop with their interviews and questionnaires. Which actually has the full potential to become confusing because imagine Batman meeting Phantom and Phantom is like ‚ÄúOh yeah there‚Äôs a hidden government branch that I avoid like plague because they want to catch me‚Äù and Bats are super worried. In the meantime GIW is looking for Danny simply because he is the most friendly ghost they encountered and they want their answers about the cultural differences between the dead and the living.   Now there‚Äôs also a way for this to become the thickest plot armor ever. Imagine Jazz is on a mission to get some artifact from the mortal world. Then imagine GIW helping her while they still can‚Äôt exactly show they are government agents because who in their right mind would believe the government is studying ghosts? Anyway Jazz now has the potential to become James Bond kind of cool. Wonderful.  Imagine Danny having trouble with the JL/Bats/police and then he just ‚ÄúWait let me call someone I have the right to one phone call right?‚Äù And not 15 minutes later a bunch of secret government agents in white show up and Danny is free to go while the agents are saying whatever happened is now classified in the best Batman manner.   Oh what about a world-ending event where a ghost is involved and the JL is at a loss of what to do. And then the white vans show up packed with unknown tech agents in white with blasters and a few weird meta-kids no one knows anything about. They even have a K9 unit because come on Cujo could be a perfect friend for them.   Just GIW being the secret protection squad for Amity and ghosts.

post_body: when I found my love ‚ù§Ô∏èüñ§ü§ç (Jason Todd x fem! Reader) Jason Todd. But you always new him as jay. You were around 10 when you saw a small boy around 11 steeling tires of an old car in the dump. ‚ÄúHay! You this is my place back off!‚Äù You say to him ‚Äúho sorry kid but I need these if I want to eat tonight‚Äù the strange boy said picking up the tires. ‚ÄúIt will cost you!‚Äù You say just as he is about to walk off. ‚ÄúYeah ok fair point. What you need kid?‚Äù He asked walking towards you. ‚ÄúI can‚Äôt give you money though! I have a cigarette?‚Äù He said jokingly. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm 10 and a half! Plus I don‚Äôt want money.‚Äù You say with a hand on your hip. ‚ÄúSo what do yo-I need something to eat!‚Äù You cut him off. ‚ÄúOh um ok I normally get a sandwich from a soup kitchen but they shut down‚Äù he signed putting down a tier and holding out his hand for you to shake. ‚ÄúI‚Äôll share what I can get from this. Ok?‚Äù He asked ‚Äúyes! Oh I‚Äôm y/n y/n L/n‚Äù you say ‚Äúnice to meet you y/n I‚Äôm Jason Todd but‚Ä¶around here I go by jay you should figure out a new name as well it‚Äôs safer like idk umm maybe Jen ?‚Äù ‚ÄúOk sure jen and jay sounds cool!‚Äù  after around three years you got to know him better and became his closest friend and had maybe kissed once or twice. But then he disappeared. Vanished. Like he was never there. Only a week after Jason‚Äôs disappearance you were descoverd and put into foster homes but avenchualy you met the Kent‚Äôs. Thay already had a son Conner and he instantly saw you as his baby sister. When you found out that your foster father was the superman you begged him to let you train to become his sidekick along side Conner! And one day he agreed! You were over the moon you may not of had powers but you were one heck of an engineer you had made rocket boots so you could keep up with your brother and dad and not to mention a total badass when it came to hand to hand combat. You were 14 when Bruce Wayne came to your home to ask you to enter the titans who really needed an engineer. ‚ÄúCan I? Please dad please?!‚Äù You practically begged him ‚Äúoh god fine but Bruce if I come round and see her with a fucking stab wound she comes home!‚Äù Clark made it very clear on that but the next thing you know you‚Äôre in the elevator with your dad and Bruce by your sides. When you step out every one is in the living room watching some murder mystery movie or something like that. ‚ÄúEveryone I would like you to meet y/n L/n - Kent.‚Äù Bruce said as he patted your shoulder. ‚ÄúOk I got to go be careful n/n‚Äù Clark said as he kissed your forehead before leaving. ‚ÄúHi everyone I‚Äôm your new engineer.‚Äù You say as everyone comes to meet you expect one a black haired blue eyed teen still sat watching the tv. ‚ÄúOmg hi I‚Äôm Rachael finally more teenage girls!‚Äù You smile at the girl and everyone comes to say hi and greets you. ‚ÄúJason.‚Äù Bruce calls out ‚Äúcome and introduce yourself‚Äù. ‚ÄúNo I‚Äôm good thanks B much rather be here right now there about to enter crime alley!‚Äù Said the boy. You recognise the name Jason and his attitude towards everyone it was all familiar like you knew him from your childhood but didn‚Äôt know were. Dick when over and turned of the Tv to get Jason‚Äôs attention ‚Äúwhat the hell dickhead!?‚Äù He said standing up. ‚ÄúJason we all know you like crime alley but come meet new kid‚Äù they both walked over ‚Äúhi I‚Äôm y/n L/n - Kent nice to meet you‚Äù you said ‚ÄúJason Todd good to meet-wait L/n?‚Äù He asked you like he had remembered something. ‚ÄúUm yeah that‚Äôs me formally L/n now L/n - Kent‚Äù you said trying to explain you weren‚Äôt born a Kent. ‚ÄúNo you‚Äôre what‚Ä¶Jen? That‚Äôs your nickname right? Jen?‚Äù He asked ‚Äúyes it is- holy shit jay!?‚Äù You responded as he pulled you into a hug ‚ÄúI never thought I‚Äôd see you again!‚Äù Jason said still hugging you ‚Äúum what is going on?‚Äù Asked gar ‚Äúyeah not trying to reck the mood but do you know echother?‚Äù Kory asked ‚Äúum yeah we dated in crime alley‚Ä¶ speaking of which‚Äù you said pushing Jason off you. ‚ÄúWhere the hell did you go? You just left me i when to bye us some sandwiches and when I get back you we‚Äôre gone!‚Äù You said still holding his shoulder‚Äôs ‚ÄúI know I know Ieft you and I‚Äôm so sorry but um can we talk about this somewhere that isn‚Äôt in font of my dad?‚Äù He said with that stupid voice he used when you argued back a crime alley.  When everyone was getting ready for bed later you Hurd somebody knock on your door you opened it to see Jason ‚Äúhay babe can we talk?‚Äù You pulled him in pining him against the wall. ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt you ‚Äòbabe‚Äô me you left that is by far the opposite of being a good boyfriend!‚Äùyou said you were about to carry on yelling at Jason but just as you opened your mouth he kissed you and you couldn‚Äôt help but kiss him back because in all truth no matter how angry you were at him you couldn‚Äôt help but miss how he kissed you how he used to play with your hair after you had nightmares or when he would play a old music tape on his VHS player that you when both dance and sing along to you had missed everything about him and in all honesty so did he.

My favorite characterization of Bruce Wayne is a Batman who‚Äôs socially awkward emotionally constipated sassy and a tired man who can be both an asshole and a genuinely likeable person depending on who he‚Äôs interacting with.

When I saw ‚ÄúThe Batman (2022)‚Äù I decided to make an AU where Bruce Wayne (The Batman) and Edward Nashton (The Riddler) follow their same roles but only in the Victorian era. I never finished painting Edward (I only have the sketch) but I did with Bruce so I wanted to show it to you. I think my style before was more cartoonish but I like it.   By the way did you notice that I decided to add his signature logo (the bat) to the suit?

very unorganized thoughts:  <!-- more --> I am watching the The Batman cartoon rn and I went in with the expectation that Bruce is the guy who reluctantly keeps this kids on his hero team just to stop them from becoming evil which is probably more comfortable bc it makes Bruce definitively a Good Guy and still leaves room for cool fun Batgirl and Robin episodes. The more I watch it though the more it seems that (for this show at least) this isn‚Äôt the direction they went for. Robin has already decided to Not Kill Bad Guys TM before Bruce has even officially welcomed him into the team. Dick has *fun* fighting villains. Being Batman and Robin is what they bond over and since Bruce is rarely home and therefore would barely interact with Dick if it weren‚Äôt for Robin I think their partnership is literally just the closest Bruce can come to being a good caretaker. We see glimpses of throe relationship in later episodes and that Bruce uses a Dad Voice TM but Dick also talks pretty freely around him and Alfred less cagey than other (traumatized) preteens. Bruce and Dick in this universe only have as good of a relationship as they do because of Robin and that doesn‚Äôt really make it ‚Äúfine‚Äù but it‚Äôs much more interesting that the literal best these two could do for someone they love is. Child Vigilatism.  Not only that but there are times when Bruce tells Dick to go down to the Batcave or to get into the Batmobile in the same way you‚Äôd tell a kid to brush their teeth. For Bruce being the Batman is a choice he makes every single night when he plays hooky from some prior engagement to investigate a robbery Alfred says it‚Äôs probably nothing. It‚Äôs reflexive really and Robin is part of the routine I haven‚Äôt yet seen him yet to opt out. Of *course* he‚Äôs coming along this keystone of their family is important just like any other daily routine.  I had more to add I think but this‚Äôll do.

post_body: The Batman & Scooby-Doo! Mysteries Issue #4 by Sholly Fisch 4/5  This post is for fan entertainment I‚Äôm not being paid.  Hi everyone  This is issues center around gargoyles statues coming to life and running amok around town. But the main mystery is that people are turning in the gargoyles.  This is one of the first issues of this series we get to see Robin (Or at least that I have as I am still tracking down #2) but we also get a classic character from the comics but this version of him is reminds me of the Animated Series: Detective Harvey Bullock.  Bullock is briefing both Batman and Robin and Mystery Inc. about the situation and there is also a minor about the different types of gargoyles.  But then one of the officers slowly turned into a gargoyle and flies off and the group of heroes give chase.  Now I don‚Äôt know why people got so heated when they were looking for the gargoyles. After another person gets turned into a gargoyle which now by this point poor Shaggy and Scooby Doo try to run away from the gargoyle but keeps running into shops that sell them and statues outside of business.  Now after the group regroups and discusses what they have learned and hash out what they should do next. Batman tries to figure out the pattern of why these particular individuals were turned and even to the way the gargoyles look.  Also in this issue we do get to see Oracle even though we see more of the AI Avatar and the back of Babs.  The mystery group pinpoints the next possible location of a new target at a local theater.  This is where I will stop since the next few pages will have the group umasking the culprit and then get into the fight that results that the culprit getting arrested. (Thank you handy dandy Bat-knock out gas).  This was a good issue but I like the Catwoman issues a little more. Just for the fact there were more clues and hunting round for evidence. However this issue introduced new characters Bullock and Oracle which I love. I want issues that Mystery Inc. teams up with Oracle.

dress (take it off) read it on AO3 at https://ift.tt/Z3glt4G   by Jaytimwhore   He‚Äôs not sure how one thing lead to the next but Tim wears the dress mostly at Alfred‚Äôs insistence. secondary_tags: ['bruce wayne'  'dick grayson'  'nightwing'  'robin'  'why do some fans think he has no relationship with dick'  'he has a complicated relationship and an unhealthy relationship'  'but it all stems from love']
post_body: Where do fans get the idea that Bruce neglected Dick? For fucks sake they were sharing a bed until like 1960.   He‚Äôs a helicopter parent who often complains loudly that his son has friends and in most continuities Dick is literally running to the titans to get rid of his smother.   He‚Äôs overprotective. Dick is literally the only Robin he tried to bench. Several times.   It all stems from how he lost his parents it‚Äôs a normal reaction parents have if they have gone through great loss.   Jason he‚Äôs actually pretty healthy with. I think he learned from the fact Dick is hiding from him smothering isn‚Äôt working.   Jason dies and he goes back to once more trying to smother Dick but more unhealthy this time since he‚Äôs outright trying to control him. This is too a trauma response but he doesn‚Äôt get past it this time.   I don‚Äôt think he ever had a parent relationship with Tim. Controversial sure but all the time Tim was a child he had parents he could go home to which meant Tim only saw the positive side of Bruce.   Now when Damian was introduced I would call that neglect. It took awhile in canon continuity before he even started parenting him and he stopped being as controlling of Dick meaning he‚Äôs trying to overcome his trauma

Honestly I can understand why some people would still think that Batman‚Äôs a demon considering you could say that he ‚Äúcollects the souls of orphaned children‚Äù and be completely unironically telling the truth

post_body: i genuinely don‚Äôt understand people who are like ‚ÄúBruce didn‚Äôt care about any of the Robins‚Äù or like ‚Äúthey were just soldiers to him‚Äù or whatever because like.   the whole point of Batman is that he cares. a lot. about everything.   you‚Äôre telling me that when a boy barely older than he was when his parents died came to him in tears and demanded vengeance he just said ‚Äúokay sure‚Äù and set him loose on the world?  you‚Äôre telling me that little boy never skinned his knee on patrol and walked up to Batman sniffling and fighting tears and Batman never slipped his hands under the boy‚Äôs arms and lifted him up? and he never plastered a bandaid over it saying see? it‚Äôs alright. it‚Äôs all better.   you think that when that boy almost died Batman didn‚Äôt ‚Äòfire‚Äô him in a panicked attempt to keep him safe? that Batman didn‚Äôt completely spiral when the next boy did die? that he didn‚Äôt make the third boy work that much harder all so Batman could make sure he was safe? and so on and so on.   the whole point is that they were never just soldiers to him no matter what some people (or DC writers) try to tell you.

His entire drive seems to be centered Batman which yk sure i guess?? Idk. I feel like im reading a tim centric fanfic tbh. Also something about the whole‚Ä¶ team thing feels off. The thing I think modern iterations of Batman are missing are that he‚Äôs not just a dark tortured badass action hero. He‚Äôs also a dad. He‚Äôs compassionate he‚Äôs sympathetic he‚Äôs a weirdo that his children often humble. He does what he does out of love for Gotham out of desire to make the world a better place. Not just because he likes cracking skulls. He actually hates resorting to violence that‚Äôs why he tries to outsmart every situation. It‚Äôs why he doesn‚Äôt kill. He has a kind heart and believes in redemption. He wants justice to right wrongs he wants a fair world with even treatment for the same crimes. I think people miss that.

post_body: i really love Batfamily stuff it‚Äôs so much more interesting than Mary Sue Batman but I feel like people don‚Äôt get how the batfam actually interacts with other heroes. Specifically Clark and Diana.   I see so many posts about how the Justice league knows nothing about the batkids and I‚Äôm sorry to me that‚Äôs the most boring way to do things and completely against characterization and history if it‚Äôs just the whole league. If you think Clark and Diana don‚Äôt love those kids as family it‚Äôs not really my cup of tea (to a lesser extent Barry and J'onn).   I get that there are a lot of batkids and a lot of different comics with different minds behind them so I can only reference what I know and from what I‚Äôve experienced. Still I read comics for a while and I feel like my personal headcanons are:  Nightwing should absolutely adore his aunt and uncle he‚Äôs nightwing because of a conversation he had with Superman. He was the first Robin and adored in the superhero community. He led the titans was best friends with Donna.  Red Hood I think Jason might be a bit more chilly towards Clark Like everything after he came back things went to shit especially after he found out Clark stopped Bruce from killing the Joker to avenge him. but has a lot of fond memories towards Clark when he was Robin. He still has a real love for Aunt Diana probably avoids her though because she is a reminder of the good times he had as Robin.  Red Robin things are complicated with him as he was on the Outsiders with Connor and Cassie and later on the Titans with them. When they were the outsiders the Justice League probably felt more like the man trying to control them. Later on during the titans things get angsty so I think that might color Tim‚Äôs perception of them and favor the way his friends describe them more than what he‚Äôs seen of them. I think he has good memories but not nearly as much as Jason or Dick  I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve read any comics about Spoiler Black Bat or Signal‚Äôs interactions with them so I would leave that to those who know more. That being said I think their interactions would be fun I think Cass would respect Diana as probably the world‚Äôs best warrior and I think Duke would really look up to Clark partially because he‚Äôs superman but also he‚Äôs fun and light not to mention they both have light powers even if they manifest differently. I don‚Äôt really know much about Stephanie and her interactions with other heroes tbh   Damian I think is interesting because I think he actually respects Clark more as a journalist and as Jon‚Äôs father than he does as Superman. At least at first. Superman has all these powers but doesn‚Äôt really do a lot of what he sees as big changes so I think at first he considers his powers a waste on small potatoes stuff. He does come to respect him though. Diana I think Damian adores pretty quickly even if he says otherwise I think they bond over their love of animals. I also think that Damian respects that Diana will kill if necessary he was trained by the league of assassins I understand that as a member of the batfamily he doesn‚Äôt kill but I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs right for him to be as antikilling as the rest. I think out of respect for Dick and his father he doesn‚Äôt kill but he understands that some people need killing.     I‚Äôm not trying to yuck anyone‚Äôs um your headcanons are your own but I see so many posts that just don‚Äôt get how fun interactions with characters are with their canon personalities.

secondary_tags: ['dc comics'  'dc universe'  'robin'  'dick grayson'  'bruce wayne'  'damian wayne'  'damian al ghul'  'damian wayne angst'  'batfam'  'gotham'  'dcu'  'dick grayson tries his best'  'damian wayne is a little shit']
post_body: above it all Damian al Ghul Wayne feared nothing. He was above such things. He was the heir to the shadows the son of the bat. The dark feared him.   If he was shivering- if- it was from the cold. His perch on a ledge fifty stories up was nonconsequential in this matter; it was simply the bite of the wind that made his hair stand on end. No other reason.  Damian steeled himself. He was only surveying his new dominion‚Äîthe buildings and people he was born to protect‚Äîso there was no need for his throat to tighten. If Drake was capable of this- so am I.  Perhaps it was his company that made him nauseous; Richard was wearing the honored mantle and that simply was unacceptable. Damian- not one of the menagerie of street filth- was the only one that should take up his father‚Äôs cowl but Richard had spoken some nonsense about age and now he was Robin.  Carefully Damian glanced past his precariously placed toes down at the street below and his mouth went dry. This was ridiculous all of these pockets in the utility belt and no water? Of course his mouth would get dry there is no other possible reason.   ‚ÄúAre you steady Robin?‚Äù  Damian‚Äôs upper lip curled ‚ÄúOf course Batman‚Äù his fingers found the hilt of a knife strapped to his leg ‚Äúmy capabilities are beyond doubt.‚Äù  A gloved hand found his shoulder squeezing gently ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs beautiful isn‚Äôt it.‚Äù  Damian stared out at the city. Most windows were completely blocked to prevent light from escaping almost every business had closed at sundown and the only pedestrians were drug runners working girls and their johns and various street rats ‚ÄúYour vocabulary has obvious flaws.‚Äù  The hand tightened on his shoulder ‚ÄúGotham has her troubles but there is beauty here Robin. That is the mission you lack faith.‚Äù  All of the vague nausea Damian felt was replaced with acidic rage. He lacked faith? Richard knew naught of the word. Damian shrugged the hand off and spun facing the armor he had dreamed of for his entire life (worn by the wrong man) ‚ÄúI am here only because of my faith. This is my mission my inheritance. You are a placeholder maintaining my destiny‚Äù his fingers tightened around the ornate dagger his mother had given him for his journey ‚Äútherein lies my faith Batman.‚Äù  They thought he was mean they thought he was rude fine. Damian Wayne was born with a legacy to uphold. He was beyond flaws and fears.

AU where Robin never existed in Gotham. Dick never made his way into the manor as a kid and never made the mantle.  Instead Jason only has Batman to look up to growing up watching the caped crusader knock down rouge after rogue and always save the day. Until he doesn‚Äôt and Jason dies when Joker holds a group of school students hostage while they are on a field trip 7 of them dying in the following explosion that tore the building they had been held in to shreds. He still mysteriously revives clawing his way out of his own grave and right into the clutches of the Court of Owls where his resentment towards Batman‚Äôs only seems to grow.  Instead Tim notices some similarities between his eccentric neighbor and on mysterious cape but can never act on it before he is put into the foster system after his parents died in a car crash. He is catching all sort of attention with his proficiency with computers and logic puzzles family after family complaining about his ability to get into places he should not be even at the ripe age on 9. It‚Äôs not until he manages to wiggle his way past a politicians fire wall that he too catches the Courts attention.  Without the Robin mantle filled with smiles and banter to guide them the two fall into a competition with one another under the courts guidance.  Who can make a name for themselves among Gothams infamous rogues? Who is going to succeed and bring along the praises of the court?  Who is going to stay out of the bats radar one Batman and his partner Nightwing who only appeared two years prior?        Want to find out? I have a one shot that set in this universe with more stories soon to come!  as the crooked smile fades by echoing_illusions on a03!     feel free to leave your thoughts there or even here if you‚Äôd like!!  I have two twitter accounts under @applepi_writing and @echo_inks as well if you want to see snippetsüëÄ
I could imagine adopting a nine year old at 25/early 20‚Äôs fully developed frontal lobe or not

post_body: The Batfam being some of the best detectives out there can tell when each other is trying to sneak up on them through the most minuscule clues that random people aren‚Äôt on the lookout for.  Damian has a habit of burning Bakoor and sometimes the smell lingers on his suit. He also transfers tiny amounts of cat hairs onto places which is how Dick always knows when he‚Äôs been in the apartment. Stephanie has a very particular way of scratching locks when she opens them. Lightbulbs LEDs shadows et cetera despite Duke‚Äôs best attempts either get brighter or duller when he‚Äôs around. Jason can usually tell if Dick‚Äôs around because one of his knees is permanently creaky. Tim‚Äôs retractable staff rattles just barely when he jumps around. Jason himself can get detected by the amount of gunpowder on him or the smallest squeaking of the leather jacket he prefers. Bruce can get by super-senses on occasion but all his kids know when he‚Äôs around immediately. He uses trackers to keep tabs on all his kids and there‚Äôs usually an arms race to get around his increasingly complicated tracking tools before he can replace them.   Cass of course is impossible to catch except by Alfred who has an ESP-like sixth sense for all of them and is always unimpressed by attempts to scare him.
Batman  By Christopher Pichette

post_body: Honestly it would be hilarious if Clark and Bruce started dating and Clark was unaware that Bruce was batman or knew his identity.  At some point Bruce kisses him as superman after a rescue and Clark is emotionally going through it coz his boyfriend kissed another guy. Even if that guy is technically him he‚Äôs still mad and jealous of himself somehow coz even superman can‚Äôt compete with Superman. He‚Äôs not even sure whether or not to confronted Bruce about his affair since it keeps happening.   While he‚Äôs trying to figure all this out Batmanof all people kisses him. And he does it so casually. Sure Clark had a crush on him for a while but he‚Äôs over it now and he‚Äôs in a committed relationship that he thought batman knew about. Now he‚Äôs extra scared of confronting Bruce because he doesn‚Äôt want it to look like he‚Äôs just starting a fight so he can be with batman. And he‚Äôs still hoping there‚Äôs a way to work through this and for them to be together. He‚Äôs being haunted by his moral code to just talk about this and get it over with but he‚Äôs still afraid of losing Bruce and living in the shadow of the idolized version of himself again.   *Meanwhile in the batcave*  La la la Bruce twirling around liking a fairy princess living his best life: my boyfriend‚Äôs the best and every thing is perfect. Maybe world peace is real. Is this what happiness feels like?   The bat kids have tried giving him several rabies shots and an exorcism.

post_body: Most unrealistic part of DC universe is that every time Batman beats the shite out of the joker he doesn‚Äôt ‚Äúmysteriously pass away‚Äù in police or medical workers custody.     I can accept aliens murder monks demons and all other fantastical shit that happens in that world but the idea of an unpaid/underpaid medical intern finally snapping because murders Georg is in their rotation and they ‚Äúaccidentally‚Äù overdose him with morphine or whatever is never thought of? Does batman just supervise the joker at the hospital?      Batman: *several stab wounds he is bleeding profusely on the floor but he is refusing medical treatment staring at the nurse* I went to med school once do it right or I‚Äôll ensure this malpractice goes on your record.  Joker: *several straps restraining him to the bed tripping balls* HATSUNE MIKU!?-

Steph: Idiots to lovers 20k words angst with a happy ending.  ‚Äî  Dick: You know when Tim comes over damian can get a little‚Ä¶   Steph: Psycho?   Duke: Scary?   Cass: Drunk?   Dick: All three.  ‚Äî  Damian to Duke: How do you tell someone politely you want to hit them with a brick?  ‚Äî  Reader: Just think about this! I‚Äôm your hottest friend.   Reader: No that‚Äôs Cass‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm your nicest friend.   Reader: No that‚Äôs Dick‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm your friend!  ‚Äî  Jason: When we get back I‚Äôm going to step on you!   Reader: Okay as much as I might enjoy that Jason‚Äì  ‚Äî  Reader: Anyone else feel good when their brain releases a bunch of endorphins?   Cass: Can‚Äôt relate. post_body: Fun little thought I thought I‚Äôd share üòã  Imagine it‚Äôs the big showdown between Red Hood and Batman Joker‚Äôs unconscious form slumped nearby completely bound.   Red hood Jason demands that Batman kill him. That after everything he‚Äôs done all the people he‚Äôs killed he pleads with his dad to kill the Batman (although he‚Äôd never admit that he still loves the man as a father not yet).  There‚Äôs some dramatic back and forth where Batman refuses and Red Hood insists pleads that Batman Bruce kill the joker until Bruce rips off the cowl and reveals that he did!  He did kill the Joker! He wore his favorite suit and grabbed two $1000 watches and used them as brass knuckles and beat the fucker to death! He burned his body and buried the ashes outside of the goddamn Fortress of Solitude so no one would find them! He folded up the bloodied suit and boxed them with the broken watches and put them a hidden compartment in the base of Jason‚Äôs memorial in the cave where no one would ever touch or find them! He waited until Superman was off world so he wouldn‚Äôt stop him again and told no one of what he did!      And how that ends is up to y‚Äôall. I just think that it‚Äôs interesting how there are canonically 3 Jokers (possibly more if dc changes their mind) and wouldn‚Äôt it be fun if Bruce knowingly murdered one of them only for another to pop up and make him suicidal to the point where a little Timothy Drake needs to blackmail his way into being Robin so he doesn‚Äôt kill himself?

post_body: Everyone always talks about Bruce‚Äôs short time in med school but nobody ever talks about when he went to law school aka when he tortured all of Gotham U with Brucie Wayne.  Bruce needed to study law criminology forensics psychology sociology penology to improve Gotham so he enrolled in Gotham U again. However he was going to play the role of the annoying rich brat aka introducing Brucie Wayne to the world. HE PAID PEOPLE TO BE HIS FRIENDS. They tried to expel him he just paid the administration to keep him. But also he would disguise himself to ask questions to the teachers. And illegally enter the building to go through his professors‚Äô belongings to learn more advanced stuffs‚Ä¶ You know he showed up ‚Äúdrunk‚Äù or ‚Äúhangover‚Äù to class and was loud af about it.  100% Bruce has a degree in law because of his time there but he bought it (and everyone know he bought it) instead of actually earning it which he was 100% capable of. (Gotham is corrupted af he can easily do that)  Yeah he is the worst thing that ever happened to Gotham U and everyone hates him there. (Yes worse than criminals. Every college has a couple of graduates that commit crimes later on. How many of them have a rich brat bringing a LAND PHONE because Bruce was in college before mobile phones existed so he can loudly gossip on the phone during class and cannot be expelled because he is the one founding the new library???)  Also funny to imagine this is when he met Harvey and for some reason he was his only real friend. (Maybe they had to work together on a project and Bruce felt too bad about ruining someone else grade by being a dick so he did show up to work with Harvey. And even tho he did his best to keep the mask on while not ruining Harvey‚Äôs grade he let out how much he actually cares about Gotham and wants to improve it. They bonded over that and now Harvey is the only one to know that Bruce Wayne isn‚Äôt a rich brat but someone who cares about others.)  Btw him saying that ‚ÄúIt wouldn‚Äôt have done for playboy Bruce Wayne to criticize the entire penology system‚Äù means that Bruce disagrees with the penology system in the USA which is a punitive system and also the death penalty as penology modern studies are against it for being immoral and unethical. His education in the subject means that Bruce could actually use researches and works to explain why he is against killing and I think it would be so funny to have him quoting Rousseau Voltaire and Montesquieu to Jason.

You know given that half the Bat family has been within the ages of 9-18 when they became Bats and that Ace would have existed during those times I‚Äôm sure there has been at least one moment where it would have been completely understandable to hear a villain dressed as a monster to shout ‚ÄúAnd I would have gotten away with it if it weren‚Äôt for you meddling kids and your dumb mutt!‚Äù and NOT have it be about Mystery Inc

post_body: Damien of course is a Wayne in the obvious ways. The same hair the same attitude even the same laugh though without much evidence it‚Äôs hard to tell. At a glance you‚Äôd know he‚Äôs the blood son.  Tim is like Bruce most when wrapped in a finely tailored suit. He would hold his glass with the same elegance smile with all the same practiced enthusiasm chat about the same useless topics with the same kinds of useless people. All while holding back the same groans.  Jason fights like the Bat. They all do to a certain extent but watching him you‚Äôd see the targets he chooses. The liver the side of the knee. No matter the opponent he fights to put an end to things. And he fights the same whether it‚Äôs a standard run in with a mugger off the street or a last stand with a body that‚Äôs bruised and broken.   And Dick?   If you were to go back in time to a little boy clutching his parents‚Äô bloodied bodies you‚Äôd see something old in those eyes. It‚Äôd be subtle hidden behind teary unfocused irises. But if you looked hard enough it‚Äôd be there and it would see you for what you are whatever that may be. It would read the words you keep closest to your heart and air them out for you plain as day. And it would terrify you whether it was an empty ally dead quiet save for the sounds raindrops hitting pavement or a circus tent roaring with horrified screams. Either way it‚Äôd be the same thing staring back at you. The same terrible broken thing.

post_body: Beyond the Bat: Pt I ü¶á  So I read a story a couple of months ago. It was about Terry McGinnis searching for and bringing all that Batboys (Ex:DickJasonTim and Damian) back to the manor as an aging Bruce Wayne begins to die. I liked the story and premise of it. It made be think of stuff I wrote a long time ago and maybe I could write something similar but different. Especially with a reader instead of Terry. So let me know what you think. ;)  Batfamily x batsis!reader  Synopsis: Three years since Bruce‚Äôs disappearance and with all of Batman‚Äôs former Robins gone Gotham is under protection of the Batwoman but she will need help to take on one of Gotham biggest Civil Wars ever.  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî  A seasoned and experienced Vickie Vale comes on the screen of a television. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs been three years since the mysterious disappearance of Billionaire-Philanthropist Bruce Wayne Wayne was on a flight to Shanghai for a business trip when the flight was thrown off course. Still to this day the flight crew or Mr. Wayne have been seen. Wayne Enterprise Chairman Lucius Fox released a statement.‚Äù   ‚Äî  ‚ÄúToday marks three years since Mr. Wayne disappearance. I-I was originally supposed to born the plane but Bruce‚Ä¶he felt that he needed to go instead.‚Äù He swallows‚Äù After consulting with authorities and with permission from the Wayne Estate I come before you to declare Bruce Wayne as dead. Normally this is something done after seven yearsbut the family has asked for this closure. We respect their wishes. No further common.‚Äù He leaves as several reports and journals ask question after question.  ‚Äî‚Äî  Vickie returns ‚ÄúThis was from the press conference earlier today. A private memorial service will be held for Wayne early next week. We from the GCN family as well as Gotham Thank you for your contribution Mr.Wayne and may you find peace wherever you are. I‚Äôm Vickie Vale and have a good night.‚Äù  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî  Gotham City was a sea of old rotten gothic buildings and shiny overgrown skyscrapers. Gotham had been the early stages of becoming more a city of tomorrow. Though the plans had fallen without Bruce. Most of north Gotham was now being rebuilt and renovated the lights of the older city still shinned just a light more dim due to the new LED light that consumed the night.  Sirens filled the night and busy traffic and honking on every corner. Three squad cars fly down the road chasing after two armed trucks.  Gunfire rings the night and civilian duck away from the street.   ‚ÄúPull over! This is GCPD!‚Äù The cars race onto the bridge and barrel pass cars causing some minor accidents in its wake.  ‚ÄúLennyshould we stop?‚Äù A rookie driver swerves from running into a gas truck. The goon beside him pulls off his skii mask and takes an assault rifle.  ‚ÄúAnd risk getting thrown into a cell I‚Äôd rather die than let the boss know we got caught keep drivin.‚Äù   Lenny takes the gun and starts firing towards the squad cars. Taking out of the tires causing it to crash into a three car accident.   ‚ÄúPigs still too slow for Rupert Throne men.‚Äù The car speeds up and then faint sound a ringing as the goons look at each other.  ‚ÄúDid you hear that?‚Äù The car jerks as they‚Äôre rammed into. ‚ÄúThe fuck?‚Äù  The turn to see the Batmobile flying towards them.  ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs the fucking Bat!‚Äù The driver floors the gas and takes the exit into East Gotham. The take a sharp turn and rush down the road.  The Batmobile rams into the truck again and the driver runs over a bus stop and light rail.  ‚ÄúDo something!‚Äù He shouts. Lenny takes the gun and fires at the car. The bullets fly off the car without a scratch.  ‚ÄúShit.‚Äù The car speeds besides them and slide swipe the truck. It barrels over the Batmobile and crashes into a store front. The goons groan. Lenny takes a pistol and leans out the window.  The Batmobile is parked on the other side of the room but it‚Äôs not moving.   ‚ÄúWhere‚Äôd he gooooooo-‚Äú he fires the gun as he yanked from the window and the sound of punches and grunts are heard. The lanky drive makes a run for it but only get five feet before his foot his tied and he pulled across the ground and pulled up toward the truck.  ‚ÄúHelp!!‚Äù  The figure leaps down and towers over him. It draws closure until the grab him by the shirt.  ‚ÄúWhere‚Äôs Throne?‚Äù A gruff female voice snarls.  ‚ÄúLook-lady I don‚Äôt know.‚Äù He punched in the stomach.   ‚ÄúI won‚Äôt ask twice.‚Äù She grips him tighter.   ‚ÄúHe fled this morning we were supposed to take this stuff to the docks and that‚Äôs it I swear.‚Äù He cries.  Batwoman grins ‚ÄúThat was so hard was it.‚Äù And she punches him in the face knocking him out cold.   Squad cars and a transport truck arrive seconds later. Another black Police van arrives and Commissioner Barbara Gordon wheels her way to the scene.  ‚ÄúAnother one of Throne men?‚Äù The older woman pushes her glass up. She huffs ‚ÄúAny word on where he went?‚Äù  ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs left this morning knowing him he told his men one place and went in the complete opposite direction.‚Äù Batwoman holds a phone out and hands it to the Commissioner.  ‚ÄúYou think he‚Äôd left something at his mansion he‚Äôs not a sharp as he used to be. He‚Äôs getting sloppy with his trails.‚Äù She turns in her chair as Batwoman hoped into his car.  ‚ÄúI‚Äôll find out.‚Äù The car raced down the street towards the outskirts of the city.  ‚ÄúAlfred.‚Äù Alfred appears on the screen. He‚Äôs more weather and more grey than normal but the older man is still able to assist anyway he can.  ‚ÄúI see you have stopped the stolen goods from reaching the Harbour I take it as that will conclude your night?‚Äù  ‚ÄúNot likely Rupert Throne‚Äôs men said he fled town this morning any activity on his bank accounts or the offshore ones?‚Äù  ‚ÄúYou‚Äôd think a man of his age would learn to stop his shenanigansbut I digress. Three days ago $100000 was withdrawn from his checking account. Nothing sense.‚Äù   Batwoman nods ‚ÄúI‚Äôm heading to his house Barbara thinks he‚Äôs getting sloppy and I agree.‚Äù   ‚ÄúVery well ma‚ÄôamI will be here if you need anything.‚Äù   ‚Äî‚Äî-  Batwoman drops down in front of the doors to the office and pushes it open. She swiftly moves inside and feels the air is stiff.   She scans the room and sees that it looks slightly messy. Papers scattered around the room and desk the fire is long gone and it‚Äôs cold. The chairs at pushed to the ground and safe is wide open. She glides to it and scans it.  ‚ÄúHis finger prints are recent. At least..three days old.‚Äù The glances into the safe to find it empty.  She worlds around the find the door toward the hallway ajar. She ventures into the dim hallway. She turns a corner and is shocked at the scene before her.  ‚ÄúAgent A I‚Äôm sending live footage to the Batcomputer.‚Äù  ‚ÄúMy word it‚Äôs a massacre.‚Äù The hallway is full of Throne‚Äôs men dead blood painting the marble tiles and splattered across the walls.   ‚ÄúWho could have done such butchery?‚Äù Alfred asks. Batwoman check the body of one of the men.   Batwoman stands up‚Äù judging by the smell of decomposing and state of the bodies the time of death was 72 hours ago.‚Äù She passed by the remaining bodies until she comes to two large wooden doors with blood splattered and a dagger embedded in it. She pushes it and across the room his the master bed with Rupert Throne‚Äôs body.  ‚ÄúThat smell he‚Äôs been here for just as long.‚Äù  ‚ÄúDear Lord and no one knew.‚Äù   She scans his body and finds a large gash in his chest.   ‚ÄúHe was stabbed with a sword.‚Äù She scans his hand and find gun power. She finds the gun on his bed and she able to tell he used it.  She looks at the door and sees blood. She scans it and it doesn‚Äôt match the blood from the hallway or Rupert‚Äôs. She finds a blood trail the leads to the balcony. Old bloody bandages are found along with the bullet.  ‚ÄúSeems like whoever was there wasn‚Äôt able to do the job without getting injured. I can‚Äôt track any blood trails it been to long and the rain has washed it away.‚Äù   ‚ÄúI‚Äôve already notified Ms. Gordon she‚Äôs in route.   Batwoman looks toward the city across the bridge. ‚ÄúSomething‚Äôs missing Alfred and I‚Äôm going to find out.‚Äù   ‚Äî‚Äî-  The Batmobile races through the waterfall and down the platform until it stop. Batwoman climbs out and takes the lift down toward the Batcomputer where Alfred sits and the computer with a cup of tea.  ‚ÄúAnd how was the rest of the night ma‚Äôam?‚Äù She pulls off the cowl and pushes her dark locks from her face.   ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs assassins back in the city.‚Äù She begins typing and pulls up the three other crime scenes.  The two look at each one. A victim with either a single large gash or several closely net ones are the on the screen.  ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not the small killer the one that killed Throne and his men are different than these three. These victims were struggling and suffered. Throne‚Äôs was quick.‚Äù  ‚ÄúAs quick as having a sword shoved into your chest can be I presume.‚Äù H sips his tea and stands with his cane. He moved quietly as he always did but a little more slower.   Y/n sighs ‚ÄúIs he awake?‚Äù  Alfred stops at the elevator and nods. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs been up for sometime I‚Äôll prepare breakfast.‚Äù  Y/n stands up and was to the display cases. All different suits.  Starting with a few of Bruce‚Äôs old suits then the original Robin and Batgirl suits. Finally she stops at of last suits. Bruce‚Äôs last suit was in mint condition as he left it.   She turns to the empty case and start placing her gear in it.  ‚Äî-  She emerges from the office and ties her hair up waking into the kitchen.   ‚ÄúMommy!‚Äù A little boy with brown hair and blue eyes smile with syrup all over his face. Y/n wipes his cheeks and smiles.  ‚ÄúDid you sleep well?‚Äù The five year old boy nods while eating his food.   ‚ÄúFinish up so I can take you to school.‚Äù She walks toward Alfred who‚Äôs making a plate for her.   ‚ÄúIt still feels weird to leave her sometimes.‚Äù She takes the mug from him as well and sips on her coffee.  ‚ÄúMaster Bruce wanted to be sure you were safe while he was gone. I don‚Äôt think he indeed for it to be permanent but he enjoyed the company as do I.‚Äù Y/n rolled her eyes.   ‚ÄúIf you say so though I will say we enjoy it with you Alfred. Even considering the circumstances.‚Äù Alfred gives her a weak smile and begins washing dishes.  ‚ÄúI guess most Assistants don‚Äôt get his kind of attention or is it due to the fact I keep Bruce on his toes.‚Äù   Alfred smiles ‚ÄúIt had been sometime since someone annoyed him the way you did and I think it loved having someone to color with again.‚Äù He glances at Rowan who has finished his food and brings the plate to Alfred.  ‚ÄúWhat do we say Rowan?‚Äù  ‚ÄúThank you Alfie.‚Äù He sings. Alfred smiles warmly at the kid.   ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre very welcome now run along and get your shoes so you can go to school.‚Äù Rowan runs out the room and Y/n hums.  ‚ÄúThese Assassins do you think they killed Bruce?‚Äù She asks. The room is still.  ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know but I must say I wouldn‚Äôt be surprised. I‚Äôll contact Ms. Gordon and see if she has any information.‚Äù   Y/n places her mug down and walks to the foyer where Rowan has his shoes on with his backpack.  She slides into her sneakers and grabs her keys. ‚ÄúLet‚Äôs go kid.‚Äù  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî-  After dropping off Rowan Y/n pushed through the doors of Wayne Enterprises. Some of the staff waved at her while some held other emotions.   She walked past the front desk and into the elevator towards the top floor. She is met the receptionist Sara who doesn‚Äôt look up from her computer.   ‚ÄúGood Morning do you have an appointment with Mr. Fox?‚Äù  ‚ÄúReally Sara.‚Äù The ginger grins and looks toward the woman.   ‚ÄúHow are you hun?‚Äù  ‚ÄúI‚Äôm good about as good as anyone.‚Äù The double doors open and Lucius waves her inside.  ‚ÄúI‚Äôll talk with you later.‚Äù Y/n walked into the large office where Lucius turned to an old chest table and unlocked hidden elevator. They take it down in the underground bunker.  ‚ÄúSo what have you crafted this time?‚Äù She grins with her arms crossed over her chest eyeing the new prototypes.   He nods takes a blue batarang he throws it and it instantly electrifies the dummy.   ‚ÄúFancy.‚Äù   Lucius picks up a device and hands it over to Y/n. ‚ÄúThis was something Bruce wanted crafted I‚Äôm still getting it fine tuned but it‚Äôs useable. Alfred filled me on our new decline of population use it and it will instantly capture and give a small concentrated burst of energy to those wrapped in it. Should help should you get out numbered by assassins.‚Äù  ‚ÄúHow thoughtful I appreciate it. Though I‚Äôm sure you giving me new tech isn‚Äôt the only reason you wanted to see me so soon. What‚Äôs going on?‚Äù  He takes a seat and sighs. ‚ÄúBruce‚Äôs memorial is next week. They‚Äôre gonna be some changes with stuff around here. Now I‚Äôm not leaving per se but with him‚Ä¶gone. My attention will need to be focused more on the business side for a while. I‚Äôve asked Luke to come home he‚Äôll be helping craft some more stuff for you while I‚Äôm busy.‚Äù  She nods. ‚ÄúI understand I appreciate you still being able to help.‚Äù  He gets to his feet slowly ‚ÄúMy kids now I‚Äôd never leave this unless I died. But with his services coming there are something‚Äôs that will change for you too I‚Äôm sure.‚Äù  ‚ÄúI asked what will happen to the manor and the cave. Alfred it‚Äôs not just his decisionwhat does that mean?‚Äù  Lucius nods ‚ÄúBruce‚Äôs son will have to decide what will become of his estate. And they‚Äôll all have to agreenot sure how that‚Äôll go.‚Äù  The exit the elevator and the office returns to normal. ‚ÄúLet me know how the device works.‚Äù Y/n thanks him before leaving and returning to the manor.  She immediately enters the cave where Alfred is waiting.   ‚ÄúMs. Gordon is on the line for you.‚Äù Y/n sits her purse down and answers.  ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs wrong Commissioner?‚Äù   ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre not gonna believe this the mayor was just killed in his office. How fast can you get down here?‚Äù   ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî  Batwoman emerges from the corner of the office. Barbara looks frustrated as the CSI team dust for prints take pictures and exam the mayor‚Äôs corpse.  ‚ÄúWhen did you find him?‚Äù Batwoman strolls toward the body as a few tech move away.  ‚ÄúJust after lunch his wife found him.‚Äù Batwoman scans the body. She notices the same claw marks and a golden dagger imbedded in his chest.   She takes it out and glances at it. The craftsmen was old but it was just as good as if it was made yesterday.  She returns to the Commissioner who she shows the blade to in a clear bag.   ‚ÄúI‚Äôve never seen it before can‚Äôt say it isn‚Äôt something new for use.‚Äù  ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think this is a common killer this is the work of something more sinister.‚Äù Barbara nods and something catches her eye. It‚Äôs a small piece of paper with the same dagger holding it into the wall.  Batwoman takes it and unfolds the paper. She read it and turns to the Commissioner.   ‚ÄúI have to go.‚Äù Before Barbara can question her she‚Äôs already gone from the balcony.  ‚Äî‚Äî  As nightfall begins to sit in Batwoman lands on a rooftop of a hotel with the red neon lights of the building flashing.   She scans empty rooftop and comes to a stop she dodges left as three morning stars are sent flying. She throws smoke and evades another wave of the weapons.   She backflips from a sword attack and disarms the person causing them to stumble. She begins to fight the ninja and is hit a few times.  ‚ÄúYou are no match for me impostor.‚Äù She spats. The ninja kicks Batwoman back and she stumbles giving the ninja time to drive a dagger into his thigh.  ‚ÄúYou are nothing like your Predecessor. He was a lot more quicker.‚Äù She kick Batwoman who punches her in the side.  Ninja regains her balance and glares at her. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôll pay.‚Äù She picks up the sword and turns to the her.  ‚ÄúWho are you?‚Äù The ninja draws her blade at her throat.   ‚ÄúI am apart of the League of Assassins those who don‚Äôt want to be apart of the sorry and pathetic League it as become. Me and my faction are purists who only serve Ra Al Ghul and we will complete his mission. Neither you or this court will stop us.‚Äù  ‚ÄúWhat‚Äîcourt.‚Äù The ninja chuckles ‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt know the Court of Owls. Your predecessor was on to them before they killed him. They will try to take Gotham back but we will defeat them we already have the last known location of the Pits something they can‚Äôt recreate they‚Äôll to will bow before greatness‚Äî  Batwoman knocks the woman down and disarms her once more. The two are in a fight for the sword and Batwoman pulls the Assassin way and pulls off her mask.  The woman has a short black bob with a white strike throw her hair.  ‚ÄúWhoare you?‚Äù Batwoman huffs. She yells as a dagger is driven into her back.  ‚ÄúMistress are you hurt?‚Äù Another assassin yanks the blade out of Batwoman.  She grins ‚ÄúI am.‚Äù She gets her feet. ‚ÄúMy name will be the last thing you hear before the poison kills you I‚Äôm Nyssa and don‚Äôt worry about Gotham I‚Äôll take good care of it.‚Äù And true to her wound everything went blurry and fuzzy. The last thing Y/n felt was hot then cold and everything faded to black.  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî   The flashes of light sound of being and muffled voices come in and out before slowly Y/n wakes up in the cave to the faint beeping of machines. She sits up and groans as a hand is placed on her‚Äôs.   ‚ÄúBarbara?‚Äù The older woman nods and squeezes her hand.   ‚ÄúAre you alright the poison nearly killed you?‚Äù Y/n tries to sit up but is pushed back down by Barbara.  ‚ÄúYou need to rest Leslie and Alfred worked on you for hours to make you stable you need to give your body time to heal.‚Äù She offers her a cup of water which Y/n takes in on gulp.  ‚ÄúWho got me off the rooftop?‚Äù Her voice is gruff.   ‚ÄúNo Alfred called in some help.‚Äù They both turned to a woman Y/n never wanted to see at least she hoped.  ‚ÄúHi kitten.‚Äù  ‚ÄúHelloSelina.‚Äù Barbara wheeled out of the room and Selina drew closer taking her spot.   ‚ÄúAlfred called me he was worried. I happened to be back in‚Äî‚Äú  ‚Äú‚Ä¶I don‚Äôt care why you‚Äôre back or what you‚Äôve come to steal. I don‚Äôt want your help.‚Äù Selina kept a somewhat vague smile.   ‚ÄúI understand you hate me for leaving you-‚Äú  ‚ÄúMy entire life was spent in and out of neighbors houses in the system because you kept getting sent back to Blackgate. You were never there for me you or my father you talked on and on about. I‚Äôm twenty-five and still don‚Äôt know who he is or was knowing you. So I don‚Äôt need your help. Not now and not again.‚Äù Y/n laid back down and grumbled in pain turning to look at her monitor. ‚ÄúYou can go Selina.‚Äù   Selina nodded and exited the room. A few moments later Alfred entered and sighed.  ‚ÄúMs. (L/N) You do know the extent of your injury. I needed to remind you what could have happened if Ms. Kyle wasn‚Äôt in the vicinity?‚Äù   ‚Äú‚Ä¶.‚Äù  He sighs‚ÄùVery well while you were done Ms. Gordon and I had to find the Assassin next move. They‚Äôre going to kill everyone in their way in order to defeat one another I hate to say it but we do need the assistance.‚Äù  If looks could Alfred thought to himself. ‚ÄúI assume you I‚Äôm not referring to Miss Kyle you‚Äôre going to need more than one person to help you take on two deadly threats.‚Äù   Against his advice Y/n gets to her feet and exits the medical bay and made a beeline for the computer and begins typing away until four files appear on screen.  ‚ÄúHe didn‚Äôt talk much about them.‚Äù She mumbles to herself.  ‚ÄúThey all had their own problems and struggles with Master Bruce. But they all knew when he needed the help I just pray you‚Äôll ask unlike he wouldn‚Äôt.‚Äù   ‚ÄúWhere can I find themmost of these files are four years old and no known addresses for any of them?‚Äù  Alfred moved to the side as Barbara wheeled up to the computer and began typing away as if no time had passed.  ‚ÄúDick will be easy to find maybe not to recruit. He owns a martial art and gymnastic studio in East Bludheaven. Tim lives in New York he mostly keeps quiet with attending tech events. The others will take me time to find them they tend to go off the grid.‚Äù  Y/n nod ‚ÄúI drive out in the morning‚Äî‚Äú  ‚ÄúI‚Äôll take you to Bludheaven myself I‚Äôve asked Ms. Gordon to look after Master Rowan for a few nights if that‚Äôs okay will you?‚Äù  Y/n nods‚Äù I‚Äôll pack.‚Äù  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî  Stepping onto the curb as a sharp wind bits through the air. Y/n pushes open the door into a dojo. A group of kids are doing routines.  She watches for a moment taking in the warm environment before someone walks behind her.  ‚ÄúAre you picking up or are you just here for the classes?‚Äù She turns to see a man in his late thirties. Black hair with sliver streaks weathered features and bright sky colored eyes.  ‚ÄúBarbara wasn‚Äôt wrong you do look the same.‚Äù He rolls his eyes and moves past her.   ‚ÄúAdult classes are Tuesday and Thursday sign up sheet-‚Äú  ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt need lessons‚Äù she grabs his arm. ‚ÄúBut I do need your help.‚Äù   Dick removed his arm and turns to her slowly almost as if his gaze his scanning her from head to toe.  ‚ÄúSo‚Äù he leans in a lowers his voice ‚ÄúYour the new Rookie.‚Äù He smirks which in turns makes Y/n scowl.  ‚ÄúI‚Äôve been at this for three‚Äî‚Äú  ‚ÄúTry a few decades. Look I know about you you‚Äôre not the first detective and probably won‚Äôt be the last. But I‚Äôm done with capes cowls and spandex I left that life and I left Gotham.‚Äù  He walks past the students with Y/n following him.   ‚ÄúLook I don‚Äôt know what your relationship with Bruce was like-‚Äú  He scoffs and sits at his desk ‚ÄúBe thankful for that.‚Äù  She narrows her gaze at some photos. Some with other boys younger than him and some of him younger than that.  ‚ÄúI came here for help for Gotham you know as well as I do that Bruce cared about his mission. I‚Äôm not asking you to help me for him but for the people you care about that are still there. For the memories you still have there the good one and the bad ones.‚Äù Dick turns away from her.  ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry but you need to leave I can‚Äôt help you.‚Äù He stands up and opens the door for her. She shakes her head and leaves.  ‚ÄúThat was a waste of time think the others will be much help?‚Äù She slides back into the car as it drives down the street.  ‚ÄúI can‚Äôt say for sure but I‚Äôve prepared the jet for you Master Timothy is in New York and he‚Äôs attending a gala.‚Äù Y/n sighs in her seat.  For the love of God why are your sons so stubborn Bruce?

post_body: In a context where Batman is known and seen through his public League appearances the misogynistic homophobic ‚Äúalpha male‚Äù guys start using his image to illustrate their discourse of going to the gym and seeking submissive women. They admire and misinterpret his traits as endorsements of their toxic masculinity. Online they share images of Batman with stuff like ‚ÄúBe the Alpha Be the Batman‚Äù. They even use the word Batmen as a synonym to Alpha Male. ‚ÄúReal Batmen don‚Äôt show weakness‚Äù.  When Bruce becomes aware of this he hates it. He despises them for all their messed up views knowing they completely misunderstand his principles. Batman‚Äôs true strength lies in his commitment to justice empathy and respect for all individuals values that are fundamentally opposed to the toxic masculinity they promote. Bruce is determined to distance his image from their rhetoric seeing them as nothing more than sexist and homophobic idiots.  So he decides to be a tiny tiny bit more Brucie when they appear in public. Not in form but in substance :  When he‚Äôs asked a question he tries to go ‚ÄúI have no clue I‚Äôd have to ask Black Canary.‚Äù or ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not sure I‚Äôd have to see what Wonder Woman thinks about that‚Äù or ‚ÄúThis time we really couldn‚Äôt have done anything anything at all without Supergirl.‚Äù  Also Batman becomes more visibly affectionate with Superman. During public appearances if he senses a camera on them he makes sure to be seen clinging to Superman. He would rather face dating rumors every day than be associated with those idiotic discourses.   (It‚Äôs also a good premise for a superbat fake-dating fic !!)

How stupid is Batman? I‚Äôm honestly not sure how this works. According to this Batman fired the Joker four years ago and replaced him with Alfred. It appears now that Batman is considering firing Alfred and bringing back the Joker. With this meme is the suggestion that the Joker had been working as Batman‚Äôs assistant and then was fired. That Batman would even consider hiring a man who he caused to be insane by dropping him into a vat of chemicals to assist him behind the scenes was bad enough. But then he hires Alfred who clearly was in decline four years ago. Gotham City is at serious risk if Batman was willing to hire either a psychopath or a senile person (who should be in a nursing home) to assist him in fighting crime. So where is Robin (Dick Grayson) to help Batman out here? I‚Äôm guessing Robin left because he was sick of Alfred sniffing his hair or wanting to show Robin how the hairs on his leg turned blonde in the Sun. If Batman is this incompetent then maybe it makes sense the Suicide Squad might need to rub him out in the Arkham Asylum.

non-masked character design didn‚Äôt really change) but i‚Äôd like to think bruce sang tim to sleep. or just sang to him in general. like in the rare moments he gets to relax he puts on like an old frank sinatra record cause i definitely peg bruce (i could just end the sentence there but i wont) for a jazz standards great american songbook tin pan alley old musical theatre standards etc. kind of guy. ‚Äúam i blue‚Äù might be his favorite but he also enjoys ‚Äúthe riddle song‚Äù which i recommend the sam cooke version (the song choices here are basically me just projecting bruce is just like me fr) ‚Äúmoon river‚Äù etc. this is the stuff you‚Äôre gonna hear while bruce is reading with a nice cup of coffee on a rainy day and he even sends sheet music of his favorite arrangements to the musicians he hires for galas. it brings him peace cause this is the kind of music his father showed him so he‚Äôs passing it down to tim like a family heirloom of sorts. bruce is very musically talented he was definitely a rich kid who took piano lessons and while he‚Äôs not the next beethoven he can play a pretty sweet rendition of ‚Äúdream a little dream of me‚Äù. tim will just sit at the piano and stare and bruce will sit beside him and start playing and he puts tim‚Äôs hands on his and oh god give me a sec i‚Äôll start crying. and the thing is bruce is always making music. he has a lovely melodic and deep voice and humming is second nature as well as whistling. sometimes tim asks bruce to sing him to sleep and sometimes bruce is already singing as he puts tim to bed and will finish his song as the boy‚Äôs eyes are fluttering shut.   i just got really emo about timmy todd‚Äôs relationship w/ bruce in TNBA they are SOOOO father and son and my favorite iteration of the characters (comic purists are rolling over in their graves but idc). i love scenes when bruce is so father to tim like in ‚Äúcold comfort‚Äù when freeze threatens to kill tim the surrogate son as a way of harming bruce and the fear in tim‚Äôs eyes is that of a scared kid and he‚Äôs not even in robin mode. he‚Äôs just scared out of his mind. or scenes when he‚Äôs doing homework in the manor living room. or even the very small sentence in the comics where bruce says ‚Äútim‚Äôs asleep in the east wing‚Äù which to me implies bruce puts tim to bed himself.   if i could have eight more seasons of TNBA and at least 150 more issues of the comic series within that universe i‚Äôd be a happy happy woman.   okay this was word vomit and made no sense but this is what im contributing for the day.

post_body: Today in my life I have engaged homophobes in conversation in a comment section for the DC Pride 2024 comic.  So far they have coined the phrase ‚Äúhomo-fascist snowflakes‚Äù told me to get back on my meds and stated that gay people have more rights than straight people.     Some fun quotes from the bigots:  ‚ÄúHere‚Äôs a tissue wipe the blood from your tongue.‚Äù   This one‚Äôs kinda fire actually     ‚ÄúAre you ok upstairs child? Skipped any meds recently?‚Äù  Unoriginal and inaccurate. I‚Äôm on way too much meds.     ‚ÄúLast time I checked gays had more rights than the straights and whole government spend more backwards to appease them especially in the UK.‚Äù   I guess someone doesn‚Äôt pay attention to the news or knows how transphobic the legislation of their country is.     ‚ÄúYeah because that‚Äôs is normal. When we read comics we want to see things that are fantastic wish fulfillment not the writers personal politics or agendas.‚Äù  Some context. They claimed that Tim Drake liking a guy introduces sexual content to a medium marketed to kids. I mentioned the constant sexualization of female characters and the multiples times that Batman has canonically fucked and that was their reply. Also objectively funny that they think only comics with gay people in them are political (say hello to Captain America punching Hitler everyone) and that they assume every comic book fan is straight.     ‚ÄúThe problem is is that there are no actual artists or writers who are writing gay people in the stories just activists who want to push their personal brand and politics at the expense of storytelling.‚Äù  I directed them to the numerous amazing comic books with queer characters (Batwoman Runaways everything with Loki) and pointed out the multiple renowmed comic book writers who are queer (Grant Morrison James Tynion IV the usual roster) and because this was about Robin mentioned that the late and great Kevin Conroy was married to a man.     So far so good. Waiting on more replies to share. Wish me luck!

post_body: Today in my life I have engaged homophobes in conversation in a comment section for the DC Pride 2024 comic.  So far they have coined the phrase ‚Äúhomo-fascist snowflakes‚Äù told me to get back on my meds and stated that gay people have more rights than straight people.     Some fun quotes from the bigots:  ‚ÄúHere‚Äôs a tissue wipe the blood from your tongue.‚Äù   This one‚Äôs kinda fire actually     ‚ÄúAre you ok upstairs child? Skipped any meds recently?‚Äù  Unoriginal and inaccurate. I‚Äôm on way too much meds.     ‚ÄúLast time I checked gays had more rights than the straights and whole government spend more backwards to appease them especially in the UK.‚Äù   I guess someone doesn‚Äôt pay attention to the news or knows how transphobic the legislation of their country is.     ‚ÄúYeah because that‚Äôs is normal. When we read comics we want to see things that are fantastic wish fulfillment not the writers personal politics or agendas.‚Äù  Some context. They claimed that Tim Drake liking a guy introduces sexual content to a medium marketed to kids. I mentioned the constant sexualization of female characters and the multiples times that Batman has canonically fucked and that was their reply. Also objectively funny that they think only comics with gay people in them are political (say hello to Captain America punching Hitler everyone) and that they assume every comic book fan is straight.     ‚ÄúThe problem is is that there are no actual artists or writers who are writing gay people in the stories just activists who want to push their personal brand and politics at the expense of storytelling.‚Äù  I directed them to the numerous amazing comic books with queer characters (Batwoman Runaways everything with Loki) and pointed out the multiple renowmed comic book writers who are queer (Grant Morrison James Tynion IV the usual roster) and because this was about Robin mentioned that the late and great Kevin Conroy was married to a man.     So far so good. Waiting on more replies to share. Wish me luck!

Like I do love the DC Trinity as Buddies Who Like Each Other but also there is absolutely something to be said for storylines where they get up in each other‚Äôs shit and you get to see the lines that divide their philosophies and it‚Äôs almost like a force of nature. Superman showing up in Death in the Family and actively trying to talk Batman back from causing an insane international incident out of his grief for Jason‚Äìthat combination of Superman‚Äôs compassion and respect for law meeting up with Bruce‚Äôs sheer grief and rage over injustice. Batman showing up as a force that‚Äôs pretty much as implacable as the Furies in Wonder Woman‚Äôs The Hiketeia his own ‚ÄúThere are some lines you don‚Äôt cross‚Äù philosophies and modernity clashing against Diana‚Äìwho totally doesn‚Äôt have a ‚Äòno kill‚Äô rule but is also operating off of this insane combination of compassion and hospitality and Gods-Doomed Greek Vengeance Shit.

Like I do love the DC Trinity as Buddies Who Like Each Other but also there is absolutely something to be said for storylines where they get up in each other‚Äôs shit and you get to see the lines that divide their philosophies and it‚Äôs almost like a force of nature. Superman showing up in Death in the Family and actively trying to talk Batman back from causing an insane international incident out of his grief for Jason‚Äìthat combination of Superman‚Äôs compassion and respect for law meeting up with Bruce‚Äôs sheer grief and rage over injustice. Batman showing up as a force that‚Äôs pretty much as implacable as the Furies in Wonder Woman‚Äôs The Hiketeia his own ‚ÄúThere are some lines you don‚Äôt cross‚Äù philosophies and modernity clashing against Diana‚Äìwho totally doesn‚Äôt have a ‚Äòno kill‚Äô rule but is also operating off of this insane combination of compassion and hospitality and Gods-Doomed Greek Vengeance Shit.

post_body: Rok Soo Wayne??? Wayne Rok Soo??? Don‚Äôt have much to say to this just:   Tim Drake and Kim Rok Soo would hate each other on account of being the same sort of control freak over-planning under-sharing asshole. And I was thinking about them hating each other but causing the same brand of unmitigated morally dubious chaos and then I thought to my self‚Ä¶.   Huh‚Ä¶ Rok Soo is a dark haired orphan with a tragic back story a love for money and a tendency towards costumed vigilantism.   And then:   Bruce Wayne adopts KRS???    And yeah it could be Bruce adopts lil kid KRS who is still too smart for his own good but is a weedy little shit who can‚Äôt fight to save his own life and cares so much about people. Rok Soo who can‚Äôt emote for shit but proves in ways that baffle emotionally incompetent Bruce to his core that he still loves and cares for people deeply beyond what he can express. Like lil baby Rok Soo who knows Bruce is Batman who doesn‚Äôt hide from this knowledge but also very firmly keeps himself away from the nightlife because his brand of self-preservation is usually pretty good. (Until it really really isn‚Äôt‚Ä¶) Rok Soo who schemes and has dollar signs for eyes and who indulges in the one form of love Bruce is 100% comfortable showing and utilising (Gift Giving|| Get that bag Rok Soo!) Very cute dynamic I admit.   But I think it just. Would be 100% better if KRS was adopted but also still like. A full grown adult. Because Buff Bruce and Buff Rok Soo giving Brucie puppy eyes for some more money? And Bruce thinking he‚Äôs finally got a child who won‚Äôt give him a heart attack just for Rok Soo to set bombs off with Red Robin bc someone was being a bit too creepy about Damian in their presence. And Rok Soo looking like the tankest of tanks but still being the weakest in the BatFam because like‚Ä¶He trained to survive these fuckers relish in this chaos.   Idk man I just think it would be a funny cute lil thing.

Em entrevista ao podcast Variety‚Äôs Award Circuit Collin Farrel confirmou que a produ√ß√£o ter√° 8 epis√≥dios.  ‚ÄúSer√° uma coisa de oito partes em torno da ascens√£o de Oz ao poder preenchendo o v√°cuo de poder criado quando Carmine Falcone foi morto"; disse Colin.  ‚ÄúA ideia de Matt era que a s√©rie do Pinguim come√ßasse cerca de uma semana ap√≥s o final do filme do Batman. E se funcionar se a trajet√≥ria for interessante o p√∫blico apostar nisso e fizermos nosso trabalho direito o segundo filme continuar√° onde o programa da HBO terminar√°‚Äù disse Colin falando onde a s√©rie se encaixaria na linha do tempo de Matt. Apesar do Batman de Matt Reeves n√£o estar na linha oficial do DCU a sequencia foi confirmada assim como as s√©ries Penguin e Arkham.  O elenco conta com Colin Farrell Carmen Ejogo Fran√ßois Chau David H. Holmes Michael Kelly Rhenzy Feliz Shohreh Aghdashloo Deidre O'Connell Dylan Clark Lauren LeFranc Clancy Brown Michael Zegen James Madio Scott Cohen e Cristin Milioti que foi anunciada no ano passado como a int√©rprete de Sofia Falcone protagonista feminina da s√©rie. post_body: The Penguin was another one of those characters I was pleasantly surprised by when I heard Nick voice him. I feel like Nick captured exactly what I wanted him to sound like and all I told him was ‚Äúa mix between the Arkham game series Penguin and the Batman audio adventures Penguin.‚Äù Like the Mad Hatter and Killer Moth he didn‚Äôt have much of a story until I heard Nick voice him. I really have to give credit where credit is due when it comes to some of these characters because without these voice actors I probably would‚Äôve just make half of these rouges two-dimensional and have one purpose for the story. They basically are my entire motivation to continue writing the scripts for episodes when I don‚Äôt really feel like it and they are really encouraging so thanks to the voice actors!!  Character-wise I wanted to play off of the riddler and have a contrast between the two because of how much they interact. Both are very smart rich and successful in their own way. The thing that sets them apart is that they have a different ‚Äútype of narcissism.‚Äù I don‚Äôt know the technical terms (that‚Äôs for later script writer me to find out) but Ernest will talk about this more in season 2. Oswald is the type of narcissist that views himself as above everyone but is driven through insecurity and a craving for attention. Edward is the type of narcissist that won‚Äôt gloat over others and say he‚Äôs better directly but rather manipulates and hurt people because he believes he is better than them. His narcissism is driven through his past inferiority even if he denies it.  This dynamic also is played off with Two Face being his character is all about his internal battle against himself and his drive to help. Oswald is so full of himself he sometimes does things for his gain and doesn‚Äôt realize the consequences until it‚Äôs too late. This causes their alliance to be unstable which is the only thing keeping these two from trying to kill each other all the time.  I like the play with relationship dynamics like these a lot so this type of dynamic where ‚Äúthey could be the same person but what sets them apart is ‚Äù is seen a lot. Calendar Man and Ellie Poison Ivy and Two Face Oliver Ruby-Blu and Ace Paige the list goes on.  Anyways there‚Äôs my yapping for the day

post_body: Ok so like everyone‚Äôs always going on about how the Joker is peak immoral Batman villain and needs to be killed ASAP and yes that freak needs to be permanently stopped immediately under any means necessary  BUT He is not the one you should be most scared of and that should have every hand on deck working to stop with any and all power possible no that honor belongs to Professor Pyg  Because the Joker will murder torture SA hell even brainwash you with torture for a laugh but Pyg? He‚Äôll take away everything that makes you you. He permanently alters your brain and body into something inhuman monstrous demonic (actually that‚Äôs all an insult to Superman Solomon Grundy Etrigan they at least have thought)  Pyg fundamentally takes everything from you  The Joker can take your life in hellishly painful ways or leave you with mental and physical scars that are incapable of fully healing he can brainwash but as seen with Tim he‚Äôs not effective at fully breaking you there‚Äôs a chance of escape even after the damage has been done  Pyg doesn‚Äôt just alter your mind he alters your brain your body your face with physical precision that would take magic or time travel to fix he leaves nothing of you and you can‚Äôt even have the peace of an afterlife or knowledge that you slip into the ether to stop existing he uses the remnants of your body for his purposes  If your lucky you‚Äôll get to be like Scarlet and only lose your physical identity most of his victims don‚Äôt get that  There are much worse things then pain and death

Say it is not equal to do it so I‚Äôm glad to say that I just started with the character design sheets so everything is neat before drawing the comic itself and already cleared all the topics I want to develop in it. Honestly I think that Sprig adopting a superhero persona in the episode ‚ÄòSpider Sprig‚Äô was pretty fitting since Sprig fits both the campy and silly and the dark and grim sides of being a superhero. After all as shown in the episode ‚ÄòHandy Anne‚Äô Sprig had all kinds of gimmicky slingshots and having gimmicky weapons was a common trope for superheroes as shown in Detective Comics Vol 1 #244 back during the Silver Age Of Comics where the superhero Batman had all kinds of gimmicky batarangs. And on a darker note as shown in the episode ‚ÄòAfter The Rain‚Äô Sprig lost his parents at a very young age and losing a loved one is also a common trope for a superhero‚Äôs origin story as shown in the Batman Year One comic where Batman also lost his parents at a very young age.

He raised him and cared for him even in adulthood he shares more quirks with him that his blood parents ever could by being taken away when he was so young; Alfred had to deal with the aftermath and his own words and teachings ended up replacing Martha and Thoma‚Äôs faster than he can remember when looking back.
