post_body: The Batman & Scooby-Doo! Mysteries issue #5 by Mathew Cody 5/5  This post is for fan entertainment I‚Äôm not being paid.  Ok I won‚Äôt lie I love this issue it takes place in the classic creepy haunted house but something that I will bring up in this issue. That the art of this Batman is different from the last 3 issues (that I have) I can‚Äôt really pinpoint the design of Batman and Robin designs in issue 4 but issue 5 this Batman looks like he steps out of The Animated Series (I prefer this one but I love the Animated series a lot that‚Äôs childhood.) Along with Kirk Langstrom.  This issue focuses on Batman trying to help one of his rouges Dr. Kirk Langstrom.    Dr. Langstrom is trying to find a cure for his whole Man-Bat situation and they tracked down a scientist named‚Ä¶Dr. Jekyll he believes that the research that Dr. Jekyll is the key to stopping the Man-Bat transformation.  Now just some clarification this Dr. Jekyll looks like the Dr. Jekyll from the episode ‚ÄúNowhere to Hyde‚Äù from the Scooby-Doo series Scooby-Doo Where Are You! (I tracked down the information through my Scooby-Doo Encyclopedia and Scooby-Doo Wiki click here to read it this was a very good episode)  Batman has invited Mystery Inc. to help him and Dr Langstrom in looking for the research because Mystery Inc. has been inside the mansion before.  So once in the mansion what does everyone do they spilt the party Langstrom Shaggy & Scooby get the basement Fred and Daphne got the library/upstairs and Batman and Velma get the main floor.  However poor Shaggy and Scooby have to deal with Man-Bat  Now I am leaving this issue here because this issue is one of my favorites because it‚Äôs not centered around anything in the Batman mythos but more of the Mystery Inc. mythos.  For the people that haven‚Äôt seen the episode where Dr. Jekyll was introduced I don‚Äôt want to spoil technically two mysteries.
Kevin Conroy-esque ‚ÄúUGH!‚Äù

secondary_tags: ['batfam'  'batfam incorrect quotes'  'dc'  'dc incorrect quotes'  'tim drake'  'dick grayson'  'jason todd'  'bruce wayne'  'damian wayne'  'barbara gordon']
post_body: Barbara: I swear to god I‚Äôm the only one here with a braincell.   Everyone else: ALL HAIL the keeper of the sacred braincell!

Batgirl Returns (and feeling rather catty) All images owned by DC Comics and Warner Bros-Discovery. I swear I‚Äôm too small-fry to sue  Thanks to Batgirlspain for the inspiration  (All videos are courtesy of Batman: The Animated Series)  Introduced in 1967 (one year before her first televised appearance) Batgirl is hailed as a feminist icon and a mainstay in the Bat Family (in fact in New Adventures she was in the opening credits alongside the Dynamic Duo from the first episode)  But it was over 15 years after New Adventures that Batgirl would return to the small screen in the Dini-verse (I will NOT be discussing her time on the Big Screen) and though the Caped Crusaders don‚Äôt learn her identity and fully integrate her into the Bat Family until New Batman Adventures she was able to hold her own against Two-Face and clear her father Commissioner Gordon‚Äôs name in her first ever case.  This is the tale of her second case. If you would like to watch it it‚Äôs available on Max or behind your favorite paywall.  We open at Gotham State University where‚Ä¶  ‚Ä¶a priceless jade cat statue is stolen from the University museum.  Meanwhile Batman is in trouble (the deadly kind) from‚Ä¶  Oh this can‚Äôt be good. Fortunately Batgirl is on hand to send them running. Batman is grateful.  ‚Ä¶wow!   But just before they kiss‚Ä¶  ‚Ä¶Barbara Gordon is woken from her dream by Dick Grayson wanting to take her out for a pizza. She politely declines and is about to return to her nap studies when the evening paper is slid under get door.  Suddenly her studies don‚Äôt seem so important.  Later at Gotham University Museum there‚Äôs another break-in.  Catwoman examines the display where the statue was when Batgirl emerges from the shadows accusing her of the crime. Catwoman points out that the method of the theft (using acid on the security) isn‚Äôt her style.  Batgirl decides to believe that she didn‚Äôt do it (but not that she wouldn‚Äôt) when‚Ä¶  Catwoman takes the opportunity to retreat but Robin (with Batgirl in tow) chases after her. However Catwoman snares Robin and escapes. Robin blames Batgirl.  Who knew robins were so territorial?  The next day Barbara sees a cat-shaped message on the student bulletin board addressed to ‚ÄúThe Winged Mouse‚Äù (Catwoman called Batgirl ‚Äúa mouse with wings‚Äù the previous night)  That evening at Bayshore Pier Batgirl arrives to find Catwoman waiting complimenting Batgirl on her abilities.  Since she and Catwoman want to recover the jade cat Batgirl agrees‚Ä¶ on the condition that Catwoman surrender to the police if Batgirl finds out she‚Äôs lying (like she‚Äôd keep her end of the bargain)  Meanwhile at the Batcave Bruce is in Paris on WayneCorp business meaning Robin is on his own to deal with Catwoman (OK Batgirl is also on the case but he‚Äôs not thrilled about that either)  Elsewhere Catwoman has taken Batgirl to a dive bar.  After getting the bar‚Äôs attention‚Ä¶  Catwoman and Batgirl corner a thug known as ‚ÄúThe Chemist‚Äù and ask about the acid residue. He spooks and runs off prompting every thug in the joint to get involved.  Fortunately Robin is on hand to help Batgirl. After taking out the trash Batgirl realizes Catwoman is missing.    Naturally she‚Äôs gone after Daggett. After convincing him to hand over the statue he attacks her! Unfortunately he goes over the railing and falls toward a vat of acid! (isn‚Äôt one Joker enough?) Fortunately‚Ä¶  ‚Ä¶his leg is tangled in a hanging chain breaking his fall. Unfortunately Catwoman is interested in revenge and slowly lowers Daggett toward the vat. Fortunately Batgirl is on hand and takes the chain from her. Unfortunately that means Catwoman can run away with the statue. Fortunately Robin is on hand.  He sends Batgirl after Catwoman while he finishes hauling up Daggett.  On the rooftops Catwoman is about to make her escape when‚Ä¶  ‚Ä¶she‚Äôs snared by Batgirl.  Catwoman offers to make their partnership official but Batgirl declines and reminds Catwoman about their agreement at the beginning of the episode.  Surprisingly Catwoman agrees though she regrets Batgirl turned down her offer.  However  the police car holding Catwoman stops not 100 feet away and the cops are kicked out.  Well played Ms. Kyle!  With that Catwoman drives off into the sunset.  I do enjoy the chemistry between Batgirl and Catwoman. I may have to review their interactions again!

post_body: Imagine if Kryptonians got hanahaki‚Ä¶   Now imagine it with kon whenever he thinks abt Robin/Tim. When he sees Greta chasing after Tim‚Äôs approval. When he sees Stephanie and Tim interact.  Imagine Kon holding back chest-shaking coughs as red orchids threaten to choke his lungs the vibrant crimson petals catching in his throat as he watches Tim work from afar. One day he just couldn‚Äôt hold it back and his entire body shakes with the force. Tim rushing to Kon‚Äôs side trying to help him breathe but the both of them freezing as gentle scarlet petals land onto the ground one after another.  And now imagine it getting worse when Tim starts dating Bernard. The red orchids fall in dense curtains joined by golden dahlias and salty tears as Kon wheezes and chokes on the floor of his room. Gagging as the petals refuse to cease. He doesn‚Äôt need to breathe but it still hurts.   And now imagine Tim and Bernard noticing that they were the cause of the flowers pouring from Kon‚Äôs lips and so Tim asks around only to find out that the reason is because of unrequited love.  So imagine Tim and Bernard working together to try and ease Kon‚Äôs suffering and the two slowly falling in love with Kon in turn. Now think of them learning to love each other before one day there were no petals at all. The entire day goes by with no petals and they celebrate because without petals that means Kon finally feels loved.     I might write this tbh. this idea has been bouncing around in the ol‚Äô noggin for like five months at this point so

post_body: Meditation Interrupted Fandom: Batman  Characters: Jason Todd Dick Grayson Bruce Wayne Alfred Pennyworth at the end  WC: 1k  A/N: Hello! I wrote this fic as a birthday gift to myself - the found family troupe is my weakness. I‚Äôve only ever read fanfic from this fandom (no actual consumption of cannon lol) so if everyone is OOC that‚Äôs why. I hope you enjoy!  ‚ÄúJason.‚Äù  Jason continued his meditation giving no indication that he heard his older brother from across the cave.  ‚ÄúJason. Hey Jason‚Äù Dick called getting closer.  Jason continued to ignore him. At this point in his life ignoring Dick was a skill he had honed after years of practice.  ‚ÄúJay. Jason. Jason. Jason.‚Äù  Jason bit back his irritation accepting that his meditation was well and truly over but still keeping his eyes closed and his breathing even. With any luck Dick would get bored and go bother the Replacement for whatever he needed.  Jason felt Dick step onto the mats where he was seated still repeating his name.  ‚ÄúJason. Jason. JasonJasonJasonJason - ‚Äú  Jason deftly caught Dick‚Äôs hand before it could poke his ribs. ‚ÄúDo you want to die?‚Äù He bit out finally opening his eyes to glare at the acrobat.  He was met with a shit eating grin. ‚ÄúLittle Wing! Don‚Äôt tell me you‚Äôre still ticklish?‚Äù  It took effort not to let his reaction show on his face. ‚ÄúNo. Lucky me the Pit took care of that.‚Äù  Dick‚Äôs grin grew. ‚ÄúOh yeah? Hm. You know what the Pit didn‚Äôt take care of?‚Äù Dick flipped out of Jason‚Äôs grasp landing behind him with his hands on Jason‚Äôs sides. ‚ÄúThe tips of your ears still turn red when you‚Äôre lying.‚Äù  Dick squeezed his sides and Jason lurched forward with a gasp he couldn‚Äôt quite strangle. Dick spidered his hands up to Jason‚Äôs ribs and this time Jason didn‚Äôt manage to stifle his snickers.  ‚ÄúFuhuhck off Dihihckhead I‚Äôm not in the mohohood.‚Äù  ‚ÄúAwwww Little Wing you might be worse than when you were a kiddo!‚Äù Dick teased watching delightedly as red crept up the back of his little brother‚Äôs neck.  Jason quickly decided that was enough of that thank you and spun around tackling his older brother to the ground. ‚ÄúMahahybe. But unluckily for you I‚Äôve got ahabout 40 pounds on you these days.‚Äù  Dick barely had time to wheeze out a shocked ‚ÄúShit!‚Äù before Jason dug his fingers into Dick‚Äôs underarms and vibrated his fingers back and forth.  Dick immediately burst into cackles. ‚ÄúWAHAHAIT WAIT NOHOHOHO‚Äù he managed his pleas echoing around the cave.  ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs wrong Dickie? Can dish it out but can‚Äôt take it?‚Äù Jason asked removing one hand from under his arms to scribble across his brother‚Äôs tummy.  ‚ÄúJahahahahahay Jahahay plehehehehehease Ihihih‚Äôm sohohohorry!‚Äù  ‚ÄúMmm yeah I don‚Äôt care‚Äù Jason said as he reached down to grab one of Dick‚Äôs thighs and squeeze.  Dick hollered begging as his little brother showed no mercy to his worst spot. He writhed trying to escape but apparently more than a decade of vigilante work flew out the window when his brother was murdering him with tickles.  ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt forget Dickie I‚Äôm the biggest one in the family now‚Äù Jason taunted giving his brother a break by scritching at his knees not wanting him to actually pass out.  Suddenly there was a shadow looming over Jason‚Äôs shoulder. A deep voice rumbled ‚ÄúBiggest save for one Jaylad‚Äù before Jason was unceremoniously tackled to the mats off of his older brother.  Jason could do little more than suck in a breath before his adoptive father was attacking his ribs with frightening precision. Jason threw his head back as ticklish shocks swarmed his senses laughing like a loon.   ‚ÄúFuhuhuhuhUCK! SHIHIHIT DAHAMMIT B WAHAHAHAHIT!‚Äù   ‚ÄúMmmm no thank you.‚Äù His father said fondly. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs been altogether too long since I‚Äôve heard you laugh.‚Äù  ‚ÄúGet him B!‚Äù Dick cheered tiredly from the sidelines still recovering from his own torment.  ‚ÄúFUHUHUCK OHOHOHOFF DIHIHIHICKHEAD!‚Äù Jason bellowed as Bruce attacked his underarms ruthlessly.  ‚ÄúDo you remember what I used to do to get you to screech like a banshee?‚Äù Bruce asked grinning down at his second-eldest son. ‚ÄúAlfred came running with his shotgun the first time I did it.‚Äù  Jason‚Äôs eyes widened and he started fighting back even harder. ‚ÄúNohohoho nohohot thahat plehehease B I cahahahan‚Äôt - ‚Äú he babbled as Bruce slowly ruched up his workout top exposing his tummy.   Bruce smiled as Jason sucked in his tummy as far as it would go shaking his head back and forth. He leaned down keeping eye contact with his frantic kid before taking in a deep breath and blowing a raspberry right over Jason‚Äôs belly button.  ‚ÄúNAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA‚Äù Jason arched off the ground his head thrown back as his hysterical laughter filled the cave. ‚ÄúPLEHEHEHEHEHE - DAHAHAHAHAD I CAHAHAHAHAHAN‚ÄôT!‚Äù  Bruce took one more breath knowing Jason was close to his limit before ducking back down and blowing one final raspberry shaking his head back and forth so that his stubble would catch on his son‚Äôs skin and tickle even more.  Jason‚Äôs laughter went silent tears beading in the corners of his eyes as he rode out the ticklish sensations. Bruce sat up and pulled Jason‚Äôs shirt back into place still grinning as his son‚Äôs laughter continued. Jason curled into a ball still giggling arms firmly around his tummy to guard against any more attacks but none were coming.  ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs too precious‚Äù Dick stage-whispered sitting up and mirroring Bruce‚Äôs fond expression. Then at a normal volume ‚ÄúStill want to try and convince me the Pit ‚Äòtook care of it‚Äô?‚Äù  Jason still giggling uncurled one arm enough to flip Dick the bird.  Dick still wasn‚Äôt done. ‚ÄúIs it true that Alfred ran in with a shotgun the first time you gave him a raspberry?‚Äù he asked Bruce smirking.  ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know that I‚Äôd ever seen him move that fast‚Äù Bruce remembered then yelped as the butler in question appeared behind him and deftly scribbled across the back of Bruce‚Äôs neck.  ‚ÄúI‚Äôll remind you of my extensive knowledge of your own spots Master Bruce‚Äù Alfred sniffed reprovingly handing bottles of water to Jason and Dick as Bruce rubbed away the ghost tickles.  Jason panting but recovered enough to sit upright smirked. ‚ÄúAlfie‚Äôs got my back. ‚ÄòSpecially against you cheaters.‚Äù  ‚ÄúQuite so Master Jason.‚Äù  ‚ÄúWhatever you say Jaybird.‚Äù  ‚ÄúOf course Jaylad.‚Äù  ‚ÄúFuck off.‚Äù

post_body: Absolute Power #4: The Final Stand Against the Trinity of Evil   Get ready for the thrilling conclusion to DC Comics‚Äô blockbuster summer event Absolute Power! In October Absolute Power #4 will deliver the epic finale where some of the mightiest heroes in the DC Universe face off against the formidable Trinity of Evil‚ÄîBrainiac Failsafe and Amanda Waller‚Äîin a battle that will determine the fate of the entire DC Universe.  Mark Waid and Dan Mora bring their masterful storytelling and artistry to a climax as Batman Superman Wonder Woman and other superheroes make their last stand against overwhelming odds. Absolute Power #4 hitting comic stores on October 2nd promises a showdown of epic proportions. DC has unveiled an array of variant covers for this issue including special editions by Simone Bianchi Guillem March Derrick Chew Mico Suayan Stephen Bliss and a spotlight variant by Mikel Janin showcasing the event‚Äôs villains.  The solicitation for Absolute Power #4 teases a gripping narrative: ‚ÄúAs the last resistance fighters battle fiercely on the perilous island of Gamorra tensions rise between Batman and Superman! Meanwhile Amanda Waller undeterred summons reinforcements from across the Multiverse. The fate of the DC Universe hangs in the balance and nothing will be the same after this cataclysmic showdown!‚Äù  Absolute Power has already set the stage for significant repercussions across the DC Universe exploring a world where metahuman abilities are threatened by Waller‚Äôs ambitious plans. This event promises to reshape the course of DC Comics for years to come with spin-off stories like Absolute Power: Task Force VII and Absolute Power: Origins expanding on the rise of the Trinity of Evil.  Don‚Äôt miss Absolute Power #4 a pivotal moment in DC Comics history hitting shelves on October 2nd. It‚Äôs a must-read for fans and promises an unforgettable conclusion to an event that will leave a lasting impact on the DC Universe.

post_body: I would love to discuss Batman Arkham asylum and what i would like to elaborate on is Batman choking the Joker. You know I do get he chokes the Joker majority of the times but there‚Äôs just something strange about him choking him this way.  Why is he wiggling him so much? Why not just squeeze his neck??? But at this point he‚Äôs basically toying with the Joker‚Äôs neck. It‚Äôs also how he holds his head up and keeps it in place but still manage to wiggle him. I just don‚Äôt understand why all the wiggling?? It‚Äôs also strange that Bruce wriggles his head around until he glides him closer to his face. I don‚Äôt understand that either?? Why did he need to get so close to his face? The Joker eyes is closed guys. Although let‚Äôs not look over the fact that Bruce is eating this man alive with his eyes and on top of that the Joker eyes remains close even after Bruce‚Äôs pushes him back. I mean look at this shit? He looks at the Joker‚Äôs lips and then his hand on the Joker‚Äôs neck. Like tell me I‚Äôm not crazy. Bruce where‚Äôs the anger at? I don‚Äôt see any here. I mean look at this man his eyes is closed and he‚Äôs pleased Do not tell me that‚Äôs not an eye roll. Theses two are in some kinky shit even the guard is looking away. Lmfaoooo.

post_body: I will never forgive DC for erasing Crystal Brown from Stephanie‚Äôs storyline in N52. Like Stephanie has a home Stephanie has a loving mother and I am sick of the idea that she lives with the Waynes.    I LOVE CRYSTAL BROWN CHAT!!!!!!!!    Crystal Brown who got sober and left her abusive husband. Crystal Brown who became a nurse to support her and her daughter. Crystal Brown who helped Stephanie with the decision about her baby.   Crystal Brown who knew about her daughter‚Äôs life as Spoiler and was proud of her for stopping her father.    Crystal Brown who grieved her daughter. Crystal Brown who defended her daughter against Black Mask and encouraged her as she beat up her ex-boyfriend.    Crystal Brown who had her bad moments but ultimately became a better person for her daughter.

A lesson in trust by CGJ    Because no matter his own feelings on that matter Bruce trusts Clark. And as antithetical as it is to every action he‚Äôs ever taken in his life he welcomes the feeling lets it become a part of him. As dangerous as it could be as paranoid as he feels about it‚Ä¶ he trusts Clark. Trusts him with the parts of him that he can‚Äôt even bring himself to acknowledge. As clich√© as it sounds trusting Clark with everything in him seems to him to be the only option an path he‚Äôs already been on for years before he‚Äôd ever acknowledged that he could never go back.    - - -    Already the loneliness seems to seize him seemingly confirming his fears about becoming too attached too dependent on Clark emotionally in ways he cannot handle. But his thoughts seem to wander to Clark‚Äôs smile the look in his eyes full of light. And Batman is a slave to his feelings after all because the urge to hold him close to put himself entirely in his hands to trust Clark with everything in him overpowers every other thought every other sense like it‚Äôs all he knows. post_body: Each and every one of the members of the Batfam have some sort of ‚Äúbrucie‚Äù persona going on.   Dick becomes ‚ÄúRickey‚Äù and turns into a mindless himbo. Everyone hits on him and he‚Äôs basically like a mini Brucie. Craziest thing he‚Äôs done as Rickey- knocked down a 6 foot tall champagne tower and no one got mad. ÔøºÔøº  Tim has been working on his persona since he was about 12. He realized what Bruce was doing one time and started to follow his lead before he even became Robin. Tim becomes brainless but still somehow still manages to make the rudest comments. No one really brings that up though because well the kid dropped out of high school. Obviously he isn‚Äôt the smartest the kid just doesn‚Äôt understand what he‚Äôs saying. Craziest thing he‚Äôs done- threatened Lex Luther to keep his gadgets in Metropolis in front of Clark Kent and Lois Lane.   Jason doesn‚Äôt go to galas let‚Äôs be so real. Even when he did when he was younger Jason was so sweet to everyone. It wasn‚Äôt even an act he was just happy to eat all the fancy party food. Craziest thing he did as a kid- someone once accused him of stealing a purse Jason gave them the puppy dog eyes and they were taking it back.   Steph just turns her regular personality up to ten. The upper class is afraid of her because they think that‚Äôs just how she is all the time. Whenever she does something outrageous at a party they give Bruce looks of pity because she must do this all the time. Craziest thing she‚Äôs done- pulled a toupee clean off a guys head. She then proceeded to throw it in the chocolate fondue machine.   The only kid who doesn‚Äôt make up a different personality to the media is Damian. This has led to many different twitter accounts that‚Äôs sole purpose is to show all the time Damian has suffered to his crazy dad/siblings. The hashtag ‚ÄòFreeDamianFromTheBullshit‚Äô has trended every single time the Waynes make a public appearance.
My kid when you ask him how school is going:
Justice League by Michael Ting Yu Chang

post_body: Each and every one of the members of the Batfam have some sort of ‚Äúbrucie‚Äù persona going on.   Dick becomes ‚ÄúRickey‚Äù and turns into a mindless himbo. Everyone hits on him and he‚Äôs basically like a mini Brucie. Craziest thing he‚Äôs done as Rickey- knocked down a 6 foot tall champagne tower and no one got mad. ÔøºÔøº  Tim has been working on his persona since he was about 12. He realized what Bruce was doing one time and started to follow his lead before he even became Robin. Tim becomes brainless but still somehow still manages to make the rudest comments. No one really brings that up though because well the kid dropped out of high school. Obviously he isn‚Äôt the smartest the kid just doesn‚Äôt understand what he‚Äôs saying. Craziest thing he‚Äôs done- threatened Lex Luther to keep his gadgets in Metropolis in front of Clark Kent and Lois Lane.   Jason doesn‚Äôt go to galas let‚Äôs be so real. Even when he did when he was younger Jason was so sweet to everyone. It wasn‚Äôt even an act he was just happy to eat all the fancy party food. Craziest thing he did as a kid- someone once accused him of stealing a purse Jason gave them the puppy dog eyes and they were taking it back.   Steph just turns her regular personality up to ten. The upper class is afraid of her because they think that‚Äôs just how she is all the time. Whenever she does something outrageous at a party they give Bruce looks of pity because she must do this all the time. Craziest thing she‚Äôs done- pulled a toupee clean off a guys head. She then proceeded to throw it in the chocolate fondue machine.   The only kid who doesn‚Äôt make up a different personality to the media is Damian. This has led to many different twitter accounts that‚Äôs sole purpose is to show all the time Damian has suffered to his crazy dad/siblings. The hashtag ‚ÄòFreeDamianFromTheBullshit‚Äô has trended every single time the Waynes make a public appearance.

post_body: That quiet place in Wayne Manor  In the back of Wayne Manor where it‚Äôs quiet ‚Äìa different kind of quiet from the wide empty halls of it- and ivy covers the outer wall showing its shy green hands into the edges of the windows there‚Äôs a room. A room in a wing that in other times had more people residing there; but as time had passed and the previous Master and Madam had passed away that wing had slowly but surely been emptied until only one inhabited remained. The room in itself was no fancy thing; it was an old room with a bathroom a bath and a small parlour ‚Äìthe only room to possess such an anteroom in the whole building-. The room had always belonged to the butler and head of staff of the Wayne household as it does today and would probably be as long as the house was in use.  The bedroom was not especially large just enough to hold the bare necessary furniture; the bathroom was nothing but practical and efficient to clean; as for the small parlour it was the largest of the small apartment. Yet it remained small and simple; two high-backed cushioned chairs of a faded maroon colour ‚Äìit wouldn‚Äôt be long before having to be refurbished- a wooden table between them large enough to hold a lamp a small plate ‚Äìthat might sometimes hold cookies and some others small cakes- a teapot and two tea cups with their respective plates. They all were facing towards a medium fireplace with an immaculate clean mantelpiece in which a set of pictures rest ‚Äìmost of them holding children sulking ones glaring ones smiling ones sleepy ones confused ones-. Hanging above the mantelpiece there‚Äôs a reproduction of The Evening Angel.  To each side of the fireplace there are paneled windows that by the late afternoon fill the small room with warm orange light in summer and autumn. A little bit to the left there‚Äôs a wooden door with a small window in its middle that leads to the orchard part of the gardens. On the right wall of the fireplace there are two bookcases full of books. On the left wall there‚Äôs the door of the bedroom and to its side a table that at its top there‚Äôs an electric kettle and several tin metal boxes and flasks filled with tea and aromatic herbs inside it behind two glass doors a set of teacups and teapots ‚Äìsome white some with delicate patterns some chipped ones-. Behind the high back chairs there is another bookcase ‚Äìthis one holds a Winchester Model 12 a Danish Butter Cookies tin can filled with sewing materials and some other mysterious baskets and boxes- and the door that leads to the inner narrow corridor of the service wing not too far down from this door there‚Äôs the door that leads to the kitchen and the service staircases that lead directly to the upper floors with the main bedrooms.  In this small room and humble room many have found refuge and comfort throughout the last years;  The brooding child who became a brooding man. He sits in silence while watching the fire ‚Äìwhen it‚Äôs lighted- or at The Evening Angel and drinks black tea.  The angry child who became a smiling man. He sits while chatting and laughing sometimes at others he resembles a certain silent brooding man. He drinks his tea with sugar and milk.  The lost child who became a broken man. He sits quietly while reading a book and answers the questions in his own time. He drinks whatever he is given which usually is calming and herbal.  The clever child who became a tired man. He sits talking quietly sometimes about meaningful things or sometimes about the last development in a case. He drinks sip after sip from soft green tea.  The silent child who became a wise woman. She doesn‚Äôt sit very long preparing the tea meticulously and in different manners according to their nature is how she spends her time. She loves pu-erh tea.  The violent child who became a caring man. He sits and draws in his sketchbook atop his crossed knee. Jazmine tea is his predilection and he refuses to take any other kind but he never refuses the sweetmeats.   When the tea is finished the empty cups stand forgotten with some leaves and darkened water on their bottom some crumbs remain on an empty plate and the two chairs eventually grow cold awaiting to be warmed again.

When Bruce joined the league of shadows and made himself Ra‚Äôs Al Ghul‚Äôs protegee he was seventeen‚Äì a perfect a round ten years since his parents died  He trained with Alfred everyday until he left the manor for boarding school skipped years got himself too many degrees left to tour the world‚Äì leeched himself into every person that could teach him how to fight; couldn‚Äôt stop still   When he joined the lao he still had baby fat on his cheeks lanky and tall and fast yes but only seventeen. The grief is never ending but so is the love; grief raises from love grief is loveborne‚Äì grief is the proof that love was once there  How Bruce mourned what he couldn‚Äôt save so much he needed to do something about it‚Äì he never learned how to separate grief from guilt; guilt is a hungry greedy and yearning beast  Something about how you never stop burying your parents. It‚Äôll never be different

They all were facing towards a medium fireplace with an immaculate clean mantelpiece in which a set of pictures rest ‚Äìmost of them holding children sulking ones glaring ones smiling ones sleepy ones confused ones-. Hanging above the mantelpiece there‚Äôs a reproduction of The Evening Angel.  To each side of the fireplace there are paneled windows that by the late afternoon fill the small room with warm orange light in summer and autumn. A little bit to the left there‚Äôs a wooden door with a small window in its middle that leads to the orchard part of the gardens. On the right wall of the fireplace there are two bookcases full of books. On the left wall there‚Äôs the door of the bedroom and to its side a table that at its top there‚Äôs an electric kettle and several tin metal boxes and flasks filled with tea and aromatic herbs inside it behind two glass doors a set of teacups and teapots ‚Äìsome white some with delicate patterns some chipped ones-. Behind the high back chairs there is another bookcase ‚Äìthis one holds a Winchester Model 12 a Danish Butter Cookies tin can filled with sewing materials and some other mysterious baskets and boxes- and the door that leads to the inner narrow corridor of the service wing not too far down from this door there‚Äôs the door that leads to the kitchen and the service staircases that lead directly to the upper floors with the main bedrooms.  In this small room and humble room many have found refuge and comfort throughout the last years;  The brooding child who became a brooding man. He sits in silence while watching the fire ‚Äìwhen it‚Äôs lighted- or at The Evening Angel and drinks black tea.  The angry child who became a smiling man. He sits while chatting and laughing sometimes at others he resembles a certain silent brooding man. He drinks his tea with sugar and milk.  The lost child who became a broken man. He sits quietly while reading a book and answers the questions in his own time. He drinks whatever he is given which usually is calming and herbal.  The clever child who became a tired man. He sits talking quietly sometimes about meaningful things or sometimes about the last development in a case. He drinks sip after sip from soft green tea.  The silent child who became a wise woman. She doesn‚Äôt sit very long preparing the tea meticulously and in different manners according to their nature is how she spends her time. She loves pu-erh tea.  The violent child who became a caring man. He sits and draws in his sketchbook atop his crossed knee. Jazmine tea is his predilection and he refuses to take any other kind but he never refuses the sweetmeats.   When the tea is finished the empty cups stand forgotten with some leaves and darkened water on their bottom some crumbs remain on an empty plate and the two chairs eventually grow cold awaiting to be warmed again.

post_body: Arkham Knight is really an unfortunate sore point for the so called ‚Äòtrilogy‚Äô for me.  The Batmobile is only 25% of the game my ass. To much of it even if I‚Äôm not driving around. The combat (in terms of the enemies) is not challenging which is surprising considering this is the hardest game I‚Äôve played besides Bioshock. Haven‚Äôt died once.   Story‚Äôs okay for now but I‚Äôm worried with the inclusion of Joker as he normally overpowers the other villains.   Great graphics and I like the predator takedowns. I love the map and locations. But I‚Äôm way way more excited to play the Batgirl DLC!  It seems my ranking of the games I‚Äôve played is Arkham Asylum > Arkham City > Arkham Knight. But Origins still my favorite overall.

post_body: A few days ago I was thinking about writing about this topic but I didn‚Äôt know whether to do it because it is a topic that is not normally talked about on a Tumblr blog‚Ä¶ But then I realized that it had a lot to do with one of the main themes of this blog: Relationships.  Death  It is one of the most painful things that can happen to us and unfortunately it has happened to me.  I have lost the person I have hated the most in my life the person who has hurt me the most in my life‚Ä¶  And yes I have cried and suffered for his death‚Ä¶ More than you can imagine.  Right at that moment when I found out I felt empty. As if I had just lost a friend a brother‚Ä¶ Someone I loved‚Ä¶  But the point is that the person was none of those things‚Ä¶ She was someone I have always hated and deep down I still hate.  When my family found out and looked at me about to burst into tears they told me:  ‚ÄúWhy are you like this? You knew her you know she deserved it‚Äù  At that moment without saying anything I just left I knew whether I will explain it to them or not they wouldn‚Äôt understand.   I don‚Äôt even understand it   I‚Äôm sorry for bothering you but I needed to vent and talk about this.

post_body: Arkham Knight is really an unfortunate sore point for the so called ‚Äòtrilogy‚Äô for me.  The Batmobile is only 25% of the game my ass. To much of it even if I‚Äôm not driving around. The combat (in terms of the enemies) is not challenging which is surprising considering this is the hardest game I‚Äôve played besides Bioshock. Haven‚Äôt died once.   Story‚Äôs okay for now but I‚Äôm worried with the inclusion of Joker as he normally overpowers the other villains.   Great graphics and I like the predator takedowns. I love the map and locations. But I‚Äôm way way more excited to play the Batgirl DLC!  It seems my ranking of the games I‚Äôve played is Arkham Asylum > Arkham City > Arkham Knight. But Origins still my favorite overall.

The Ancient Attainment: (Chapter 3)   (Monday 1st June 20XX 5:30pm)  Both Zebra Jasper and Ametrine looked at Pyrope as he entered Zebra Jasper‚Äôs hideout. Pyrope took a seat from across Zebra Jasper as Ametrine just stood standing next to Pyrope and Zebra Jasper.  Before Zebra Jasper could ask about what Pyrope reported Ametrine jumped in before him.  ‚ÄúWhere were you?! You‚Äôre late!‚Äù Ametrine yelled quite irritated and angry. Pyrope ‚Äúlooked‚Äù at Ametrine.  ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs good to see you too Ametrine.‚Äù Pyrope said calm and composed with his stoic but authoritarian tone evident.  ‚ÄúYeah yeah it‚Äôs good to see you too Py.‚Äù Ametrine stated even going further to blush a dark purple. Upon seeing this Zebra Jasper chuckled but then he composed himself and looked at Pyrope.   ‚ÄúNow Pyrope you said that you had good news and bad news. May I ask what they are?‚Äù Zebra Jasper asked while looking between Ametrine and Pyrope.  ‚ÄúYeah what are they?!‚Äù Ametrine inquired a bit too forcefully.  ‚ÄúWell it depends. Do you want to hear the good news or the bad news first?‚Äù Pyrope asked back at them.   Zebra Jasper and Ametrine thought for a bit until they‚Äôve finally decided.  ‚ÄúThe bad news!‚Äù Ametrine responded a bit too enthusiastically.   ‚ÄúWell then‚Ä¶‚Äù Pyrope started while placing his cane next to the table making it lean against the table. ‚ÄúA familiar animatronic jester of our kind explained how he witnessed a certain monstrous gemstone return. A certain second high ranked gemstone. Does it ring any bells Zebra Jasper?‚Äù  Zebra Jasper nodded as Ametrine looked in puzzlement at Zebra Jasper.  ‚ÄúSo you say that Sardonyx witnessed Bixbyite return after all these 40054 centuries?‚Äù Zebra Jasper asked.  ‚ÄúIndeed and how I know Sardonyx he wouldn‚Äôt lie about something like this.‚Äù Pyrope confirmed.  ‚ÄúWho is this Bixbyite?‚Äù Ametrine asked out of nowhere but still curious about who this ‚ÄòBixbyite‚Äô is.  ‚ÄúWell you see my dear. Bixbyite is everything that is not just and kind in this world. He‚Äôs the monster that‚Äôs under your bed. He‚Äôs your sleep paralysis demon and he‚Äôs the Devil himself. He could be anything and everything that you fear. He‚Äôs also a second high ranked gemstone an Elite just like me and the others but he‚Äôs‚Ä¶troubling even dangerous as well.‚Äù Zebra Jasper explained to Ametrine about Bixbyite.  ‚ÄúBut what‚Äôs with the whole panic? Doesn‚Äôt he sound like Mystic Topaz or Quantum Quattro Silica?‚Äù Ametrine asked.  ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs unlike Mystic Topaz and Quantum Quattro Silica. Bixbyite has no problem in shattering other gemstones to get what he wants while Mystic Topaz only scares human kind and as for Quantum Quattro Silica as much as I dislike him only wants my power and to dethrone me but that‚Äôs never going to happen.‚Äù Zebra Jasper further explained.  ‚ÄúAnd where Bixbyite goes his creations follow.‚Äù Pyrope added.  Zebra Jasper nodded. ‚ÄúIndeed. I feel sympathetic for them all for having a creator like Bixbyite. It must be scary for them all.‚Äù   ‚ÄúSo why now? Why did Bixbyite return?‚Äù Ametrine asked.  ‚ÄúUnsure but I know that he‚Äôs got a plan up his sleeve or rather tongue.‚Äù Zebra Jasper chuckled at the last bit.  ‚ÄúIndeed. We must keep our eyes on him.‚Äù Pyrope added.  ‚ÄúQuite so. I‚Äôll update my creations to keep a look out on Bixbyite‚Äôs creations.‚Äù Zebra Jasper agreed and added.  Ametrine turned to look at Pyrope. ‚ÄúWhat about the good news?‚Äù  ‚ÄúRight. I got invited to Mr. Bruce Wayne‚Äôs charity event a gala tonight along with a colleague of mine Mr. Kevin Smith.‚Äù Pyrope answered to Ametrine‚Äôs question.  Ametrine gave a low growl. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt like it when you use the word 'colleague‚Äô. It sounds too much like 'partner‚Äô and 'boyfriend‚Äô.‚Äù Ametrine mumbled under his breath.  Zebra Jasper chuckled. ‚ÄúAw is someone perhaps jealous?‚Äù Zebra Jasper asked jokingly.  Pyrope kept a straight face on. ‚ÄúDo not worry Am. He‚Äôs not going to be my date or anything like that.‚Äù  Ametrine looked relieved but still on edge.  ‚ÄúI shall go to Mr. Wayne‚Äôs charity gala whereas you two shall get the second plan in motion understood?‚Äù Pyrope clarified.  Both Ametrine and Zebra Jasper nodded their heads.  ‚ÄúGood. I should get going and get ready for the event. Farewell the both of you.‚Äù Pyrope said as he got up and exited Zebra Jasper‚Äôs hideout.  Zebra Jasper looked at Ametrine as Pyrope was fully out of sight.   ‚ÄúWell now that was a successfully meeting as I do so say myself.‚Äù  Ametrine nodded. ‚ÄúAgreed.‚Äù  He then looked outside the window seeing that it was a full Moon tonight. ‚ÄúDo you ever think that Moonstone will return?‚Äù Ametrine asked.  Zebra Jasper looked at the full Moon as well. ‚ÄúUnsure but the good thing is she‚Äôll always look down on us.‚Äù Zebra Jasper replied a bit solemnly.   ‚ÄúTrue.‚Äù Ametrine agreed. ‚ÄúAnyway I have to get going as well.‚Äù   Ametrine turned and started to walk but before he could fully exit and leave Zebra Jasper spoke up behind him.   ‚ÄúFarewell Am and don‚Äôt go after Two-Face understood?‚Äù Zebra Jasper said a bit forceful at the latter bit.  Ametrine smirked.  ‚ÄúI won‚Äôt but my sadistic side will.‚Äù Ametrine finally replied as he exited Zebra Jasper‚Äôs hideout and walked off down the streets of Gotham City with one last glance at the full Moon and a last thought about Moonstone.

post_body: A few days ago I was thinking about writing about this topic but I didn‚Äôt know whether to do it because it is a topic that is not normally talked about on a Tumblr blog‚Ä¶ But then I realized that it had a lot to do with one of the main themes of this blog: Relationships.  Death  It is one of the most painful things that can happen to us and unfortunately it has happened to me.  I have lost the person I have hated the most in my life the person who has hurt me the most in my life‚Ä¶  And yes I have cried and suffered for his death‚Ä¶ More than you can imagine.  Right at that moment when I found out I felt empty. As if I had just lost a friend a brother‚Ä¶ Someone I loved‚Ä¶  But the point is that the person was none of those things‚Ä¶ She was someone I have always hated and deep down I still hate.  When my family found out and looked at me about to burst into tears they told me:  ‚ÄúWhy are you like this? You knew her you know she deserved it‚Äù  At that moment without saying anything I just left I knew whether I will explain it to them or not they wouldn‚Äôt understand.   I don‚Äôt even understand it   I‚Äôm sorry for bothering you but I needed to vent and talk about this.

OOC:  I HATE HATE HATE this new trend of heroes using real names while they are in costume. You never know who‚Äôs listening! It takes me right out of a show or movie when they do this!   I would have had him slapping Robyn but he was too short for the shot to look right.

post_body: its always kinda stuck to me how in every cryptid Batman au many of them personify him as the ‚Äúshadows of Gotham‚Äù or the ‚Äúdarkness of Gotham‚Äù or something as such when it‚Äôs not an resurrected fic or some others  But I‚Äôve always wanted him to not be personified as the shadows but as the night yk and with all the ‚ÄúI am the night‚Äù it goes with it! I need people to understanding how he‚Äôs not the dark part of Gotham come for vengeance!!! That‚Äôs only a part of him!! Like how the night can be silent and always there watching the night can be forgiving as it hangs above and also be a source of dread hiding many in its cloak safe away or maybe keeping the ones on the outside safe from whatever he hides in it  And the most of it it doesn‚Äôt only describe batman but also Bruce wayne!! He may be dark and out for punishment but he also has light from the stars littered across him! Batman is the silent of the night hes its forgiveness and it‚Äôs dread like how he cares about the well-being of his city and always puts his rouges in rehab because he still has hope in them! And he‚Äôs it‚Äôs terrifying exicutive carrying out punishments and the bloodies hands of justice and Bruce wayne is the lively part of the night as he dances across with his stars and lives  like when in his parties he somewhat loses himself to the music and champagne and toasts to the sky he‚Äôs the party part of the night the thrill you feel jumping at overly loud concerts and the rush of adrenaline as you dance to the fast beat   Bruce wayne is the night not shadows

post_body: Bruce is the type of guy to always give kids serious answers to their questions. Even when they get into why chains he will always give an answer and won‚Äôt pull a ‚Äúbecause I said so‚Äù or ‚Äúbecause that‚Äôs how it is‚Äù type non answers that parents will give when they get tired of the whys. Also because he has such a breadth of knowledge in so many areas he can really give a good answer   Cut to him trying (and actually kinda succeeding) to explain the law of conservation to some lost kid as they wait for their parents.  Clark on the other hand will lie out of his ass if he‚Äôs asked how babies are made. Responses range from stork to I don‚Äôt know either. Will also say he has lunch with the tooth fairy on Wednesdays. Very much keep the magic alive for kids in contrast to Bruce‚Äôs respect for their curiosity.  I wouldn‚Äôt say either way is better as they each have their pros and cons. It does lend to a hilarious situation of two kids getting into a heated playground fight because Batman told one kid that the Easter Bunny is just for the fun of pretending and Superman told the other that the Easter Bunny invited him to brunch this Saturday.

post_body: its always kinda stuck to me how in every cryptid Batman au many of them personify him as the ‚Äúshadows of Gotham‚Äù or the ‚Äúdarkness of Gotham‚Äù or something as such when it‚Äôs not an resurrected fic or some others  But I‚Äôve always wanted him to not be personified as the shadows but as the night yk and with all the ‚ÄúI am the night‚Äù it goes with it! I need people to understanding how he‚Äôs not the dark part of Gotham come for vengeance!!! That‚Äôs only a part of him!! Like how the night can be silent and always there watching the night can be forgiving as it hangs above and also be a source of dread hiding many in its cloak safe away or maybe keeping the ones on the outside safe from whatever he hides in it  And the most of it it doesn‚Äôt only describe batman but also Bruce wayne!! He may be dark and out for punishment but he also has light from the stars littered across him! Batman is the silent of the night hes its forgiveness and it‚Äôs dread like how he cares about the well-being of his city and always puts his rouges in rehab because he still has hope in them! And he‚Äôs it‚Äôs terrifying exicutive carrying out punishments and the bloodies hands of justice and Bruce wayne is the lively part of the night as he dances across with his stars and lives  like when in his parties he somewhat loses himself to the music and champagne and toasts to the sky he‚Äôs the party part of the night the thrill you feel jumping at overly loud concerts and the rush of adrenaline as you dance to the fast beat   Bruce wayne is the night not shadows

post_body: Bruce is the type of guy to always give kids serious answers to their questions. Even when they get into why chains he will always give an answer and won‚Äôt pull a ‚Äúbecause I said so‚Äù or ‚Äúbecause that‚Äôs how it is‚Äù type non answers that parents will give when they get tired of the whys. Also because he has such a breadth of knowledge in so many areas he can really give a good answer   Cut to him trying (and actually kinda succeeding) to explain the law of conservation to some lost kid as they wait for their parents.  Clark on the other hand will lie out of his ass if he‚Äôs asked how babies are made. Responses range from stork to I don‚Äôt know either. Will also say he has lunch with the tooth fairy on Wednesdays. Very much keep the magic alive for kids in contrast to Bruce‚Äôs respect for their curiosity.  I wouldn‚Äôt say either way is better as they each have their pros and cons. It does lend to a hilarious situation of two kids getting into a heated playground fight because Batman told one kid that the Easter Bunny is just for the fun of pretending and Superman told the other that the Easter Bunny invited him to brunch this Saturday.

post_body: violent delights You wouldn‚Äôt expect it looking at Tim but there was a darkness to him. It was subtle hidden in the glint in his eyes and the flex of his hands. No one suspects it so no one sees it.   Timothy Drake was brutal in a way that his brothers were not. His way wasn‚Äôt the electric edge of Nightwing the explosive domineering threat of Red Hood or even the artistic violence that the newest Robin employed indiscriminately. No Red Robin was surgical and precise.  Even the team he led grew to be known for their draconian tactics. They were a sign of hope to those in need but for those that ended up in their line of fire‚Ä¶ Timothy Drake was raised to lead and he was damn good at it.  You wouldn‚Äôt expect it looking at the young man slumped over a keyboard cradling a cup of coffee like it was his last hope but there was something other to Timothy Drake.   This was the man who had been nearly killed by his childhood hero and now shared a breakfast table with him. This was the man who had an organ ripped from his body by a man playing at being a demon. This was the man who lost everything over and over and rebuilt himself anew.   Timothy Drake fought and earned his name as Robin. He was the first to sacrifice the first to jump into the line of fire he was a hero. But in another life he ruled the world with an iron fist and a team that would do whatever it took to keep him in power. The only difference in this life is his lack of desire for a throne.   You wouldn‚Äôt expect it watching Timothy Drake carry food and supplies to an encampment of homeless children but if you looked at the dried blood on his bo staff‚Ä¶.   Timothy Drake was raised to be cut-throat if only Janet Drake knew how literally he would take it.

post_body: Batcat Role Swap AU  I present to you a Batman AU timeline wherein Selina Kyle is the richest person in Gotham City and its first vigilante protecting it with her expanded somewhat rearranged Catfamily. Bruce Wayne is a master thief and self-made socialite. But this is not a basic one-to-one swap! I have tried very hard to do every character justice while adapting the parts of comics canon I accept (basically the post-Crisis/pre-Flashpoint universe plus Duke) which is why it‚Äôs ridiculously detailed. There are 60 PAGES.  Featuring:   Selina and Maggie Kyle Leslie Thompkins Holly Robinson Barbara Gordon Helena Bertinelli Stephanie Brown Cassandra Cain and Kitrina Falcone being main characters.  Characters who age consistently despite how little comics continuity wants to conform to the real progression time. I will make it make sense - Characters who are allowed to be happy and romantically committed and have meaningful development addressing their flaws and traumas in coherent narrative arcs. Their growth is not always linear but never just undone. The Cats make healthier choices than the canon Bats make at times like going to therapy due to their different contexts and relationships so there‚Äôs overall less angst and self-destructiveness. But they‚Äôre still incredibly traumatised and frequently messy about it. Female characters who are written with respect complex interiority and agency.  Deep nuanced relationships foil dynamics (familial platonic and romantic) and vigilante philosophy.  New costume designs and codenames.  Emotional support cats for everyone with a Greek mythology naming theme. Maggie doing cool important stuff as a civilian and not being fridged and stuck in a mental hospital for years.  Holly being a superhero. Babs becoming Oracle and staying that way.  Villains dying or reforming and staying that way. More of Holly and Karon being a lesbian couple. And Brucelina Dickbabs Timsteph Timbern and Harlivy.  Harvey Dent Two-Face and Talia al Ghul being sympathetic three-dimensional antivillains/antiheroes with genuine love for people. And more! I don‚Äôt expect anyone to read this in one sitting but if any of the above interests you please give it a try. Then you can make my day by telling me what you think! Comments questions analysis and fanart are very welcome.   I‚Äôve also made a Discord server:   Join the Batcat Role Swap AU Discord Server!

post_body: violent delights You wouldn‚Äôt expect it looking at Tim but there was a darkness to him. It was subtle hidden in the glint in his eyes and the flex of his hands. No one suspects it so no one sees it.   Timothy Drake was brutal in a way that his brothers were not. His way wasn‚Äôt the electric edge of Nightwing the explosive domineering threat of Red Hood or even the artistic violence that the newest Robin employed indiscriminately. No Red Robin was surgical and precise.  Even the team he led grew to be known for their draconian tactics. They were a sign of hope to those in need but for those that ended up in their line of fire‚Ä¶ Timothy Drake was raised to lead and he was damn good at it.  You wouldn‚Äôt expect it looking at the young man slumped over a keyboard cradling a cup of coffee like it was his last hope but there was something other to Timothy Drake.   This was the man who had been nearly killed by his childhood hero and now shared a breakfast table with him. This was the man who had an organ ripped from his body by a man playing at being a demon. This was the man who lost everything over and over and rebuilt himself anew.   Timothy Drake fought and earned his name as Robin. He was the first to sacrifice the first to jump into the line of fire he was a hero. But in another life he ruled the world with an iron fist and a team that would do whatever it took to keep him in power. The only difference in this life is his lack of desire for a throne.   You wouldn‚Äôt expect it watching Timothy Drake carry food and supplies to an encampment of homeless children but if you looked at the dried blood on his bo staff‚Ä¶.   Timothy Drake was raised to be cut-throat if only Janet Drake knew how literally he would take it.

post_body: Batcat Role Swap AU  I present to you a Batman AU timeline wherein Selina Kyle is the richest person in Gotham City and its first vigilante protecting it with her expanded somewhat rearranged Catfamily. Bruce Wayne is a master thief and self-made socialite. But this is not a basic one-to-one swap! I have tried very hard to do every character justice while adapting the parts of comics canon I accept (basically the post-Crisis/pre-Flashpoint universe plus Duke) which is why it‚Äôs ridiculously detailed. There are 60 PAGES.  Featuring:   Selina and Maggie Kyle Leslie Thompkins Holly Robinson Barbara Gordon Helena Bertinelli Stephanie Brown Cassandra Cain and Kitrina Falcone being main characters.  Characters who age consistently despite how little comics continuity wants to conform to the real progression time. I will make it make sense - Characters who are allowed to be happy and romantically committed and have meaningful development addressing their flaws and traumas in coherent narrative arcs. Their growth is not always linear but never just undone. The Cats make healthier choices than the canon Bats make at times like going to therapy due to their different contexts and relationships so there‚Äôs overall less angst and self-destructiveness. But they‚Äôre still incredibly traumatised and frequently messy about it. Female characters who are written with respect complex interiority and agency.  Deep nuanced relationships foil dynamics (familial platonic and romantic) and vigilante philosophy.  New costume designs and codenames.  Emotional support cats for everyone with a Greek mythology naming theme. Maggie doing cool important stuff as a civilian and not being fridged and stuck in a mental hospital for years.  Holly being a superhero. Babs becoming Oracle and staying that way.  Villains dying or reforming and staying that way. More of Holly and Karon being a lesbian couple. And Brucelina Dickbabs Timsteph Timbern and Harlivy.  Harvey Dent Two-Face and Talia al Ghul being sympathetic three-dimensional antivillains/antiheroes with genuine love for people. And more! I don‚Äôt expect anyone to read this in one sitting but if any of the above interests you please give it a try. Then you can make my day by telling me what you think! Comments questions analysis and fanart are very welcome.   I‚Äôve also made a Discord server:   Join the Batcat Role Swap AU Discord Server!

post_body: Designs/Notes for RGU Batman  Contains spoilers for Utena  <!-- more --> So this is the standard male uniform there. If he was going to wear that I think it‚Äôd be the delinquent way but chances are he wouldn‚Äôt be wearing it?? Kind of goes against Utena‚Äôs whole special uniform system  This is if he wore Utena‚Äôs uniform as it is in the show. It um‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt really understand why Utena wears the gym shorts (stretching?) but it really doesn‚Äôt make much sense on Bruce especially since he‚Äôs high class and probably wears slacks and a sweater over a button down as his casual clothes. Also it makes me think of Gon from hxh which XD I dunno. It just feels funny. The only argument I could maybe see is him wanting to move around better in it to fight but that‚Äôs supposed to be his regular uniform‚Ä¶  This one‚Äôs my personal favorite. Wearing the Utena uniform but with pants and probably a grey shirt underneath. Most likely he wears the uniform closed during school and then opens it for the duels‚Ä¶ even if his uniform is wrong he still would probably need to wear it according to school rules‚Ä¶  Plus I feel like he‚Äôd be popular (even if people think he‚Äôs weird) so looking like he‚Äôs gonna beat people up probably wouldn‚Äôt help with that. Jury‚Äôs still out whether or not he would have the cheerful playboy persona and then his gloomy violent one during the duels but personally I‚Äôm imagining he would just be gloomy all the time. It would interest the villains it would fit with his policing of school bullies and anti cheating (dude definitely gets straight As to the bewilderment of his teachers) and his female classmates would probably like him because he fits the solemn dark prince aesthetic.   I was wondering if he would try to join student council to fix the school but I think the student council works well as both the gcpd (would Miki by Jim Gordon then?ü§®) and the rogues gallery (still no idea who Miki would be from them‚Ä¶).  This one was exactly what I was looking for‚Ä¶ a delinquent uniform that looks like a cape XD if he were in Yugioh I would just go ahead with this one. I have no idea how you‚Äôre supposed to fight in it (safety pins?) but it fits him perfectly. Unfortunately I can‚Äôt imagine him wearing or getting away with that in Ohtori. I mean maybe‚Ä¶ it would be interesting for sure. It would absolutely eliminate any chance of Bruce Wayne and Batman being two separate personas. Everyone in the school would know them as one and the same. So I‚Äôm on the fence about it. Him wearing this would make more sense why Akio would have to ok it rather than his family‚Äôs money to the school talking. Very amusing though imagining him swooping into an empty classroom like a bat to rough up bullying students: ‚ÄúI saw you try to take his lunch money‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚Äúboss is the bat around? Let‚Äôs hurry this up‚Ä¶‚Äù. But that‚Äôs the bigger problem- no way he wouldn‚Äôt get kicked out for beating people up right? Sure in Utena no one says anything about people getting slapped 24/7 but full on beat up? Enough to leave bruises?? I think he‚Äôd get kicked out. Would have to leave the fighting for after school at the arena. (But that sort of kills his whole batman fear me thing‚Ä¶ You see my dilemma)  This is if he keeps the Bruce/Bat thing separate. So then ‚ÄòBatman‚Äô and 'Joker‚Äô are nicknames solely between duelists. Trying to imagine how Joker would behave in school vs on the grounds (there‚Äôs no way he could get away with acting as himself‚Ä¶.right?) is very tricky for meüòÖat least most of the rogues I think could act ordinary if they need to be. Penguin is well known by his nickname of course and for his selling out help to struggling students for a price but it‚Äôs something only those in the know would know. But I have to wonder how different Ohtori would end up being if I try to reconcile all of these rogues as its students‚Ä¶ By and large the student council doesn‚Äôt actually do much bad to the school itself (other than Touga sleeping with a lot of the school and Nanami going after anyone who has interest in him/he has interest in) so I guess it all comes down to what are the important parts of RGU that can‚Äôt change and what can be affected by the new cast? The question is also how accurate to Batman should the characters be or should I try to merge them more with the Utena characters? Obviously I can‚Äôt make most of them killers but Joker is definitely the kind to leave anonymous gifts full of gross or dead things outside the door of some of his admirers/people who‚Äôve made an impression on him in some way‚Ä¶  And this is just the full picture

post_body: So far here I‚Äôm giving Bruce the benefit of the doubt.   I‚Äôm not gonna condemn him and I think the outburst he had earlier towards Jason might have been what pushed him to find outside help even if he says that ‚Äúit stays in the family‚Äù. Do I honestly think he would have put Jason on a mental institute? I really don‚Äôt think so especially with him keeping their alter ego under wraps when going over what happened to Jason and as I said his previous idea of keeping their problems within the family I‚Äôm thinking he was bringing in a psychologist to help Jason but from their home.   The narration is in the pov of the lady psychologist and the excerpts tell us that Jason does end up talking to her because of how we have Jason going over how he felt during his fight with scarecrow but also Bruce talks to her and also ends up telling her about their alter egos.   I think everything Bruce has done so far in this issue is out of love for Jason it sucks that he didn‚Äôt tell Jason about the psychologist but like it says Jason was pulling back more and more no matter what Bruce and Alfred did and I think Bruce didn‚Äôt know what else to do other than actually do the thing he said he didn‚Äôt want to do in the hopes of getting Jason help. Was it right? No. Is he trying? Yes because he cares so much but is still going to make mistakes. Jason‚Äôs trauma isn‚Äôt something that will just go away if they give him space and ignore it he went through something horrible and the family is scrambling to find their footing again and I‚Äôm excited to see what they do moving forwards because seeing Bruce actually love Jason and care is a big yippee to me.

Thank you Williamson for allowing Bruce to show progression in how he approaches Damian‚Äôs struggles.

post_body: Designs/Notes for RGU Batman  Contains spoilers for Utena  <!-- more --> So this is the standard male uniform there. If he was going to wear that I think it‚Äôd be the delinquent way but chances are he wouldn‚Äôt be wearing it?? Kind of goes against Utena‚Äôs whole special uniform system  This is if he wore Utena‚Äôs uniform as it is in the show. It um‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt really understand why Utena wears the gym shorts (stretching?) but it really doesn‚Äôt make much sense on Bruce especially since he‚Äôs high class and probably wears slacks and a sweater over a button down as his casual clothes. Also it makes me think of Gon from hxh which XD I dunno. It just feels funny. The only argument I could maybe see is him wanting to move around better in it to fight but that‚Äôs supposed to be his regular uniform‚Ä¶  This one‚Äôs my personal favorite. Wearing the Utena uniform but with pants and probably a grey shirt underneath. Most likely he wears the uniform closed during school and then opens it for the duels‚Ä¶ even if his uniform is wrong he still would probably need to wear it according to school rules‚Ä¶  Plus I feel like he‚Äôd be popular (even if people think he‚Äôs weird) so looking like he‚Äôs gonna beat people up probably wouldn‚Äôt help with that. Jury‚Äôs still out whether or not he would have the cheerful playboy persona and then his gloomy violent one during the duels but personally I‚Äôm imagining he would just be gloomy all the time. It would interest the villains it would fit with his policing of school bullies and anti cheating (dude definitely gets straight As to the bewilderment of his teachers) and his female classmates would probably like him because he fits the solemn dark prince aesthetic.   I was wondering if he would try to join student council to fix the school but I think the student council works well as both the gcpd (would Miki by Jim Gordon then?ü§®) and the rogues gallery (still no idea who Miki would be from them‚Ä¶).  This one was exactly what I was looking for‚Ä¶ a delinquent uniform that looks like a cape XD if he were in Yugioh I would just go ahead with this one. I have no idea how you‚Äôre supposed to fight in it (safety pins?) but it fits him perfectly. Unfortunately I can‚Äôt imagine him wearing or getting away with that in Ohtori. I mean maybe‚Ä¶ it would be interesting for sure. It would absolutely eliminate any chance of Bruce Wayne and Batman being two separate personas. Everyone in the school would know them as one and the same. So I‚Äôm on the fence about it. Him wearing this would make more sense why Akio would have to ok it rather than his family‚Äôs money to the school talking. Very amusing though imagining him swooping into an empty classroom like a bat to rough up bullying students: ‚ÄúI saw you try to take his lunch money‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚Äúboss is the bat around? Let‚Äôs hurry this up‚Ä¶‚Äù. But that‚Äôs the bigger problem- no way he wouldn‚Äôt get kicked out for beating people up right? Sure in Utena no one says anything about people getting slapped 24/7 but full on beat up? Enough to leave bruises?? I think he‚Äôd get kicked out. Would have to leave the fighting for after school at the arena. (But that sort of kills his whole batman fear me thing‚Ä¶ You see my dilemma)  This is if he keeps the Bruce/Bat thing separate. So then ‚ÄòBatman‚Äô and 'Joker‚Äô are nicknames solely between duelists. Trying to imagine how Joker would behave in school vs on the grounds (there‚Äôs no way he could get away with acting as himself‚Ä¶.right?) is very tricky for meüòÖat least most of the rogues I think could act ordinary if they need to be. Penguin is well known by his nickname of course and for his selling out help to struggling students for a price but it‚Äôs something only those in the know would know. But I have to wonder how different Ohtori would end up being if I try to reconcile all of these rogues as its students‚Ä¶ By and large the student council doesn‚Äôt actually do much bad to the school itself (other than Touga sleeping with a lot of the school and Nanami going after anyone who has interest in him/he has interest in) so I guess it all comes down to what are the important parts of RGU that can‚Äôt change and what can be affected by the new cast? The question is also how accurate to Batman should the characters be or should I try to merge them more with the Utena characters? Obviously I can‚Äôt make most of them killers but Joker is definitely the kind to leave anonymous gifts full of gross or dead things outside the door of some of his admirers/people who‚Äôve made an impression on him in some way‚Ä¶  And this is just the full picture

Soul of a Spider read it on AO3 at https://ift.tt/wXf5UVy   by Xacxmi   ‚ÄúIt is not your time Aranea.‚Äù she tucked a stray curl behind Peter‚Äôs ear her eyes filled with sorrow.   ‚ÄúWho are you?‚Äù Peter asked his voice hoarse. His hands were shaking so many thoughts running through his head.   ‚ÄúI am someone you should not have had to meet this soon.‚Äù She looked up towards the starry sky moonlight illuminating her face. ‚ÄúAs much as I wish I could I cannot take you home. I can however bring you somewhere that you may find a new path. I can take you to a new world. I can give you a chance at a new fate.‚Äù she looked over at him an unreadable expression on her face. The question in her eyes was clear   Do you want this chance?   OR: peter parker has found himself in Gotham with some help from his gurdian angel (maybe?) and no clear way home. The bats are trying to figure out what the hell is up with this energetic ball of trauma. Hijinks arguments and fistfights ensue and Peter‚Äôs left contemplating existence. post_body: So far here I‚Äôm giving Bruce the benefit of the doubt.   I‚Äôm not gonna condemn him and I think the outburst he had earlier towards Jason might have been what pushed him to find outside help even if he says that ‚Äúit stays in the family‚Äù. Do I honestly think he would have put Jason on a mental institute? I really don‚Äôt think so especially with him keeping their alter ego under wraps when going over what happened to Jason and as I said his previous idea of keeping their problems within the family I‚Äôm thinking he was bringing in a psychologist to help Jason but from their home.   The narration is in the pov of the lady psychologist and the excerpts tell us that Jason does end up talking to her because of how we have Jason going over how he felt during his fight with scarecrow but also Bruce talks to her and also ends up telling her about their alter egos.   I think everything Bruce has done so far in this issue is out of love for Jason it sucks that he didn‚Äôt tell Jason about the psychologist but like it says Jason was pulling back more and more no matter what Bruce and Alfred did and I think Bruce didn‚Äôt know what else to do other than actually do the thing he said he didn‚Äôt want to do in the hopes of getting Jason help. Was it right? No. Is he trying? Yes because he cares so much but is still going to make mistakes. Jason‚Äôs trauma isn‚Äôt something that will just go away if they give him space and ignore it he went through something horrible and the family is scrambling to find their footing again and I‚Äôm excited to see what they do moving forwards because seeing Bruce actually love Jason and care is a big yippee to me.

post_body: Seeing Bruce show concern for his son‚Äôs mental health and struggles for what they are is so satisfying. This shows a great amount of character progression on Bruce‚Äôs part. Instead of seeing Damian as a killer Bruce sees him as a struggling kid that had been hurt from watching his grandfather figure murdered in front of him.  Thank you Williamson for allowing Bruce to show progression in how he approaches Damian‚Äôs struggles.

The eyes that burn through him are not those he looked into as he promised to be careful. The hand jerks him forward out of the still dark shadows of the rooftop and into the moving shadows of the open air. The body looms over him menacing like Tim is the criminal to fight in the shadows.  ‚ÄúB?‚Äù Tim tries but he knows it‚Äôs not Bruce in there. His body his eyes but not him.  <!-- more --> ‚ÄúWhere is he?‚Äù‚Äô Batman growls low and if Tim wasn‚Äôt used to hearing the Batman growl on patrol he‚Äôd be shaking in his boots. ‚ÄúWhere is Red Hood?‚Äù  Tim racks his brain for any reason that any version of B would be looking for Jason and he comes up with quite a few but none of them can be the right one for why Batman has tracked him down for interrogation.  ‚ÄúWhy would I know that?‚Äù Tim responds.  Batman‚Äôs grip on his hand tightens. ‚ÄúDo not toy with me Tim Drake. I know you are loyal to Hood above Batman. I know what rotten things your Batman has allowed to pervade in this city. Poor Tim is about to under go one of the worst rites of Robin Passage - The Sex Lecture.  You see one of my favorite Batfam Headcanons is that Bruce first made a PowerPoint slide show about puberty and sex when Dick was in the sequined booty shorts. It was 120 slides long and meant to so horrify Dick about what the physical damage various STDs could do to his body that the first Robin wouldn‚Äôt dream of having sex until he was at least thirty years old. The number of slides the length of the accompanying lecture and the grossness of the material has only grown larger since then. For Jason it was up to 215 slides and took over four hours to present. By the time Bruce felt enough like Tim‚Äôs Dad to do The Lecture there were 571 slides and it went on for eleven hours. Tim had to vomit three times. Bruce was rather proud of that.  Damian is now supposed to be thirteen (according to current cannon). He even has a girlfriend. Bruce figures he‚Äôll need to carve out a solid day for The Lecture.

secondary_tags: ['jason todd'  'batfam'  'dc comics'  'dc'  'redhood'  'robin'  'batfamily'  'red hood'  'helena bertinelli'  'huntress'  'i‚Äôm fucking done cuz it‚Äôs a horrible take'  'fucking horrible take'  'anti jason todd'  'jason todd anti'  'pro jason todd']
post_body: The only reason people keep saying ‚ÄúJason fanon copies Helena canon‚Äù is because they mad their fav isn‚Äôt well known.  Most of Jason fanon traits is based on his robin days. He‚Äôs been written as an anti hero and villain and has a lot of characterisation. His writing is inconsistent. So what‚Äôs wrong if people write him based on how they view him. It‚Äôs called fanon for a reason and expecting people to pick up your fav while you are hating Jason is ludicrous. The morale superiority some people have just because their fav is not well known or a woman is ridiculous.   I used to nod my head to this take because I felt like ‚Äúhey Jason is a guy and Helena/Mia are women whose stories been stolen‚Äù like I wanted to be politically correct and I thought this was right. But fuck this. Why do they get to have those traits only? Is it a crime if someone thinks it‚Äôs rationale for Jason‚Äôs character to take this trope. Fanon is meant to write wtv fuck u the want that isn‚Äôt in canon and half the time they aren‚Äôt far- fetched.   Jason has always looked out for women and children during his robin days and even as red hood sometimes. Sure it‚Äôs inconsistent but it‚Äôs without a doubt people do that simply because they know his character. He is from the crime alley and his mother was a drug addict. People hc him being an English teacher simply because he has shown to be interested in literature. He was from the streets so it isn‚Äôt far fetched and even implied in a comic (during Mia‚Äôs interaction in arrow) that he might have done child prostitution to get by. It‚Äôs fanon people are allowed to explore possibilities. How does him having such experiences invalidate your fav‚Äôs experiences? Is it wrong that such a strong and big guy had such experiences? Maybe people write that so they can cope with such experiences since they relate to him more. Are these experiences only for your favs? That‚Äôs ridiculous.  I don‚Äôt get why people are mad at a fanon characterisation that has its roots in comics. The guy hasn‚Äôt been written well at all and people in fanon write their take on him. One you have never read Jason as Robin or redhood. 2 you think you‚Äôre justified to hate Jason simply because ‚Äúpoor Helena Jason takes her place‚Äù.   Dc has so many characters and some characters are bound to be similar in some ways.   Helena is already an amazing character so why does hating Jason your way of promoting her? She doesn‚Äôt need to be compared tf. Some people just hate on Jason and read zero comics on her. Somehow people have made themselves believe Jason is the reason why Helena isn‚Äôt popular. Jason is popular because he‚Äôs a bad victim not a model one and people relate to that. A lot of people DO NOT WANT HIM to be Helena. They prefer him as a villain. I‚Äôm deadass done w anyone who tries to pretend he can‚Äôt have any of these traits. It‚Äôs not about the traits it‚Äôs about who and why they have it. So comparing gets you nowhere.   Lastly let‚Äôs be honest Jason fans don‚Äôt read any other comics or works besides Jason. So how would they copy a character they don‚Äôt know exist?

Not a Weapon Not a Tool Not a Soldier (But a Secret Fourth Thing) read it on AO3 at https://ift.tt/D06lEtI   by Hawaiianpurplewolf   Damian was confused. Damian prided himself on not being confused very often; it was unbecoming of the Heir of the Demon to misunderstand anything. He trained incessantly to remember everything he was supposed to do and when he was supposed to do it and what he was supposed to know and how to use that knowledge. His knowledge had never truly failed him before. That is it had never truly failed him in Nanda Parbat. Gotham on the other hand was a completely different monster and Damian was‚Ä¶ struggling. Not failing. Never failing. Failing was one thing that the Ibn al Xu‚Äôffasch could not do. Struggling was embarrassing enough.   But it had become increasingly clear over the last few days that Damian had misunderstood ‚Äì no he had been misinformed of ‚Äì his place in his Father‚Äôs household.
